18.3: meib Bua luvb Diaq Eei zwavj myenb, se yem Daub peib Eei myenb aa'b! yem Bov lyepg keb uaq zang, meib Bua xij zu'g mavg. haid pyomq Jxv Eei Qiaj Bwi, xij zu'g mwavj!
18.4: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj yia, “yia xij yem yia Eei txvj sekg sekq Eei mavg, Navq luvb Rav Eei Eutg trud, Navq syru kcvb zwavj Eei zyavb hog yua'q Eei Nxi Eei Byuvb swiq mrug.”
18.2: tovb lovg Ziab txij yenb miaq zruj Ravq fuvj trug fyenj myenb kan Kxiq mivb uaq nxm teib puv. meib Bua syepq haig Eei trug fyenj myenb aa'b! mivb a'q. mivb lxd yetg fivj Lo Lav Eei, Dopq Byaavg Eei myenb. penj yetg fivj tovb yem ko yem fatq Eei myenb kamb Riaj, se yetg fivj henq Eei myenb, Kuvj xij tu'q hivb Navq. ninb Bua Eei teib puv maaib Daaib pun Gxi.
18.6: ninb xij kwavg ninb Bua pun yem Bov Eei tomb Jaavq Eang, yaag pun lomg Eei Yiab zxib Eang. Gaai kxv maaib Eang ka'naaib taig Eei nx'g Eang, tovb ken maaib Yiab zxib taaib petq.
18.5: weig zu'g maiq kcvb syru Eei zyavb hog, Gxi pyavb ziag liud, pyavb yaag penj xij zua'g Eei a'vung pyruq, ninb xij lovg Fiuq Japq Gxi Meib Zunj, cvj Va'q kwavg lrug mivb Eei Meib Gwaab.
18.7: Tauj uaq zang, maaib myenb xij txb zivb Eeig taaib pun nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq. se yetg fivj Lo Lav Eei, Dopq Byaavg Eei myenb. penj yetg fivj tovb yem ko yem fatq Eei myenb kamb Riaj. se yetg fivj henq Eei myenb, Kuvj xij tu'q hivb Navq. ninb Bua Eei teib puv maaib Daaib pun Gxi. ninb Bua xij txb zivb Eeig taaib Tauj si-on Bov, se lyepg nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Eei mevb Eei txvj.
18.1: yem uaq vaang zi'g e-Ti-o-pia Eei Daaib maaib Daatq Datg Datg Bwi Eei teib puv xij zu'g Kruq a'q.

45.18: zyruq zeij luvb. tovb naaiq taub se Tinb huvb. ninb zeij Zwrtq Dau, lyepg wrnq Dau Eei kxnb Do'q. ninb zeij taaib maiq zeid weig penj Daub Waav, se weig pun myenb yem. ninb kxvq, “yia se zyruq, yaag maiq maaib kanb taub.
45.8: “o luvb aag, Toq twib Byuvg Fiag, Toq pun Bwrnj twib pcvb fim Eei Jauq Fiag. pun Dau Kxi Gxi weig pun Fruj en Zwrtq taaib. pun pcvb fim yetg Fiag Zwrtq. yia, zyruq, zeij taaib Eei.
45.3: yia xij zx'q yem Mwavj zov Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq Zauj pivj Bweid Eei txvj Eei zinb zxib Jiu pun meib, weig pun meib hiuq tu'q ziuj meib Eei Buaj heug meib taaib uaq taub se yia, zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb.
45.21: meib Bua kunq kxvq a'q. kxvq mevb meib Bua Eei sig, pun ninb Bua lomb Rxib Zaavb laavb. haiq taub Jaab Daavg kxvq liud laub a'q? lob Nxi haiq taub zunb naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib? se maiq zeid yia, zyruq fai? Zwrtq liud yia, maiq maaib kanb taub Tinb huvb, yia se pcvb fim Eei Tinb huvb yaag zruj Fruj zyruq. Zwrtq liud yia, maiq maaib kanb taub.
45.14: zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “i-yipq teib puv maaib Eei ka'naaiq Zauj e-Ti-o-pia Eei huaj, Zauj Lo Lav Eei sej-Baa myenb, xij taaib kwei meib, penj meib Eei. ninb Bua zu'g Kauj Jyenq limg kan meib Eei Ga'haaq Gaav taaib. ninb Bua xij kweig Fiag meib Eei Ra'Myen Jrub meib kxvq, ‘Tinb huvb za'kevb Zauj meib yem, yaag maiq maaib kanb taub. maiq maaib kanb taub zyenb.’+”
45.23: yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb hruq waag, yia Eei Rwib kxvq Eei waag se zyen Eei. yia kxvq Eei waag yia maiq zx'q Rwrnj. nxmb nxm Zivb Bx'g xij kweig Fiag paaij yia. suvb suv Rwib xij hruq waag lcvd kan yia Navq.
45.6: weig pun myenb yem Ba'Nxi Zwrtq puv Tauj Ba'Nxi mwrtq puv, hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. Zwrtq liud yia, maiq maaib kanb taub. yia se zyruq, yaag maiq maaib kanb taub.
45.2: “yia xij mivb Daavg meib, zruj pun Bov pcvb Revg. yia xij Bx'q mwrng tovb si'q kcvb, yaag Va'q Dutq Lia'g kcvb sxn.
45.20: “meib Bua yem ziaj kua'q pyauj Zwrtq mcvg Eei myenb xij zu'g lomb Rxib kapq zunq taaib. Daam Jyenq lovg Dyavj zruj taaib Eei miub favj, yaag tauj kauj Jrub maiq haib Fruj myenb Eei zyenb uaq teij myenb, maiq hiuq haiq Euvg.
45.24: ninb Bua xij kxvq Tauj yia, ‘Kuvj Kauj zyruq kanb Navq Zivj tu'q hivb Jiaj yaag maaib Qa'q.’+” ta'faanb Qiaj Jiad, Rxv yia uaq teij, xij taaib lxd yia yaag zu'g paaig Myen.
45.7: yia zeij Fav yaag zeij Mwavj. yia Zeij fu'q yaag pun ze'g naang. yia se zyruq. yia zruj naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig.
45.19: yia maiq zeid yem nxm Mwavj Eei teib puv pivj Jyenq kxvq. yia maiq Buaj yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun, ‘meib Bua lxd yia se maiq lamb lovg.’ yia, zyruq, kxvq zyen sig, yaag zx'q hxpg Eei Jauq pun meib Bua hiuq.
45.17: mq paag i-saa-laa-en xij tu'q   zyruq yetg liud Eei Fruj en Fruj ninb Bua. meib Bua zyrug yetg liud maiq zu'g Eaiq, maiq zu'g paaig Myen Tauj maang kruq maang txig.
45.11: “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb, se zeij i-saa-laa-en myenb uaq taub Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘meib Bua naaig yia Tauj xij Zwrtq Eei sig, meib Bua naaig Tauj yia Eei naamb Erud fai hatg yia Eei puad zruj Eei kov fai?
45.5: yia se zyruq, yaag maiq maaib kanb taub. Zwrtq liud yia, maiq maaib kanb taub Tinb huvb. maiq kunq meib maiq hiuq yia, yia pun Qa'q meib,
45.9: “haiq taub Zauj zeij ninb taaib uaq taub Rcv nx, xij zu'g Kruq a'q. ninb se Navq niab mx Zauj nanq niab mx zavg Rcv. pa'naib nia naaig nanq nia zavg, ‘meib zruj haiq Euvg’ fai? zruj taaib Eei ka'naaiq kxvq, ‘meib nanq Eei ka'naaiq maiq maaib puad’ fai?
45.16: ta'faanb zruj miub favj Eei myenb xij zu'g Eaiq, zu'g paaig Myen, ninb Bua yetg zuvq lomb Rxib zu'g paaig Myen.
45.4: weig yia Eei pru, yaa-Kopq, Zauj yia kinq taaib Eei i-saa-laa-en, yia ziuj meib Eei Buaj heug meib. maiq kunq meib maiq hiuq tu'q yia, yia Jaa mevb hog pun meib.
45.10: haiq taub kaamq Zauj tia Rcv kxvq, ‘meib weig haiq tiug pun yia Zwrtq taaib Navq naaiq?’ fai ninb kxvq Buaj ninb Eei maa, ‘meib yuvd Zwrtq haiq Euvg?’ naaig naaiq Euvg waag Eei myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q.
45.22: “yem Jomg luvb Diaq Eei myenb aag, Win Rwrnj taaib lxd yia zyrug tu'q Fruj, weig zu'g yia se Tinb huvb yaag maiq maaib kanb taub.
45.12: se yia zeij paamb ken yaag zeij myenb taaib yem paamb ken. yia kanb Eei puad Zxv luvb yaag hatg yem luvb Eei zwavj Leij.
45.15: o Tinb huvb, i-saa-laa-en Eei Fruj zyruq, meib za'kevb Tinb huvb, tovb pivj kanb uaq taub.
45.13: yia xij lovg yia pcvb fim Eei za'eij lyepg sai-latq. yia xij Kxi za'g ninb Eei tiub tiub Jauq, ninb xij Zeij yia Eei zivb, yaag puvj yia Eei pc'g fivj, tovb zu'g Zaavq mivb Eei myenb Rwrnj. yaag maiq zeid weig kovb zinb fai zivb Eeig. naaiq se nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq kxvq.’+”
45.1: “yia, zyruq, xn sai-latq. yia nanq ninb Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad, weig Bx'q hivb yem ninb Eei uaq Daavg mcvj Eei ziaj kua'q myenb, yaag xij Jaiq Gxi huvb Bx'q Jaaj Eei lwib hruj. yia xij yem ninb Eei uaq Daavg mcvj Kxi Gxi zivb kcvb, yaag maiq pun zivb kcvb kwrn.   zyruq kxvq Buaj sai-latq,
45.25: mq paag i-saa-laa-en Eei yetg zuvq hod txig zeib fun xij Kauj zyruq tu'q hivb Jiaj yaag Zev ninb.

3.18: Tauj uaq Nxi zyruq xij zx'q Gxi ninb Bua Rweig Eei zaub Jyemb, mGxvb Kru, Ja'waanb,
3.8: ye-lu-saa-lem zu'g paaig, yu-Daa yaag Baav mig a'q, weig zu'g ninb Bua kxvq Eei waag Zauj zruj Eei sig Ki zyruq. ninb Bua vcvg Favb laavg Eei Tinb huvb.
3.3: kunq Mmd zyepg taub pcv Eei pcvb pyeiq Zauj zruj Lo Eei myenb, Zaavb laavb myenb Zauj zruj Waab Eind Eei myenb kwai myenb Zauj haib zruj faatq Eei myenb.
3.14: zyruq Jiad kxn syemq ninb Eei pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj Eei myenb koj Zauj Jyen, “se tovb meib Bua zruj waaig yia Eei a'vung Wivj. meib Bua luq myenb Jomg myenb Eei ka'naaiq yem meib Bua Eei pyauq.
3.23: puad nanq Eei kivj, la'maab Diab mwrng Eei lwib hruj, mGxvb peu Zauj Byxvd mGxvq Dia.
3.6: myenb xij zx'q taub kanb Eei kxb yrud yem ninb Eei tia Eei pyauq zyrug kxvq, “meib maaib teij tomb lwi. meib xij zu'g zruj yia Bua Eei pyeiq zeiq. naaiq Dwi paaig waaig Eei txvj zyrug kwei meib Eei puab Diaq.”
3.2: zx'q Zwrtq henq haig Eei pcv Zauj Bx'q Jaaj pcv, syemq zwid Jyen Zauj trug waag myenb, Bruq kwaaj myenb Zauj myenb koj,
3.20: Rweig Eei nivq, Kru puab seib zuvj Eei Dia, la'sin, tapq yrub Daav Eei faav, Zauj prub,
3.24: zweib huq zyrug tiq yrub Daav, Laav tiq la'sin, mGxvq Fav tiq Ba'pyei Rweig, la'maab Diab Zru tiq Zyrub tung lwib hruj, paaig Myen Eei sig tiq Rweig Eei Jauq.
3.7: Tauj uaq Nxi ninb zyrug kxvq Zwrtq, “yia maiq haib Tevj meib Bua zxg. yia Eei pyauq maiq maaib Eang hopq, yaag maiq maaib tomb lwi, meib Bua maiq tuvq xn yia zruj pc'g fivj Eei pyeiq zeiq.”
3.19: mnxmb Yun, Jyemb, Byxvd Myen Dia,
3.17: zyruq zyrug pun si-on Eei msia'q txn Eei mGxvq putq faav,   zyruq yaag pun ninb Bua Eei pivb Zyruq Zwrtq.”
3.11: x'q myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q. ninb zuvq zu'g ze'g naang. ziuj ninb Eei puad zruj Eei, ninb kanb yaag zu'g Navq uaq nx.
3.5: pc'g fivj xij zu'g zeij, laanb xij zeij laanb, kx'g myenb xij zeij kx'g myenb Eei Jwavg laavd myenb. myenb lunj myenb xij mavg Piaj myenb koj myenb. haag hxvb myenb yaag xij mavg Piaj zavg hxvb Eei myenb.
3.9: ninb Bua Eei Myen piuj mevb ninb Bua txvg. ninb Bua zunb ninb Bua kanb Eei zwid Navq soj-Dom zivb Eei myenb nx. ninb Bua zu'g Kruq a'q. ninb Bua hxig ninb Bua kanb zu'g ze'g naang.
3.16: zyruq kxvq, “laaij si-on Eei msia'q txn mauj haig, yavb Jauq vxvd Jyenq Jaav, ninb Bua Eei mziv Luvb Luvb Lyrub Lyruj, yavb Jauq fuvb fuvb fiab fiab, zauj Eei Jyemb Lctq Lctq Eei.
3.4: zyruq kxvq, “yia xij pun hrub scv penj ninb Bua Eei Jyen, pun fu'Jweiq kunq ninb Bua.
3.10: xij zu'g Buaj Kuq myenb, ninb Bua xij tu'q lovj. weig zu'g ziuj ninb Bua zruj Eei sig tu'q winb pun ninb Bua.
3.22: Rweig Eei lwib hruj, tomb lwi, tomb lwib Daauq, Zauj Dopg Bua'g,
3.12: yia Eei pc'g fivj zu'g fu'Jweiq zeij ninb Bua, yaag maaib msia'q txn kunq ninb Bua. o yia Eei pc'g fivj aag, meib Bua Eei pyeiq zeiq txb meib Bua mivb txvg Jauq, yaag zruj pun meib Bua Eei Jauq lung Revg.
3.15: meib Bua weig haiq tiug zeij yia Eei pc'g fivj cvj pun myenb Jomg myenb zu'g Kruq Tauj Diaq?” zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq.
3.13: zyruq pia'g ninb Eei sib txvb, sruq Jiad taaib syemq ninb Eei pc'g fivj.
3.1: mavg maa'b! zyruq, se nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, xij yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zauj yu-Daa zx'q Zwrtq myenb Kauj Eei Zauj Qyemj lovg Eei, se zx'q Zwrtq maaib Eei yetg zuvq Eang hopq ka'naaiq Zauj maaib Eei yetg zuvq uam.
3.26: si-on Eei zivb kcvb xij Raub Eyemq, zivb ka'Euad yaag xij Navq taub zu'g petq Gxi lwib hruj Eei msia'q txn zweid Jyenq Dau.
3.25: meib Bua Eei mJavg txn xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. meib Bua henq haig Eei mJavg txn yem Bx'q Jaaj Zyavq zu'g taig.

66.18: “yia hiuq tu'q ninb Bua zruj Eei Zauj yem Hruq Namq Eei, yia zyrug taaib syru zunq maang kua'q maang fivj myenb, ninb Bua zyrug taaib pwatg yia Eei Favb laavg.
66.8: haiq taub haid naaiq Euvg sig? haiq taub pwatg Jiaj naaiq Euvg sig? yetg nxm kua'q yetg Nxi Navq haib Zwrtq taaib fai? yetg kua'q myenb Du'g tavb Navq haib yuvd Zwrtq seij fai? weig zu'g si-on yetq mun ninb yuvd Zwrtq ninb Eei naamb Erud mig a'q.”
66.3: mq paag haiq taub lovg vovb ziag se Navq taij myenb. haiq taub lovg pa'ki yuvb ziag se Navq Bx'q Juq Eei Jaav nauq. haiq taub fovg hxg laavb zi'g se Navq lovg tuvd Eei Ryaamq fovg hxg. haiq taub puaq huv se Navq ninb zavg miub favj. naaiq Euvg myenb kinq kanb Eei Jauq. ninb Bua Eei Hruq a'Neiq zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig.
66.21: zyruq kxvq, “yia yaag xij yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj kinq teij zruj sai myenb Zauj le-wi myenb.”
66.14: meib Bua mavg pwatg, Navq naaig meib Bua zyrug a'Neiq. meib Bua zyrug henq yaag wavg syavj. myenb zyrug zia'q tu'q zyruq Eei puad Tevj ninb Eei zwavj pru, mq paag ninb Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq pun ninb Eei winb wavq.
66.23: zyruq kxvq, “mrud nxm Laaj Eei scvb yetq Nxi Zauj nxmb nxm tivb kov Nxi, maang myenb xij taaib yem yia Eei Ra'Myen kweig Fiag paaij yia.
66.6: mwavj maa'b! maaib Qiaj Zob Zob Eei yem zivb ka'Euad Zwrtq. yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq yaag Zwrtq Bwi Eei Qiaj. se zyruq winb pun ninb Eei winb wavq Eei Qiaj Bwi.
66.2: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “naaiq teij yetg zuvq se yia kanb Eei puad zeij taaib maiq zeid? ninb Bua yetg zuvq zyrug Zwrtq taaib a'q. “mq paag yia mavg Eei myenb se Navq naaiq. ninb Eyemg kanb zruj faij, zia'q tu'q ninb se zruj txvg Eei myenb. weig yia kxvq Eei waag ninb sin zinj.
66.20: ninb Bua zyrug txb meib Bua Eei yetg zuvq kxb yrud yem maang kua'q taaib Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem, meib Eei Zivb Revg Bov, weig fovg hxg pun zyruq. ninb Bua zyrug keb maad, keb maab Zia, vovb Zia, lxb Zauj lxb Txb.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag. “ninb Bua xij txb ninb Bua Navq i-saa-laa-en myenb lovg Zivb Revg Eei Jaab sig tapq fovg hxg ziag Eei laavb zi'g txb Tauj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq.”
66.24: ninb Bua xij Zwrtq mivb mavg vcvg yia uaq teij myenb Eei sei. Eang ninb Bua Eei sei uaq teij kcvb mau yetg liud maiq taig. puaq ninb Bua Eei trud yetg liud yaag maiq taig. ninb Bua zyrug penj luvb Diaq myenb kamb Riaq haig Eei ka'naaiq.”
66.7: “yia Eei Zivb Revg zivb se Navq taub msia'q txn maiq kcvb mun, ninb yuvd Daavg. maiq kcvb mun kub vwaad ninb yuvd Zwrtq taub txn.
66.19: “yia xij zx'q nxm Javb hog an ninb Bua Eei Bu'Dovj. yia yaag xij Paaiq teij pyauj Zwrtq mcvg Eei myenb mivb Tauj ziaj fivj, se mivb Tauj Taan-sitq, li-Bia, li-Dia (maaib mevb taub haib pwrnq Jwavb zinj Eei myenb), yaag Tauj Tu-Ban Zauj yaa-waan, zuvq mivb Tauj maiq maaib myenb haid Jiaj yia Eei mevb fai pwatg Jiaj yia Eei Favb laavg uaq teij ko haig Eei Kxib Rru. ninb Bua zyrug zunb yia Eei Favb laavg yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj.
66.17: “saaj wij, fyruj kanb Zivb Revg weig pia'g Wivj ka'Euad, kan Jyenq yetg taub myenb Eei Ga'haaq Gaav mivb, se kan Eang tuvb xq Zauj naaud Zauj ziaj Euvg kamb Riaq haig Eei ka'naaiq uaq teij, zyrug lomb Rxib Tauj ninb Bua setq mweid Eei Nxi.
66.11: meib Bua tu'q yem ninb xn Hruq Eei la'Kwrtq hopq Exj peuq Revg. meib Bua yaag a'Neiq ninb puvb zua'g Eei Favb laavg.”
66.5: meib Bua weig zyruq Eei waag sin zinj Eei myenb aa'b! mwavj ninb Eei waag maa'b! “meib Bua Eei kxb yrud, tovb Rxv meib Bua uaq teij yaag weig yia Eei mevb zung meib Bua Zwrtq mivb cvj kxvq, ‘Toq pun zyruq tu'q Favb laavg, yia Bua zyrug tu'q pwatg meib Eei xnb lx'g.’ mq paag naaiq teij myenb xij zu'g paaig Myen.
66.9: zyruq kxvq, “yia txb ninb Tauj Dutq sin Eei zyavb hog yaag maiq pun ninb yuvd fai? Tauj zyavb hog yuvd yia pun kub vwaab Bua'g Dipg fai?” meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq.
66.16: weig zu'g zyruq xij lovg trud Zauj ninb Eei Ru'g Daauq syemq tivg maang myenb Eei zwid, zyrug maaib myenb Zamq Eei zu'g zyruq taij taig.   zyruq kxvq,
66.4: yia zyrug xij kinq ze'g naang hxig ninb Bua, pun ninb Bua zu'g ninb Bua kamb Riaj Eei sig, weig zu'g yia heug, maiq maaib yetg taub tau. yia kxvq waag, maiq maaib haiq taub mwavj. ninb Bua yem yia Eei Ra'Myen zruj x'q Eei sig, yaag kinq yia maiq a'Neiq Eei sig.”
66.10: “meib Bua yetg zuvq Namq ye-lu-saa-lem Eei myenb aa'b! xij zu'g Zauj ninb Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g. meib Bua Raub Eyemq ninb Eei yetg zuvq myenb, xij zu'g Zauj ninb kevb! xnb lx'g haig.
66.22: zyruq kxvq, “yia xij zeij Eei syavb luvb syavb Dau Navq haiq nx yetg liud yem yia Eei Ra'Myen, meib Bua Eei zeib fun Zauj meib Bua Eei Buaj yaag xij Navq uaq nx yetg liud yem.”
66.12: weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij pun pcvb xn lyrug Jiaj ninb Navq Daaib nx, pun maang kua'q Eei zinb zxib Navq Do'q pwavq mrub lyrug taaib. meib Bua zyrug Navq fu'Jweiq hopq maa Eei Exj, maaib maa Lxpq Jyenq, pun kub vwaad yem ninb Eei Zamb zwib sru.
66.15: mavg maa'b! zyruq xij yem trud ka'Euad taaib, ninb Bx'q Jaaj Eei Zia yaag Navq Ryaaub zung. ninb xij Qiaj Jiad Jyenq taaib, pun ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq winb pun ninb Bua, yaag lovg trub Byetg tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid.
66.13: Navq maa xn ninb Eei fu'Jweiq Eei Hruq, yia yaag Navq uaq nx xn meib Bua Eei Hruq. meib Bua yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem tu'q xn Hruq.”
66.1: zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “luvb se yia Eei weig, Dau se yia lxvj zauj Eei txvj. meib Bua weig yia Zeij Eei ting xij Navq haiq nx? yia tu'q hitq Kwrnj Eei txvj xij yem haaij?”

43.18: zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “maiq tuvq Javj Jiaj taaib Eei sig, yaag maiq tuvq Ramg lob Nxi Eei Jauq.
43.8: xij zu'g txb maaib mziv mq paag mcvb Eei, maaib mnxmb mq paag Duv Eei myenb Zwrtq taaib.
43.3: weig zu'g yia se zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, se i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb, meib Eei Fruj zyruq. yia zx'q i-yipq zruj zua'g meib Eei Jaab zinb, yaag zx'q e-Ti-o-pia Zauj sej-Baa lovg Tiuq meib.
43.21: se weig yia kanb zeij taaib Eei myenb. ninb Bua zyrug haib Zev yia.
43.14: i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb, tovb zua'g meib Bua uaq taub zyruq, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “weig meib Bua Eei kxn yia Paaiq Junb pcv kwanb mivb Baa-Bi-lon, Bx'q paaig ninb Bua Eei yetg zuvq zivb kcvb, Baa-Bi-lon myenb Fyenb yrub heug Eei Qiaj zyrug Tiuq penj Raub Eyemq Eei Qiaj.
43.23: meib maiq txb pa'ki yuvb taaib ziag yia, yaag maiq lovg meib ziag Eei ka'naaiq Taaib yia. yia maiq pun meib weig fovg hxg Eei ka'naaiq Kruq, yaag maiq zanb zang Toq huv pun meib Kruq haig.
43.6: yia xij Buaj pa'q puv, ‘puvj ninb Bua maa'b!’ yaag xij Buaj naamb puv, ‘maiq tuvq Rcv ninb Bua.’ yia xij txb yia Eei txn Bua yem ko Eei taaib, yaag yem luvb kxn txb yia Eei sia'q Rwrnj,
43.2: meib Jiaj uam Eei zyavb hog, yia Zauj meib yem. meib Jiaj Daaib, Daaib Eei uam yaag maiq yemj meib. meib yavb trud Jiaj, meib maiq zu'g trud puaq, trub Byetg yaag maiq zia'g meib.
43.20: lomg Eei Yiab zxib xij Taaib yia, Yiab Juq Zauj nx'g lxb Txb yaag Taaib yia, weig zu'g yia pun teib puvb Waav maaib uam, yaag pun teib puvb haand maaib Do'q, weig pun yia Eei pc'g fivj, yia kinq taaib Eei myenb, maaib uam hopq,
43.24: meib maiq lovg Eaanb maaid kamb ziaj pun yia, fai lovg ziag Eei ka'naaiq Eei Mei pun yia pwavq Hruq. taauj Rwrnj meib pun yia weig meib Eei zwid Kruq, meib zruj txvg paamd Eei zwid pun yia za'kevb Kruq haig.
43.28: yia xij pun yem sivj ting zruj Lo uaq teij maaib wij, zx'q yaa-Kopq Jiu pun zu'g myetg Revg, yaag pun i-saa-laa-en zu'g myenb Wrtq.
43.7: se ta'faanb kan yia Eei Buaj heug Eei myenb, tovb yia zeij taaib weig pun yia tu'q Favb laavg, se yia nanq taaib zeij taaib Eei myenb.’
43.19: mavg maa'b! yia xij zruj yetg Euvg syavb sig, ib zang Zwrtq taaib a'q. meib Bua maiq pwatg fai? yia xij yem teib puvb Waav Kxi Jauq, yaag pun teib puvb haand Zwrtq Do'q.
43.17: ninb pun Bx'q Jaaj Eei Zia Zauj maad, pun Junb pcv Zauj Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv Zwrtq taaib. ninb Bua pweij Fiag, yetg liud maiq haib Jiad sin. ninb Bua zutg Revg, Navq tavb Zoq Eei trud taig nx.
43.27: meib Eei taaub taub ovb Taaib vc'q paamd zwid. meib Eei pyeiq zeiq yaag vcvg yia.
43.11: yia, se yia kanb, zruj zyruq. Zwrtq liud yia maiq maaib kanb taub Fruj zyruq.
43.5: maiq tuvq kamb Riaj weig zu'g yia Zauj meib yem. yia xij txb meib Eei zeib fun yem tov puv taaib, yaag yem fai puv txb meib Eei myenb taaib kapq zunq.
43.9: maang kua'q myenb xij zu'g kapq zunq, zwavj fivj xij zu'g lomb Rxib taaib. yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj maaib haiq taub Jaab Daavg kxvq naaiq teij sig yaag kxvq Jiaj taaib Eei sig pun yia Bua mwavj? pun ninb Bua txb ninb Bua Eei zxvb zevj myenb Zwrtq taaib pun Ziv ninb Bua hxpg, myenb zyrug mwavj haid yaag kxvq, “naaiq za'kevb zyen Eei.”
43.16: zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq.   zyruq Kxi Tov Kxiq Eei Jauq, Kxi tiub Jauq yem tomb uam ka'Euad.
43.4: weig zu'g ziuj yia Eei mziv mavg, meib se Jaaij haig. yia Taaib meib yaag Namq meib. yia zyrug zx'q myenb lovg Tiuq meib, yaag zx'q ziaj fivj myenb yeng meib Eei mcvg.
43.10: zyruq kxvq, “meib Bua se yia Eei zxvb zevj myenb, yaag zruj yia Eei pru, tovb yia kinq uaq taub, weig pun meib Bua haib hiuq tu'q yaag syenj yia, yaag mevb pc'g yia se zyruq. Zwrtq liud yia maiq maaib kanb taub zyenb. zinb Daavg maiq maaib, Ga'haaq yaag maiq maaib.
43.22: “o yaa-Kopq aag, maiq kunq Navq naaig meib Zxg maiq heug yia. o i-saa-laa-en aag, meib maiq weig yia tiaq Kruq yetg teij.
43.12: yia pun meib Bua hiuq, yaag Fruj meib Bua yaag kxvq Buaj meib Bua, se yia, maiq zeid yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj Eei Eiag Eei zyenb.”   zyruq kxvq, “meib Bua zruj yia Eei zxvb zevj myenb, yia se Tinb huvb.”
43.15: yia se zyruq, meib Bua Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb, tovb zeij i-saa-laa-en uaq taub, meib Bua Eei huvb tiaj.”
43.13: yem lod! Nxi taaib yia mtaaib yetg liud zruj Tinb huvb. maiq maaib haiq taub haib Fruj myenb pyauj Dutq yia Eei puad. yia zruj Eei haiq Euvg, maiq maaib haiq taub haib kxiq yeng.
43.1: o yaa-Kopq aag, zeij meib taaib uaq taub, o i-saa-laa-en aag, nanq meib taaib Eei zyruq, ib zang Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “maiq tuvq kamb Riaj weig zu'g yia zua'g meib Rwrnj taaib a'q. yia ziuj meib Eei Buaj heug meib. meib penj yia Eei mig a'q.
43.26: wetq Zwrtq Jiaj taaib Eei sig pun yia mwavj, pun Bua lomb Rxib taaib lwrnj. kunq kxvq meib Eei Jauq pun Ziv meib maiq txvg.
43.25: “Kuvj maaib yia weig kanb sxtq kwavg meib zruj txvg Eei sig, yaag maiq Javj meib Eei zwid.

50.3: yia pun luvb Mwavj mivb txvj lwib hruj, yaag lovg la'maab Diab Zru komq Jyenq.”
50.8: kxvq yia zruj tu'q hxpg uaq taub yem nitq fatq yia, uaq Euvg haiq taub xij Zauj yia zruj sig? pun uaq taub Zauj yia sruq Jyenq naaiq. haiq taub koj yia? pun ninb taaib yem nitq fatq yia.
50.4: zyruq Tinb huvb Faauj yia xij zu'g kxvq haiq Euvg hxpg Eei waag weig lovg waag Tevj paaq Jyenq Kruq Eei myenb.   zyruq Dxmb Dxm heug yia Eia taaib, weig pun yia Eei mnxmb mwavj ninb xij Faauj yia Eei waag.
50.2: yia taaib Eei zyavb hog weig haiq tiug maiq maaib myenb zuaq? yia heug Eei zyavb hog weig haiq tiug maiq maaib haiq taub tau? yia Eei puad navq haig, maiq haib zua'g meib Bua fai? yia maiq maaib Qa'q Fruj fai? mavg maa'b! yia hatg Kxiq, Kxiq zyrug Gaai mig a'q. yia pun Daaib penj teib puvb Waav. yem naaig Eei Byaud laaij maiq maaib uam zyrug taig, huq zweij Revg.
50.6: myenb Bx'q yia Eei ti'g taand, yia sweib myenb Bx'q. myenb pcv yia Eei syaam, yia Win yia Eei Kamb pwi pun ninb Bua. myenb pun yia zu'g Eaiq, Twiq uamb Rwib pun yia, yia maiq pwav yia Eei Myen.
50.9: se zyruq Tinb huvb Tevj yia. haiq taub haib koj yia, kxvq yia zruj txvg? ninb Bua yetg zuvq xij Navq lwib hruj lod mivb, zu'g kcv Eang Revg.
50.11: ta'faanb meib Bua yetg zuvq tyemq trud puaq zia'g trub paaq Eei myenb, kunq pavg meib Bua tyemq Eei trud Zauj puaq zia'g Eei trub paaq Eei Fav yavb maa'b! naaiq se yia Eei puad xij zruj Eei, se pun meib Bua pweij Fiag zu'g syrug Kruq.
50.5: zyruq Tinb huvb pun yia Eei mnxmb mwavj tu'q haid, yia yaag maiq vcvg, yaag maiq Win kanb puv.
50.7: weig zu'g zyruq Tinb huvb Tevj yia, yia maiq zu'g Eaiq. yia zyrug vcvg Jyenq Navq trub lau nx vcvg, yaag hiuq tu'q yia maiq zu'g paaig Myen.
50.1: zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “yia lovg zung meib Bua Eei maa pyauj uaq zeiq leib Zai sru yem haaij? fai yia zx'q meib Bua maaig pun yia Eei haiq taub zc'g zyruq? se laaij meib Bua Eei zwid meib Bua Zivj zu'g maaig. laaij meib Bua paamd zwid meib Bua Eei maa Zivj zu'g zung pyauj.
50.10: yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj, haiq taub Taaib zyruq, yaag mwavj ninb Eei pru Eei waag? ninb yavb Mwavj Eei txvj, maiq maaib Fav, ninb xij zu'g Kauj zyruq Eei mevb, yaag pavg ninb Eei Tinb huvb.

14.18: zwavj kua'q Eei yetg zuvq huvb tiaj zavj tu'q maaib mevb taub, kx'g myenb yem kx'g myenb Eei zruq.
14.8: lyemb sai-patg zovb Zauj le-Baa-nxn Eei sij-Daa zovb Dyavj, laaij meib Fyenb yrub zyrug kxvq, “yem meib zu'g Dxtq Fiag mivb, maiq maaib kxij Dyavj Eei myenb taaib kxij yia Bua.”
14.3: zyruq pun meib Bua pyauj Dutq zu'g mun, zu'g faanq lung, zu'g aapq zruj kov Kruq Eei sig zyrug tu'q hitq uaq Nxi,
14.32: xij zu'g Navq haiq nx tau uaq nxm kua'q fuvj taaib Eei trug fyenj myenb? xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, “zyruq lyepg si-on. yem ninb Eei pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj Kruq Eei myenb, haib tu'q yem naaig maaib Daaub Kauj Eei txvj.”
14.21: xij zu'g liug leid taij ninb Eei funb fa'q laaij ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij zruj Eei zwid. kamb Riaj ninb Bua Jiad taaib tu'q Revg paamb ken, cvj lyepg zivb pwavq luvb Diaq.
14.14: yia xij faauj Tauj Bwrnj kub vwaaig. yia xij pun yia kanb Zauj yem Lav Jiaj uaq taub fib Dovg.”
14.23: “yia xij pun Baa-Bi-lon penj Faavb, penj nx'g kuq lov yem Eei txvj. yia xij pun zu'g myetg Navq lovg kaanq Pwrtq Fav Revg.” naaiq se nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
14.6: ninb Bua Qiaj Jiad, maiq tivb lyrub Eei Bx'q ziaj fivj myenb. ninb Bua nrud Jyenq kunq ziaj nxm kua'q, zruj to'g hxig myenb yaag maiq tivb.
14.2: kanb fivj myenb xij txb ninb Bua Rwrnj Tauj ninb Bua kanb Eei txvj. i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun zyrug yem zyruq Eei teib puv tu'q kanb fivj myenb zruj ninb Bua Eei nrub kauq nrub peid. ninb Bua tu'q kwaatq taaib tovb zinb Daavg kwaatq ninb Bua mivb uaq teij, yaag tu'q kunq tovb zinb Daavg zeij ninb Bua uaq teij myenb.
14.20: meib maiq tu'q Zauj huvb zavj, weig zu'g meib paaig waaig meib Eei kua'q, yaag taij meib Eei pc'g fivj. x'q myenb Eei zeib fun aa'b! myenb yetg liud maiq Ramg Tauj.
14.24: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq hruq Jyenq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “yia taaq Eei za'eij za'kevb xij Navq uaq nx zruj Zwrtq. yia Navq haiq nx tivg, za'kevb xij Navq uaq nx Zwrtq taaib.
14.28: aa-hatg huvb kwei seij uaq Havj, naaiq se yem Tinb huvb taaib Eei waag.
14.7: zyavb nxm luvb Diaq tu'q hitq Kwrnj, Taaib pcvb mig a'q. myenb Zwrtq Qiaj paauj Ruv.
14.29: meib Bua fi-li-saa-tia myenb aa'b! meib Bua yetg zuvq maiq tuvq a'Neiq weig Bx'q meib Bua uaq tiub pyaaq nauq. weig zu'g yetg tiub naav xij Zwrtq tiub naavb to'g. Ga'haaq cvj Zwrtq tiub Juvb huvb Daij.
14.19: mq paag meib zu'g zxi kwavg, maiq tu'q zavj kanb Eei zruq, Navq kamb Riaq Eei ka'naaib taig nx. meib Eei lwi se taig mivb Eei myenb, tovb zu'g Ru'g Daauq Ropq Eei myenb. se zu'g Dxtq Fiag Do haig, maaib la'pyeiq Eei Kwrtq, penj zu'g myenb Zaaiq Eei sei.
14.17: pun luvb Diaq penj Daub Waav, pun zivb Byenq Revg, yaag maiq puvj kwaatq taaib Eei myenb Rwrnj pyauq se tovb naaiq taub fai?”
14.31: o fi-li-saa-tia Eei zwavj myenb aa'b! yem meib Bua Eei zivb kcvb Qa'q Eyemq Bwi Eei. xij zu'g kamb Riaj, Ba'Riu yu'g Revg, weig zu'g yem pa'q puv maaib trub syruj Zwrtq taaib, ninb Bua Eei kwanb yaag maiq maaib yetg taub lx'g Gaav.
14.30: kaub Jomg Jiaj Eei myenb xij tu'q Eang, tavb tonj myenb tu'q pcvb xn Eei pweij, mq paag yia xij pun meib Bua fi-li-saa-tia myenb, vxg Naavj taig. tu'q mcvg Zwrtq Eei myenb yia xij taij taig.
14.27: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq tivg Navq naaiq zruj, haiq taub haib tavq Jyenq maiq pun zruj? ninb Eei puad suv Zwrtq taaib, maaib haiq taub haib pun ninb Lwrtq Rwrnj?
14.11: meib Eei Favb laavg Zauj meib Eei taanb paab Eei Qiaj zu'g Fiag Tauj yemb ken. timg meib ka'Diaq se kcvb mau, meib homg Eei se kcvb Junq.
14.5: zyruq wrtq nauq x'q myenb Eei pyaaq, se zruj Lo uaq teij kunq myenb Eei livg.
14.9: yemb ken a'Neiq Eei liug leid weig zipq meib Fiag. taig mivb uaq teij, se zinb Daavg zruj luvb Diaq Eei pyeiq zeiq uaq teij yetg zuvq, Jiad taaib zipq meib. zruj Jiaj ziaj kua'q Eei huvb uaq teij yetg zuvq yem ninb Bua Eei weig Jiad sin taaib.
14.16: pwatg meib uaq teij xij Qa'q mavg meib yaag yem Hruq Namq Tauj meib, “se tovb naaiq laanb myenb pun paamb ken zu'g Dang tovd, yaag Gamq tovd ziaj nxm kua'q fai?
14.4: meib Bua zyrug lovg naaiq teij waag kxvq Wrtq Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb tiaj. zeij myenb Eei myenb uaq taub sekq Revg mig a'q. ninb to'g haig, Zyruq haig Eei Qa'q tivb mig a'q.
14.10: ninb Bua yetg zuvq xij kxvq yaag kxvq Buaj meib, “meib ib zang mau Navq yia Bua nx, meib se Navq yia Bua a'q.”
14.22: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq kxvq, “yia xij Jiad taaib Bx'q ninb Bua. yia yaag xij Pai kwavg Baa-Bi-lon Eei mevb Zauj tu'q mcvg Zwrtq, zevg Fiag Eei myenb, yaag Pai kwavg ninb Eei txnb Jweiq zeib fun.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
14.12: o luvb Dxm Eei Leij, luvb Dxm Ryruq Eei txn aa'b! meib yem uaq luvb zu'g Dxtq Fiag. meib zruj pun ziaj nxm kua'q zu'g paaig, ib zang meib zu'g Pai Fiag Tauj Dau.
14.15: taauj Rwrnj meib zu'g Fiag yemb ken, se Tauj Kwrtq Do Jiaj Eei txvj.
14.13: meib yem Hruq kxvq, “yia xij faauj kub vwaaig luvb, kaub Lav Jiaj Tinb huvb Eei zwavj Leij. yia xij lyepg yia Eei weig yem uaq nxm Lav Eei txvj. yia xij zweid Jyenq kapq zunq Eei wig Eei Bov, se yem pa'q puv ko Jiaj Eei txvj.
14.1: zyruq xij Kxb lyenb yaa-Kopq, cvj kinq i-saa-laa-en myenb, pun ninb Bua yem Fiag ninb Bua kanb Eei teib puv. kanb fivj myenb yaag xij taaib Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua yem, cvj zxpg Jyenq yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun.
14.26: naaiq se yia weig zyavb nxm luvb Diaq tivg taaib Eei za'eij, naaiq se suv Zwrtq yem maang kua'q kub vwaaig Eei puad.
14.25: yia xij Bx'q paaig yem yia Eei teib puv Eei atg-si-lia myenb. yem yia Eei nxmb nxm Bov yia xij Zaaiq ninb Bua Fiag. atg-si-lia myenb pun yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, kaad Eei Dyavb kaad yia xij zx'q Gxi, ninb Bua zu'g Daam Eei Daamj yia yaag prub Fiag Ba'taub.” 1

48.18: feij tu'q meib mwavj yia hatg Eei waag. meib zyrug maaib pcvb xn Navq Daaib nx, meib zruj hxpg Eei Jauq yaag Navq Kxiq Eei uamb laavg.
48.8: meib maiq haid Jiaj yaag maiq hiuq tu'q. yem lob Nxi taaib, meib Eei mnxmb zotq Jyenq. yia hiuq tu'q meib haib Byenq Hruq Eei. meib Zwrtq seij taaib zuvq tu'q Buaj heug Hruq vcvg Eei myenb.
48.3: Jiaj liud Eei sig yia Jaab Daavg kxvq Buaj meib Bua. se yem yia Eei Rwib Zwrtq yia yaag zunb Buaj myenb. yia lyemb zeib zruj zyrug ei uaq Zwrtq taaib.
48.21: zyruq txb ninb Bua Jiaj teib puvb Waav ninb Bua Jaav maiq Gaatq. ninb weig ninb Bua pun uam yem la'pyeiq lyrug Zwrtq. ninb Bx'q la'pyeiq Baaij, uam zyrug pctq Zwrtq taaib.
48.14: “meib Bua yetg zuvq taaib kapq zunq mwavj. uaq teij miub favj maaib haiq taub Jaab Daavg kxvq naaiq teij sig?   zyruq kinq taaib Eei myenb xij ei Jyenq ninb Eei za'eij zruj pun Baa-Bi-lon. ninb Eei puad yaag xij Bx'q Baa-Bi-lon myenb.
48.6: meib haid liud, ib zang pwatg Jyenq naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig a'q. meib yaag maiq lcvd fai? “yem naaiq mivb yia zx'q syavb sig, tovb meib maiq hiuq Eei, kem Jyenq Eei sig Buaj meib.
48.2: meib Bua kxvq kanb penj Zivb Revg zivb Eei myenb, yaag Kauj i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb. ninb Eei Buaj heug nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq.
48.20: Zwrtq Baa-Bi-lon maa'b! pyauj Zwrtq Ken-Dia. Fyenb yrub Eei heug Jyenq zunb yaavb, zunb mivb Tauj Jomg luvb Diaq kxvq, “zyruq zua'g ninb Eei pru, yaa-Kopq, mig a'q.”
48.7: naaiq teij sig se ib zang Zwrtq taaib syav Eei sig, maiq zeid lob Nxi maaib Eei. naaiq teij sig zinb Daavg meib maiq haid Jiaj. ib Nxi Zo'q ho'g haid. Riaj meib kxvq, ‘zeid Eei. uaq teij sig yia hiuq mig a'q.’
48.19: meib Eei zeib fun zyrug Navq saab zyru, meib Eei funb fa'q Navq saab zyrub Meiq. ninb Bua Eei mevb yetg liud maiq zu'g Pai kwavg, yaag maiq zu'g myetg, leib yia Eei Ra'Myen.”
48.17: i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb, tovb zua'g meib Bua uaq taub zyruq, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “yia se zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb. yia Faauj meib weig Tevj meib tu'q lovj, yaag txb meib yavb meib hxpg zu'g yavb Eei Jauq.
48.11: yia Navq naaiq zruj se weig yia kanb, se weig yia kanb. yia Navq haiq nx haib pun myenb Ki tu'q yia? yia maiq zx'q yia Eei Favb laavg pun kanb taub.
48.5: weig naaiq lob Nxi yia zx'q naaiq teij sig kxvq pun meib hiuq. naaiq teij sig maiq kcvb Zwrtq Eei zyavb hog yia Jaab Daavg Buaj meib. Riaj meib xij kxvq, ‘yia Eei miub favj zruj naaiq teij sig. yia tiu taaib Zauj toj taaib Eei miub favj hatg naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib.’
48.9: weig yia kanb Eei mevb yia zuaq Jyenq maiq kcvb Qiaj Jiad. weig pun myenb Zev yia, yia Eyend Jyenq maiq Pai kwavg meib.
48.16: “taaib nitq fatq yia, mwavj naaiq teij waag. “yem yia kxvq taaub Rung yia maiq pivj Jyenq kxvq. naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib uaq zang yia yem uaq Eei.” ib zang zyruq Tinb huvb Paaiq yia Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei sivj livb taaib.
48.4: weig zu'g yia hiuq tu'q meib mnxmb hod, Jaav Eei Jaan Navq Lia'q, meib Eei pyxvb yaag Navq tovb si'q.
48.10: mavg maa'b! yia sinj meib mq paag maiq Navq sinj Eaanb. yia pun meib yem naang zivb ka'Euad Navq yem trub lrub zu'g seij.
48.22: zyruq kxvq, “x'q myenb zuvq maiq tu'q pcvb xn.”
48.12: “o yaa-Kopq, tovb yia heug taaib Eei i-saa-laa-en, mwavj yia maa'b! yia se zyruq. yia zruj kxn yaag zruj setq mweid.
48.15: yia, se yia kanb, kxvq liud a'q. zeid Eei, yia heug ninb. yia txb ninb taaib. ninb zruj Eei Jauq ninb xij zruj tu'q Zwrtq.
48.13: yia kanb lyepg Dau Eei kxnb Do'q, yia Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad Zxv luvb. yia heug ninb Bua, ninb Bua zyrug lomb Rxib Zwrtq taaib a'q.
48.1: “o yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun aa'b! mwavj naaiq teij waag maa'b! meib Bua kan i-saa-laa-en Eei Buaj heug, yaag zruj yu-Daa Eei zeib fun. meib Bua zyavq Jyenq zyruq Eei Buaj hruq waag, yaag heug Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb. mq paag meib Bua maiq zeid Hruq zivj, zruj tu'q hxpg Eei myenb.

34.3: zu'g taij taig Eei myenb xij zu'g Tx kwavg. ninb Bua Eei sei Wrnb Wrnb Eei zweij, Bov yaag maaib Ryaamq kua'q pwavq Revg.
34.8: weig zu'g zyruq maaib Jaauq win Eei Nxi, weig si-on Eei Jauq maaib Jaauq syrub Eei Havj.
34.9: e-Dom Eei Do'q xij Tiuq penj Dau Eei zuv. niab Buv yaag Tiuq penj huvb, zyavb nxm teib puv zyrug penj zia'g Jyenq Eei Daub yrub.
34.7: Yiab vovb Zauj vovb kruq txn, Zauj tomb vovb kruq xij Zauj ninb Bua yetg Fiag Kiv. ninb Bua Eei teib puv yaag maaib Ryaamq kua'q pwavq, Mei yaag saamj pia'g niab Buv Dxn Revg.
34.5: weig zu'g yia Eei Ru'g Daauq yem uaq luvb hopq peuq. mavg maa'b! naaiq Ru'g Daauq Fiag taaib tivg e-Dom Eei zwid, tovb yia tivg zyavj pun zu'g myetg uaq teij myenb.
34.16: meib Bua xij zu'g Byenq lxd zyruq Eei sru to'g naaiq teij waag. naaiq teij ka'naaiq maiq Zaa yetg taub fai yetg nxm. maiq maaib yetg Euvg maiq maaib ninb Eei txij. weig zu'g zyruq Eei Rwib Navq naaiq hatg, ninb Eei sivj livb yaag xij txb ninb Bua taaib zunq.
34.17: ninb Paaiq pun ninb Bua Eei pwrng. ninb kanb Eei puad lovg Laav Dx'g pun Gxi. ninb Bua yetg liud tu'q Ripg penj ninb Bua Eei pwrng. txig Jiaj txig yaag tu'q yem naaig.
34.14: teib puvb Waav Eei Yiab zxib xij pwavb Yiab Jub pen, Yiab yuvb yaag xij heug txig. luvb mwrnd zang Eei Yiab ka'naaiq tivb uaq, cvj weig kanb lxd txvj hitq.
34.4: luvb zavg Eei maang mwrtg xij huq mwrng, luvb yaag Fung Jyenq Navq Fung sru nx. Leij xij yem uaq luvb Dxtq Fiag Navq a'vung Mei Eei nxmb pyob yaag Navq vovb Exj pyruq yem uaq Dyavj zua'g, pyob nx.
34.2: weig zu'g zyruq Qiaj Jiad maang fivj, ninb nrud haig ninb Bua Eei yetg zuvq Junb pcv. ninb zuvq xij myetg Revg ninb Bua, xij Jiu pun ninb Bua zu'g taij taig.
34.6: zyruq Eei Ru'g Daauq maaib Ryaamq kua'q pwavq Revg, yaag maaib Mei kua'q pwavq. maaib pa'ki yuvb txn Zauj yuvb Eei Ryaamq, Zauj pa'ki yuvb kruq Eei Eutg zeiq Eei Mei. weig zu'g zyruq yem Bo-saa-laa maaib fovg hxg ziag Eei Jauq, yem e-Dom teig maaib taij taig Eei sig Lo Eei.
34.13: Fimq xij Byxvd pia'g ninb Eei huvb ting, Fimb Zru Fimb mwrng xij Byxvd ninb weib wrnq Eei txvj. naaiq nxm txvj xij penj Yiab Juq yem Eei txvj, penj nx'g kuq lov Eei pyauq.
34.12: yem naaig zruj Lo Eei myenb xij Zwrtq Buaj heug uaq teij Dau, “maiq maaib kua'q yem naaig.” ninb Eei yetg zuvq Jyen maiq penj haiq Euvg myenb.
34.15: nx'g kuq lov xij yem uaq zruj laud Daug Jauj, puag Jauj zunj txnb lunj, yaag pun txn yem zunq ninb Eei Daatg Diaq. tomb Jaavq yetg txij yetg txij Eei kapq zunq yem uaq.
34.11: mq paag nx'g kuq lov Zauj nx'g mlomb miu xij tu'q penj ninb Bua Eei pwrng. tomb Jaavq Zauj nx'g aa yaag xij yem naaig. Tinb huvb xij pcv Laav Jiaj kub vwaaig Dx'g pun uaq teij txvj lung. ninb xij lovg tivg za'g Eei Laav pun uaq teij txvj penj kwavg Waav Eei txvj.
34.1: o maang kua'q myenb aa'b! taaib fatq mwavj. o maang myenb aa'b! xij zu'g pcv mnxmb mwavj. Daub peib Zauj yem Daub peib Eei maang mwrtg, luvb Diaq Zauj yem luvb Diaq taaib Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq xij zu'g mwavj.
34.10: trud zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd zuvq maiq taig, trub syruj yetg liud faauj. txig Jiaj txig zyrug kwavg Jyenq Waavb Waav uaq. yetg liud maiq maaib myenb Jiaj.

2.18: yetg zuvq miub favj yaag xij zu'g paaig Revg.
2.8: ninb Bua Eei kua'q maaib miub favj pwavq Revg, ninb Bua kweig Fiag paaij ninb Bua kanb Eei puad zruj taaib Eei ka'naaiq, se ninb Bua kanb Eei puab Do'q zruj taaib Eei ka'naaiq.
2.3: Zamb fivj myenb xij taaib kxvq, “taaib maa'b! Bua lomb Rxib faauj zyruq Eei Bov, mivb Tauj yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, pun ninb Faauj Bua hiuq tu'q ninb Eei Jauq, yia Bua zyrug tu'q kan ninb Eei Jauq yavb. weig zu'g ninb Eei leib latg xij yem si-on Zwrtq,   zyruq Eei waag xij yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zwrtq mivb.”
2.21: zyruq Jiad taaib pun Dau tovd uaq zang, myenb xij pyauj pia'g la'pyeib Bcvb Kwrtq Zauj Bcvb vaamb, weig kamb Riaj haig zyruq, yaag pyauj Dutq ninb Favb laavg Eei haavb taaub.
2.14: weig yetg zuvq tomb zxv Zauj yetg zuvq Bovb Lav.
2.6: meib kwavg meib Eei pc'g fivj, yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun, weig zu'g ninb Bua Eei kua'q maaib tov puv taaib zruj faatq Eei Jauq pwavq Revg. ninb Bua Bruq kwaaj Navq fi-li-saa-tia myenb, yaag ei Jyenq kanb fivj myenb Eei leib fivj zruj.
2.2: Ga'haaq laai Eei Nxi, zavg zyruq Eei pyauq yem Eei Bov tu'q lyepg kaub Lav Jiaj zwavj Bov. zuvq xij Zeij kaub Lav Jiaj yetg zuvq Bovb aiq. maang kua'q myenb yaag xij Dutg Dutg Eei taaib.
2.20: Tauj uaq Nxi, myenb xij zx'q weig kanb zruj taaib paaij Eei Jyemb miub favj Zauj Eaanb miub favj, zxi pun lrub Zauj Ba'Bwi.
2.7: ninb Bua Eei kua'q maaib Jyem Eaanb pwavq Revg, ninb Bua Eei zinb zxib maiq maaib sruj mrug. ninb Bua Eei teib puv maaib maad pwavq Revg. ninb Bua Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia yaag saauq maiq hivb.
2.19: zyruq Jiad taaib pun Dau tovd uaq zang, myenb zyrug pyauj pia'g la'pyeib Bcvj Eei Kwrtq, yaag pia'g Dau Eei Kwrtq, weig kamb Riaj haig zyruq, yaag pyauj Dutq ninb Favb laavg Eei haavb taaub.
2.17: zruj mauj Eei myenb xij zu'g zatq Fiag aiq, Zevb Lo Eei myenb yaag xij zu'g paaig Myen. Tauj uaq Nxi Kuvj zyruq kanb xij tu'q myenb Taaib.
2.11: mziv Lav, zruj mauj Eei myenb xij zu'g zatq Fiag, Zevb Lo Eei myenb xij zu'g paaig Myen. Tauj uaq Nxi Kuvj zyruq kanb tu'q myenb Taaib.
2.5: o yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun aa'b! taaib maa'b! pun Bua kan Jyenq zyruq Eei Fav yavb.
2.9: taub taub myenb zyrug zu'g zatq Fiag, yaag zu'g Eaiq, zu'g paaig Myen. maiq tuvq kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwid.
2.16: weig Taan-sitq Eei Prub Pruj tomb Ravq, Zauj yetg zuvq Rweig haig Eei Ravq.
2.4: ninb xij syemq naaiq nxm kua'q Zauj uaq nxm kua'q ka'Euad Eei sig, yaag weig Zamb fivj myenb tunj sig. ninb Bua zyrug zx'q ninb Bua Eei Ru'g Daauq taaq penj laib pyeiq, ninb Bua Eei Zav taaq penj Pitq Dyavb Gwaab tweiq Eei limb vau. kua'q Zauj kua'q yetg liud maiq cvj Bx'q Jaaj, yem naaiq mivb maiq ho'g ling Bx'q Jaaj Eei Jauq a'q.
2.10: xij zu'g pia'g Bcvb Kwrtq, pivj Jyenq Daub Kwrtq ka'Euad, weig kamb Riaj haig zyruq Zauj ninb Favb laavg Eei haavb taaub.
2.22: leib Gxi, maiq tuvq Kauj paamb myenb. maiq kunq ninb Eei Ba'zxv maaib Qiaj Tauq, haib funj ninb penj haiq Euvg maaib lamb lovg?
2.12: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq tivg nxm Nxi weig pun yetg zuvq zruj mauj, Zev kanb Lo, Zauj yetg zuvq Taaib kanb Eei myenb. ninb Bua zuvq zu'g zatq Fiag aiq,
2.15: weig nxmb nxm Lav haig Eei laaub, Zauj nxmb nxm wrnq Eei zivb laatg.
2.13: weig le-Baa-nxn Lo Lav Eei yetg zuvq sij-Daa zovb Dyavj, Zauj Baa-saan Eei yetg zuvq Ba'ov zwei Dyavj,
2.1: naaiq se aa-mxtq Eei txn, i-saa-yaa, pwatg laaug yaavb Eei sig kxvq Tauj yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem.

36.18: “xij zu'g Buvb Jyenq, Riaj he-se-Ki-yaa kxvq, ‘zyruq zuvq xij Fruj yia Bua,’ uaq teij waag, meib Bua maiq tuvq mwavj, weig zu'g ninb Kuvj Duaq meib Bua Navq. maaib haiq nxm kua'q Eei haiq taub zyenb Fruj Jiaj kanb Eei kua'q pyauj Dutq atg-si-lia huvb Eei puab Diaq?
36.8: “+‘ib zang meib Zauj yia Eei zyruq, atg-si-lia Eei huvb, Druq kaaj. sij kxvq meib lxd tu'q myenb kauj keb nx, yia pun i Zin taub maad meib.
36.3: maaib kruj huvb ting Eei tomb Jyen, hin-Ki-yaa Eei txn, e-li-yaa-Kim, Zauj sepq-naa srub piuq, Zauj aa-saapg Eei txn, fiaq srub taan uaq taub yo-aa, Zwrtq mivb pwavb ninb.
36.21: mq paag pc'g fivj sekq Ria'g Eei, maiq tau yetg Jruj, weig zu'g huvb tiaj hatg ninb Bua, “maiq tuvq tau ninb.”
36.14: huvb tiaj Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘maiq tuvq mwavj he-se-Ki-yaa Duaq meib Bua. ninb maiq haib Fruj meib Bua.
36.6: mavg maa'b! meib Kauj i-yipq se Navq Kauj lua'g ti'g kwcvb Baaij zruj pyaab Byaag yavb Jauq nx, haib pa'q zu'g puad mun. i-yipq Eei faa-lo huvb yaag Navq naaiq nx zruj pun yetg zuvq pavg ninb Eei myenb.
36.2: atg-si-lia Eei huvb Paaiq taub ninb Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq Zauj Jyenq pcvb kwanb Zamq Eei yem laa-Kitq mivb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem, he-se-Ki-yaa huvb uaq. mivb Tauj uaq zang, ninb Bua tivb Jyenq yem uaq Jiaj puv Eei uamb tomb Eei zwrnj, mivb Eomg Dia Eei Zyavq uaq tiub Jauq.
36.20: sij kxvq naaiq teij kua'q Eei yetg zuvq zyenb maiq maaib haiq taub Fruj tu'q ninb Eei kua'q pyauj Dutq yia Eei puab Diaq, uaq Euvg zyruq fuvg haib Fruj ye-lu-saa-lem Zwrtq yia Eei puab Diaq?”
36.7: sij kxvq meib Buaj yia, ‘yia Bua Kauj zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb,’ he-se-Ki-yaa Zc'q kwavg uaq teij yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj Zauj ziab txvb se naaiq taub Tinb huvb Eei maiq zeid? he-se-Ki-yaa Zxg kxvq Buaj yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei myenb, ‘meib Bua xij zu'g yem naaiq nxm ziab txvb ziag.’+”
36.19: haa-matq Zauj aan-patg muvq Eei zyenb yem haaij? sej-faan-waa-im Eei zyenb yem haaij? ninb Bua Fruj saa-maa-lia leib Dutq yia Eei puab Diaq fai?
36.17: zuaq yia txb meib Bua mivb Tauj nxm teib puv Navq meib Bua kanb Eei teib puv nx. se maaib laavb zi'g, maaib syavb a'vung tiuq Eei teib puv, maaib Fuaq, maaib a'vung Wivj Eei teib puv.’
36.11: e-li-yaa-Kim Zauj sepq-naa Zauj yo-aa kxvq Buaj uaq taub tomb pcvb pyeiq, “Toq lovg aa-lam waag Zauj yia Bua, meib Eei pru, kxvq waag weig zu'g yia Bua pia'g Hruq Eei. maiq tuvq lovg yu-Daa myenb Eei waag pun yem zivb laatg kub vwaaig Eei pc'g fivj haib mwavj haid.”
36.5: meib Namq taaib kxvq Kuvb waag Navq meib haib maaib za'eij, maaib Qa'q Bx'q Jaaj fai? meib Kauj haiq taub Zivj taaib vcvg yia?
36.9: sij kxvq meib Kauj i-yipq Eei Bx'q Jaaj maab Zia Zauj keb maad pcv, meib fuvg haib Bx'q tu'q hivb yia Eei zyruq Eei yetg taub kaub faij Jiaj Eei pcvb pyeiq?
36.16: “maiq tuvq mwavj he-se-Ki-yaa Eei waag. atg-si-lia Eei huvb kxvq, ‘Zwrtq taaib lxd yia maa'b! Zauj yia kxvq hxpg. kx'g myenb zyrug tu'q Eang kx'g myenb Eei a'vung Mei Eei pyruq. kx'g myenb tu'q Eang kx'g myenb Eei vovb Exj Dyavj Eei pyruq yaag hopq kanb Eei syru uamb Kwrtq Eei uam.
36.4: maaib taub uaq teij tomb pcvb pyeiq kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “xij zu'g Buaj he-se-Ki-yaa, “+‘tomb ziub huvb, se atg-si-lia Eei huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “meib Kauj haiq Euvg?
36.10: maiq taan Bua'g naaiq. yia taaib Bx'q paaig naaiq nxm teib puv se maiq maaib zyruq Zauj yia taaib fai? zyruq kanb kxvq Buaj yia Zwrtq mivb myetg naaiq nxm teib puv maa'b!’+”
36.22: kruj huvb ting uaq taub Jyen hin-Ki-yaa Eei txn, e-li-yaa-Kim, Zauj sepq-naa srub piuq Zauj aa-saapg Eei txn, fiaq srub taan uaq taub yo-aa, zyrug petq kanb Eei lwib hruj cvj mivb Tauj he-se-Ki-yaa uaq, yaag txb uaq taub tomb pcvb pyeiq Eei waag mivb kxvq Buaj ninb.
36.12: mq paag uaq taub pcvb pyeiq kxvq, “yia Eei zyruq Paaiq yia taaib, Kuvj xij yia Zauj meib Eei zyruq Zauj meib Bua kanb kxvq fai? se lyemb zweid Jyenq zivb laatg uaq teij xij zu'g Zauj meib Bua Eang ninb Bua kanb Eei Gaiq, hopq ninb Bua kanb Eei yiad maiq zeid?”
36.15: maiq tuvq mwavj he-se-Ki-yaa Duaq meib Bua Kauj zyruq. ninb xij kxvq, “zyruq Dovg haaij zuvq xij Fruj yia Bua. ninb maiq zx'q naaiq nxm zivb Jiu pun yem atg-si-lia huvb Eei puab Diaq.”+’
36.13: uaq taub tomb pcvb pyeiq zyrug sruq Jiad taaib lovg yu-Daa myenb Eei waag heug Jyenq kxvq, “xij zu'g mwavj tomb ziub huvb, se atg-si-lia Eei huvb, Eei waag maa'b!
36.1: he-se-Ki-yaa zruj huvb zyepg feij Havj uaq Havj, atg-si-lia Eei huvb, sen-naa-Ke-lipq, taaib Bx'q yu-Daa maaib zivb laatg wrnq Eei yetg zuvq zivb yaag Zaavq tu'q mig a'q.

35.3: meib Bua xij zu'g pun mau Eei puad henq, yaag pun maiq maaib Qa'q Eei Zivb Bx'g sruq tu'q wrnq.
35.8: yem uaq xij maaib tiub tomb Jauq. uaq tiub Jauq myenb xij heug Zivb Revg Jauq. maaib wij Eei myenb maiq tu'q yavb uaq tiub Jauq, se Kuvj weig Tinb huvb Eei myenb yavb Navq, lyemb Vovj Eei myenb maiq haib yavb txvg.
35.4: xij zu'g Buaj taamq mapq Eei myenb, “xij zu'g henq, maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. meib Eei Tinb huvb xij taaib Jaauq win, ninb xij taaib tivg meib Bua Eei winb wavq Eei zwid, zuvq xij taaib Fruj meib Bua.”
35.2: zuvq xij Gxi Rweig Eei pyavb Zamq Eei yaag Fyenb yrub Eei heug Jyenq xnb lx'g Eei paauj Ruv. ninb xij tu'q Favb laavg Navq le-Baa-nxn Eei Favb laavg, yaag xij Rweig haig Navq Kaan-men Zauj saa-lon. ninb Bua tu'q pwatg zyruq Eei Favb laavg, yaag tu'q pwatg yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei haavb taaub.
35.6: uaq zang zauj Bai Eei myenb haib Tiuj Navq Faib, ka'naaib Vovj Eei Byetg haib Fyenb yrub Eei paauj Ruv. teib puvb Waav xij maaib uam pctq Zwrtq, teib puvb haand zuvq maaib Do'q lyrug Fiag.
35.9: yem naaig maiq maaib syenb, yaag maiq maaib Zyruq Eei Yiab zxib faauj. yem uaq maiq maaib haiq taub tu'q pwatg ninb Bua. Kuvj maaib tu'q zua'g Rwrnj Eei pc'g fivj haib yavb naaig Navq.
35.5: uaq zang mziv mcvb Eei myenb haib mavg tu'q pwatg, mnxmb Duv Eei myenb haib mwavj tu'q haid.
35.7: Jxm haig Eei saab zyru xij Tiuq penj uamb tomb, Bxvj Gaai Eei Dau xij Zwrtq uamb zivq. yem Yiab Juq pweij Eei txvj miaq xij Tiuq penj lua'g ti'g Zauj tavb Zoq miaq.
35.1: teib puvb Waav Zauj Daub Gaai xij a'Neiq. teib puvb haand xij Fyenb yrub Eei Gxi pyavb,
35.10: zyruq zua'g Eei myenb xij Rwrnj. ninb Bua xij paauj Jyenq Ruv pia'g si-on. ninb Bua zyrug maaib xnb lx'g Navq nxm huvb nivq pun ninb Bua yetg liud Dovj Jyenq. ninb Bua xij tu'q Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g Tauj taaub. yrub Raub Zauj Tauq Qiab Do'g Eei Jauq yaag Jiaj Revg.

24.18: haiq taub haid kamb Riaj Eei Qiaj zyrug pyauj, uaq taub zuvq xij Dxtq Kwrtq. haiq taub yem Kwrtq Exv Zwrtq, zuvq zu'g Kruj Lopq. luvb Eei kcvb Gxi, Dau Eei kxnb Do'q yaag zu'g Dang tovd.
24.8: Bx'q Rod Eei Qiaj sekq mig a'q. zruj Jxm Eei myenb yaag tivb mig a'q. Patq taanb paab xnb lx'g Eei Qiaj yaag sekq mig a'q.
24.3: Daub peib zyrug Kuvj Revg, zu'g kwavg Waav, weig zu'g zyruq kxvq naaiq teij waag.
24.21: Tauj uaq Nxi zyruq xij yem kub vwaaig luvb tivg yem kub vwaaig luvb maaib livg maaib Qa'q uaq teij Eei zwid. ninb yaag xij yem ka'Diaq Dau tivg yem ka'Diaq Dau zruj huvb uaq teij Eei zwid.
24.14: ninb Bua Zwrtq Qiaj Fyenb yrub Eei heug, yem fai puv Eei myenb heug Jyenq zunb zyruq Eei haavb taaub.
24.23: uaq zang Laaj zyrug Eaiq, Ba'Nxi zu'g paaig Myen weig zu'g nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq xij yem si-on Bov yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq, zyrug txv Jyenq zivb Eei myenb koj hing Zwrtq ninb Eei Favb laavg.
24.6: weig naaiq Daub peib zu'g zyruj, zu'g na'q Revg, yem naaiq Eei myenb zu'g weig ninb Bua zruj txvg Eei sig Daamb txv. weig naaiq luvb Diaq myenb zu'g puaq Qwi Revg, zevg Fiag Eei myenb zo'g Eei.
24.2: sai myenb Navq haiq nx, pc'g fivj yaag Navq uaq nx, zyruq Navq haiq nx, ninb Eei pru yaag Navq uaq nx, pyaub zyruq maag Navq haiq nx, ninb Eei msia'q pru yaag Navq uaq nx, maaig ka'naaiq Eei myenb Navq haiq nx, maaid ka'naaiq Eei myenb yaag Navq uaq nx, puvj zc'q Eei myenb Navq haiq nx, kaaq zc'q Eei myenb yaag Navq uaq nx, syru zc'q Eei myenb Navq haiq nx, Qyemj zc'q Eei myenb yaag Navq uaq nx.
24.20: Dau livb livb Kivb Kiv Navq tiuq Gwin Eei myenb, yaag Navq liub zu'g Ryaauj pwrng luvb luvb laib laib Eei. Dau Niab Niaq Eei zu'g tivg zwid zyrug Baav Fiag, yetg liud maiq haib Jiad taaib.
24.7: syavb a'vung tiuq zo'g Jyenq Fiag, a'vung Mei Eauj Gaai. naug Eitg Eei myenb Tauq tomb Qiaj.
24.19: Dau huq mwrng Revg, Dau Baaij Gxi, Dau zu'g Dang tovd seij haig.
24.17: o luvb Diaq myenb aa'b! maaib kamb Riaj Eei sig Zauj zcv myenb Eei Daub Kwrtq Zauj tomb Kruj zuaq Jyenq meib Bua.
24.11: yem Jaaib hxvg myenb heug laaij maiq maaib tiuq hopq. yetg zuvq Fyenb yrub namj mig a'q. paamb ken Eei xnb lx'g zitg Revg mig a'q.
24.5: yem luvb Diaq Eei myenb pun Daub peib maaib wij, weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq kan leib latg, yaag zruj txvg tob leid, cvj puvj Dxtq yetg liud lyepg Eei vcvg waag.
24.9: yem naaiq mivb maiq maaib myenb hopq a'vung tiuq paauj Ruv. weig hopq Eei myenb tiub Kuq im mig a'q.
24.16: yia Bua tu'q haid yem Jomg luvb Diaq maaib myenb paauj Ruv kxvq, “Zev zruj hxpg uaq taub zyruq.” mq paag yia kxvq, “yia Jaig Jyenq Fiag. yia Jaig Jyenq Fiag. yia zu'g Kruq a'q. Byenq Hruq Eei myenb Byenq Hruq. Byenq Hruq Eei myenb za'kevb! Byenq Hruq a'q.”
24.4: Daub peib Gaai yaag Eauj, luvb Diaq ziag, Eauj Jyenq Fiag. kaub tu'q myenb Taaib uaq teij yaag hei Jyenq Fiag.
24.10: zivb ka'Euad lung, penj zivb Waav. nxmb nxm pyauq kwrn Dipg Revg, maiq pun haiq taub haib pia'g.
24.22: ninb Bua zyrug zu'g kapq zunq Navq wrnj lob Mwavj Eei myenb. ninb Bua zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob ka'Euad, Ga'haaq Zamb Nxi ninb Bua zyrug zu'g tivg zwid.
24.12: zivb ka'Euad Kuvj Waavb Waav uaq. zivb kcvb zu'g Bx'q waaig Revg.
24.15: weig naaiq yem tov puv xij zu'g Taaib zyruq. yem Kxib Rru Eei myenb xij zu'g Zev zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb.
24.13: yem luvb Diaq maang myenb Bu'Dovj yaag Navq naaiq nx, Navq Pyu'q liud Eei ka'lanq Dyavj, Navq kc'q paag Eei a'vung pyruq maiq zevg Bu'ziaj nxm.
24.1: mavg maa'b! zyruq zuvq xij paaig waaig luvb Diaq, pun luvb Diaq Waav Revg. ninb xij nyruq Daub peib, yaag pun pc'g fivj Raanj Revg.

61.3: pun yem si-on Raub Eyemq Eei myenb maaib Fyenb yrub a'Neiq tiq saaiq, yaag maaib Zev Eei Ruv tiq Hruq Raub. myenb xij heug ninb Bua Navq zruj hxpg Eei Dyavj, tovb zyruq kanb zwavj taaib weig piuj mevb ninb Eei Favb laavg.
61.8: “weig zu'g yia, zyruq, Namq pcvb fim Eei Jauq. yia Rxv zruj za'g Zauj zruj txvg Eei sig. yia xij zyepg zua'q Eei winb pun yia Eei pc'g fivj, yaag xij Zauj ninb Bua lyepg Jiad yetg liud Eei vcvg waag.
61.4: ninb Bua xij Zeij Jiad lod! Nxi Baav waaig Eei ka'naaiq, cvj lyepg Jiad zinb Daavg kwavg Waav Eei txvj. ninb Bua xij zxg paaig waaig Eei zivb, se zxg ziaj txig kwavg Waav Eei zivb.
61.2: cvj zunb kxvq, zyruq Zeij en Eei Havb taaub Tauj a'q, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb Jaauq win Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj. ninb Paaiq yia xn yetg zuvq Raub Eyemq Eei myenb Eei Hruq,
61.6: mq paag myenb xij heug meib Bua zruj zyruq Eei sai myenb. myenb yaag xij kxvq meib Bua zruj pru fub suj yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb. meib Bua tu'q Eang Zamb kua'q Eei zinb zxib. weig tu'q ninb Bua Eei zinb zxib meib Bua zyrug a'Neiq haig.
61.9: yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj, myenb zyrug zia'q tu'q ninb Bua Eei hod txig zeib fun, yem maang fivj Bu'Dovj yaag zia'q tu'q ninb Bua Eei funb fa'q. ta'faanb pwatg ninb Bua Eei myenb zyrug zia'q tu'q ninb Bua se zyruq Zeij fu'q Eei pc'g fivj.”
61.11: weig zu'g Dau Navq haiq nx pun ka'naaiq Zwrtq, Wivj ka'Euad Eei Eim Navq haiq nx ku'g Eaab, zyruq Tinb huvb xij Navq uaq nx pun zruj hxpg Eei Jauq Zauj Zev Tinb huvb Eei waag txv Jyenq maang fivj Zwrtq taaib.
61.5: kanb fivj myenb xij taaib kruj meib Bua Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb. kanb kua'q myenb xij zruj meib Bua Eei Deig yaag kruj meib Bua Eei a'vung Wivj.
61.7: meib Bua zu'g Eaiq, taauj Rwrnj meib Bua xij tu'q lovj i kruq. meib Bua zu'g paaig Myen, taauj Rwrnj meib Bua a'Neiq meib Bua tu'q Ripg Eei pwrng. Navq naaig meib Bua yem meib Bua Eei teib puv tu'q Ripg suvb kruq penj meib Bua Eei pwrng, yaag tu'q yetg liud Fyenb yrub.
61.1: zyruq Tinb huvb Eei sivj livb Zauj yia yem, weig zu'g zyruq lovg yrub xn yia taaib zunb Kuq fyenj Buaj myenb Jomg myenb. ninb Paaiq yia taaib zxg Hruq mun Eei myenb lovj, zunb Buaj zu'g Zaavq Eei myenb ninb Bua xij tu'q puvj Gxi, zu'g wrnj Eei myenb yaag xij tu'q Zwrtq lob,
61.10: yia weig zyruq za'kevb! Fyenb yrub. yia Eei Hruq Kauj yia Eei Tinb huvb maaib xnb lx'g, weig zu'g ninb lovg Fruj en zruj lwi pun yia zu'q, lovg zruj hxpg Eei Jauq penj tomb lwib Daauq pun yia pwij Jyenq, Navq syavb laavb Dovj nxm Rweig Eei nivq zxv Jyenq, yaag Navq syavb Bwavd lovg syrub setq zxv sin.

7.18: uaq Nxi zyruq xij fiuq muvd yem i-yipq Eei Daaib Ewrnb Eei txvj, yaag fiuq mweid yem atg-si-lia teib puv Daij taaib.
7.8: weig zu'g si-lia Eei pyeiq se Daa-matq-katg zivb. Daa-matq-katg Eei pyeiq se le-sin huvb. yem lua'g zyepg Mmd Havj ka'Euad, e-faa-im xij zu'g paaig, maiq penj yetg fivj a'q.
7.3: zyruq kxvq Buaj i-saa-yaa, “meib Zauj meib Eei txn, se-aan-yaa-supq, mivb pwavb aa-hatg huvb. ninb yem uaq Jiaj puv Eei uamb tomb Eei zwrnj Jomg Eei txvj, Eomg Dia Eei Zyavq uaq tiub Jauq.
7.21: Tauj uaq Nxi, yetg taub myenb xij yuvd yetg taub vovb Eeid Zauj i taub pa'ki yuvb.
7.14: weig naaiq zyruq kanb xij pun nxm Javb hog. maaib taub maiq pweij Jiaj txn Eei sia'q, xij maaib nxm sin, yuvd tu'q taub txn, cvj Tevj ninb Zwrtq Buaj heug, i-maa-nu-en.
7.23: Tauj uaq Nxi, ta'faanb maaib Jiaj yetg Zin zuvb a'vung Mei, zig tu'q siag Jxib Eaanb Eei Dau, xij Zwrtq penj Fimb Zru Fimb mwrng Eei lomg.
7.6: “Bua lomb Rxib faauj mivb Bx'q yu-Daa, hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj. Bua Zaavq teib puv penj Bua kanb Eei, cvj yem naaig Bu'Dovj lyepg Taa-Be-en Eei txn zruj huvb.”
7.2: maaib myenb Buaj Daa-witq Eei zeib fun, “si-lia Zauj e-faa-im tovb Hruq kapq Qa'q.” aa-hatg huvb Eei Hruq Zauj pc'g fivj Eei Hruq zyrug tovd Revg, Navq yem lomg Eei Dyavj zu'g Ryaauj pwrng tovd nx.
7.20: uaq Nxi zyruq xij lovg yem uaq vaang zi'g Daaib, se yem atg-si-lia Eei huvb Zivq taaib Eei Teib to Pyenj, Teij meib Bua Eei mGxvq Zauj zauj Eei pyei. lyemb meib Bua Eei syaam yaag Teij Revg.
7.24: myenb xij txb Jyenq Jwavb zinj Zauj fxv mivb uaq, weig zu'g Kuvj maaib Fimb Zru Fimb mwrng pwavq Revg.
7.7: mq paag zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘naaiq teij sig zuvq maiq Zwrtq, zuvq maiq haib Navq naaig,
7.19: ninb Bua yetg zuvq zyrug Daij taaib yem hxvb kwei hxvb Qaamq, yem la'pyeib vaamb ka'Euad, yaag pyxmb Jyenq zuvb zuvb Fimq Zauj yetg zuvq miab Zyavq.
7.17: zyruq xij pun meib Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj Zauj meib Eei tia Eei trub zov zu'g ze'g naang Eei Nxib Eia'g. maiq maaib Jiaj Nxib Eia'g Dovg naaig Kruq yem e-faa-im leib Gxi yu-Daa Tauj ib zang. se atg-si-lia Eei huvb xij taaib.”
7.11: “meib xij zu'g Toq zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, pun nxm Javb hog, maiq kunq yem Do Tauj yemb ken fai Lav Tauj kub vwaaig luvb.”
7.5: weig zu'g si-lia Zauj e-faa-im, cvj Zauj le-maa-li-yaa Eei txn taaq x'q Eei za'eij hxig meib. ninb Bua kxvq,
7.9: e-faa-im Eei pyeiq se saa-maa-lia zivb, saa-maa-lia Eei pyeiq se le-maa-li-yaa Eei txn. mq paag sij kxvq meib Bua maiq syenj tivg, meib Bua zuvq maiq tu'q lyepg wrnq.’+”
7.16: weig zu'g naaiq taub fu'Jweiq maiq kcvb hiuq tu'q vcvg x'q Eei, kinq lovj Eei, tovb meib ib zang kamb Riaj uaq teij i taub huvb Eei teib puv zuvq zu'g penj Daub Waav.
7.4: xij zu'g Buaj ninb, ‘meib xij zu'g faij fim, maiq tuvq Hruq Waav yaag maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. maiq tuvq Hruq namj laaij naaiq teij i Ganj Zwrtq syruj Eei zaavb neij, se weig le-sin Zauj si-lia cvj Zauj le-maa-li-yaa Eei txn Qiaj Jiad! haig.
7.22: weig zu'g tu'q Exj Zamq, ninb tu'q Eang Exb Mei. yem teib puv zevg Fiag Eei taub taub myenb tu'q Eang Exb Mei Zauj mweib txvb.
7.12: mq paag aa-hatg kxvq, “yia maiq Toq a'q. yia yaag maiq seij zyruq.”
7.15: naaiq taub fu'Jweiq Lo taaib, haib tivg haiq Euvg lovj haiq Euvg Zyruq Eei zyavb hog, ninb tu'q Eang vovb Exb Mei Zauj mweib txvb.
7.13: i-saa-yaa kxvq, “Daa-witq Eei zeib fun aa'b! mwavj maa'b! meib zruj pun myenb Eei nxig Revg se maiq kcvb kauj fai? meib Zxg xij zruj pun yia Eei Tinb huvb Eei nxig Revg?
7.1: utg-si-yaa Eei fun, yo-Taam Eei txn, aa-hatg, zruj yu-Daa Eei huvb Eei zyavb hog, si-lia huvb, le-sin, Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, le-maa-li-yaa Eei txn, pe-kaa, kapq txig taaib Bx'q ye-lu-saa-lem, mq paag ninb Bua Bx'q maiq hivb.
7.25: zinb Daavg lovg Pxv wetq Eei nxmb nxm Bov meib zuvq maiq mivb naaig a'q, weig zu'g kamb Riaj Fimb Zru Fimb mwrng. Kuvj penj txvj puvj vovb yaag pun pa'ki yuvb Zaaiq Eei txvj.

17.3: e-faa-im weib wrnq Eei txvj maiq maaib a'q. Daa-matq-katg Eei huvb livg xij Jiaj mig a'q. zevg Fiag Eei si-lia myenb yaag Navq i-saa-laa-en Eei Favb laavg.” nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq.
17.8: ninb Bua zuvq maiq mavg ninb Bua Eei ziab txvb, se ninb Bua Eei puad Zeij taaib Eei ka'naaiq. ninb Bua maiq mavg ninb Bua Eei puab Do'q zruj taaib Eei ka'naaiq, maiq kunq aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj fai puaq huv tiab.
17.9: Tauj uaq Nxi, ninb Bua wrnq haig Eei zivb, tovb ninb Bua laaij i-saa-laa-en myenb zu'g kwavg Waav zyrug penj lomb Byx'g Zauj Dyavb txnb fomq Eei txvj penj Daub Waav.
17.7: Tauj uaq Nxi myenb zyrug maaib lamb Namq zeij ninb Bua taaib uaq taub. ninb Bua Eei mziv xij mavg Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb.
17.5: Tauj uaq zang xij zu'g Navq kaatq Byaub myenb kaatq zyavb Jyenq Eei Byaub, ninb Eei puad kaatq Byaub txq. yaag xij zu'g Navq taub myenb yem le-faa-im hxvd Raud Dxtq Fiag Eei Byaub txq.
17.14: luvb maanb Mwavj, lyemb zeib Zwrtq kamb Riaj! haig Eei sig. maiq kcvb Tauj luvb Dxm, maiq maaib ninb Bua a'q. naaiq se luq yia Bua uaq teij tu'q Eei pwrng, se Zaavq yia Bua Eei ka'naaiq uaq teij Eei pwrng.
17.4: “Tauj uaq Nxi yaa-Kopq Eei Favb laavg zyrug zitg mig a'q. ninb Jung Eei sin yaag xij zu'g Jaig Jyenq Fiag.
17.2: aa-lo-e teig Eei ziaj nxm zivb xij penj Daub Waav, penj puvj pa'ki yuvb Zauj yuvb Eei txvj. ninb Bua tu'q yem naaig pweij, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj.
17.6: mq paag yem naaig Zxg maaib teij zevg Fiag Eei, Navq myenb Pyu'q ka'lanq Dyavj, yem kub vwaaig Dyavb tweiq Eei Gwaab zevg i pua nxm pyruq, yem zyavb pyruq kitq Eei Gwaab yaag zevg pyei pyaa nxm.” naaiq se zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, kxvq Eei waag.
17.13: maiq kunq Zamb fivj Navq Kxiq Eei uam Jiad laavg seij, zob zod Eei Bwi, Tinb huvb hatg ninb Bua, ninb Bua kob ko Eei pyauj mig a'q. ninb Bua zu'g zung Navq yem Bov Eei Bia'g Zru zu'g Ryaauj pwrng nx, yaag Navq niab Buv zu'g Ryaaub zung nyruq.
17.12: oq, ziaj nxm kua'q Eei myenb Bwi Zob Zob Eei, Navq Kxiq seij haig Eei uam Bwi zob zod nx. oq, myenb Zamq Bwi Zob Zob Eei, Navq seij haig Eei tomb uam zob zod Eei Bwi.
17.11: maiq kunq meib zwavj uaq Nxi meib pun ninb Zwrtq, zwavj uaq Dxm meib aapq Gxi pyavb, mq paag zu'g Raub Kruq, zu'g mun, zxg maiq lovj Eei Nxi, syru taaib Eei ka'naaiq zyav naaig maiq maaib a'q.
17.1: naaiq se kxvq Tauj Daa-matq-katg Eei waag, “mavg maa'b! yem naaiq mivb Daa-matq-katg maiq penj zivb a'q, mq paag penj yetg Dwi ka'naaib Baav.
17.10: weig zu'g meib Bua la'Ku'q Fruj meib Bua uaq taub Tinb huvb. meib Bua maiq Javj meib Bua Daaub Kauj Eei la'pyeiq. weig naaiq meib Bua zwavj ka'naaib zwavj Rweig, zruj Wivj weig zavg kanb fivj Eei zyenb.

58.3: ninb Bua kxvq, ‘yia Bua zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg. meib weig haiq tiug maiq mavg? yia Bua weig haiq tiug Eyemg kanb zruj faij, meib yaag Navq maiq pwatg nx.’ “mavg maa'b! meib zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg Eei Nxi, meib sweib kanb Eei Hruq zruj Navq, yaag zeij meib Eei yetg zuvq kovb myenb.
58.8: Navq naaig meib Eei Fav zyrug Zwrtq Navq luvb Dxm Ryruq Eei Fav. meib yaag tu'q syepg syepq Eei zxg lovj. meib zruj hxpg Eei Jauq xij yem meib Eei uaq Daavg mcvj.   zyruq Eei Favb laavg yaag xij yem meib Ga'haaq Gaav peu Jyenq meib.
58.9: uaq zang meib heug Jyenq Toq, zyruq xij tau. meib heug Jyenq Toq Tevj, ninb zyrug kxvq, ‘yia yem naaiq.’ “sij kxvq meib kwavg maiq zeij myenb, maiq lovg puab Do'q nu'q myenb, yaag kwavg maiq kxvq x'q Eei Jauq,
58.7: xij zu'g zx'q meib Eei Eang hopq pun Gxi Hruq sia Eei myenb, txb maiq maaib pyauq Eei myenb Jomg myenb pia'g meib Eei pyauq. pwatg myenb Fav sin, xij zu'g pun lwib hruj ninb Bua zu'q, yaag maiq tuvq nyruq Myen maiq mavg kanb Eei Zyenb Ze'q.
58.5: Navq naaig zei se yia kinq taaib pun myenb lovg uaq nxm Nxi zatq kanb zruj faij Navq fai? se myenb Do'q mGxvq Navq Brub Betq, yaag lovg la'maab Diab Zru Zauj saaiq timg Jyenq Dau pweij fai? naaiq se meib heug Eang zei, penj zyruq a'Neiq Eei Nxi fai?
58.14: meib zyrug Kauj zyruq a'Neiq. kxmj luvb Diaq Eei myenb zyrug Taaib meib. yia yaag xij pun meib Eei ovb Taaij, yaa-Kopq, Ripg Eei pwrng yuvd meib.” naaiq se zyruq kanb Eei Rwib kxvq.
58.4: mavg maa'b! meib zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg weig Rcv Jaaj Bx'q Jaaj, lovg x'q Eei puab Jwrnb Rwei myenb. meib zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg Navq ib Nxi, maiq tuvq Namq yem Lav Eei txvj mwavj tu'q haid meib Eei Qiaj.
58.2: ninb Bua Nxib Nxi lxd yia, a'Neiq mevb pc'g yia Eei Jauq. Navq yetg kua'q zruj hxpg Eei myenb, maiq kwavg ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei leid nx. ninb Bua Toq yia pcvb fim Eei syemq. ninb Bua a'Neiq yem nitq fatq Tinb huvb.
58.6: “yia kinq zei maiq Eang se Navq naaiq maiq zeid? se xij zu'g Zutq Dutq Ywav x'q Eei limg, Jaiq Gxi Dob Dyavb kaad Eei Laav. xij zu'g puvj Gxi zu'g zeij Eei myenb yaag wrtq nxmb nxm Dyavb kaad nauq.
58.13: “sij kxvq meib kan lovj tivb kov Nxi Eei leid, se yem yia Eei Zivb Revg Nxi maiq sweib kanb Eei Hruq zruj, sij kxvq heug tivb kov Nxi penj a'Neiq Eei Nxi, yaag Taaib zyruq Eei Zivb Revg Nxi, sij kxvq meib Taaib, maiq ei kanb Eei Jauq yavb, fai sweib kanb Eei Hruq zruj fai kxvq maiq lamb lovg Eei waag,
58.12: meib xij syavb Zeij Jiad Baav mivb laub Eei txvj, yaag xij lyepg Jiad ziaj txig myenb Eei kxnb Do'q. meib zyrug tu'q Buaj heug, syavb Zeij Jiad zivb laatg Eei myenb Zauj syavb Zeij Jiad pyaub Baav Eei myenb.
58.11: zyruq yaag xij yetg liud txb Jauq meib, pun meib tu'q lovj Eei ka'naaiq pwavq Hruq, pun meib Eei Buvq henq. meib zuvq xij Navq Eyemd Eei Wivj, yaag Navq yetg liud maiq Gaai Eei uamb zivq.
58.1: “xij zu'g heug Bwi, maiq tuvq Eyend Jyenq. pun Qiaj Bwi Navq pyomq Jxv. zunb Buaj yia Eei pc'g fivj hiuq tu'q ninb Bua zruj txvg Eei sig, Buaj yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun ninb Bua paamd Eei zwid.
58.10: sij kxvq meib zx'q Eang hopq pun Hruq sia Eei myenb, pun zu'g Kruq Eei myenb tu'q pwavq eij, meib Eei Fav zyrug yem Mwavj Eei txvj Zwrtq taaib, meib yem Mwavj zyrug Tiuq penj luvb aanj zang Eei Fav.

49.18: Zau Myen mavg Wiv Rwrnj Eei txvj, ninb Bua yetg zuvq kapq zunq taaib lxd meib.”   zyruq kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg lcvd waag kxvq, meib xij tu'q meib Eei pc'g fivj penj meib Eei Favb laavg, Navq syavb Bwavd a'Neiq zxv ninb Eei syrub setq.
49.8: zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “yia Zeij en Eei zyavb hog yia tau meib. yem tu'q Fruj Eei Nxi yia Tevj meib. yia xij kruj meib yaag lovg meib Zauj maang fivj lyepg vcvg waag. weig pun teib puv Rwrnj taaib Navq lod uaq nx, cvj Paaiq pun myenb Ripg kwavg Waav Eei Dau.
49.3: ninb kxvq Buaj yia, “meib zruj yia Eei pru, i-saa-laa-en. yia weig meib zuvq xij tu'q myenb Taaib.”
49.21: uaq zang meib xij yem Hruq kxvq, ‘haiq taub Tevj yia yuvd naaiq teij myenb? yia zu'g kwavg yia Eei fu'Jweiq yaag maiq maaib scvb yuvd, yia zu'g kwaatq mivb yaag zu'g zung. haiq taub txb naaiq teij myenb Lo taaib? mavg maa'b! yia zu'g kwavg pun yia kanb yem Navq, mq paag naaiq teij myenb yem haaij taaib?’+”
49.14: mq paag si-on myenb kxvq, “zyruq kwavg yia Bua mig a'q. yia Bua Eei zyruq la'Ku'q yia Bua.”
49.23: zwavj huvb tiaj xij Navq penj meib Eei tia. ninb Bua Eei huvb maag xij Navq meib Eei maa Exj. ninb Bua xij yem meib Eei Ra'Myen kweig Fiag Myen Tauj Dau, Biag meib Eei zauj Eei niab Buv. meib zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq, zuaq Jyenq yia uaq teij maiq zu'g paaig Myen.”
49.6: ninb kxvq, “meib zruj yia Eei pru weig txb yaa-Kopq Eei fivb fivj myenb Rwrnj Navq lod uaq nx, weig txb zevg Fiag Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb Rwrnj taaib, naaiq pwatg penj faib fiuq sig. yia yaag xij pun meib zruj Fav ziuj maang kua'q myenb, weig pun meib Eei Fruj en mivb Jomg luvb Diaq.”
49.2: ninb pun yia Eei Rwib Navq Ru'g Daauq laig, zx'q yia pivj Jyenq ninb Eei puad Eei tovb linb ka'Diaq. ninb pun yia Navq Raatq taaib yrug! yrug Eei fxv, zx'q yia pivj Jyenq ninb Eei fxvb Dovb ka'Euad.
49.20: yem meib Raub Eyemq Eei zyavb hog Zwrtq seij Eei naamb Erud, xij kxvq pun meib haid, ‘naaiq nxm txvj weig yia Bua hepg haig. Toq pun txvj kaub Javq teij yia Bua yem.’
49.24: myenb henq myenb Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq, haiq taub haib zx'q Rwrnj. zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb, haiq taub haib Fruj leib Dutq x'q myenb Eei puab Diaq?
49.7: zyruq, tovb zua'g i-saa-laa-en myenb yaag penj ninb Bua Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb uaq taub, Navq naaiq nx kxvq Buaj zu'g myenb mavg Piaj, zu'g pwrnb kua'q myenb yruj, yaag Tevj zruj Lo Eei myenb Eei pru uaq taub. “huvb tiaj tu'q pwatg meib zyrug sruq Jiad taaib. zruj Lo Eei myenb pwatg zyrug paaij, weig zyepg zua'q Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb, tovb kinq meib taaib uaq taub.”
49.19: “maiq kunq meib zu'g kwavg Waav, penj paaig waaig, zu'g myetg Eei txvj, ib zang meib hepg haig, maiq kauj meib Eei pc'g fivj yem. na'q meib uaq teij zuvq xij leib meib ko.
49.17: Zeij meib uaq teij hivb Jiaj xij myetg meib uaq teij. paaig waaig meib uaq teij xij leib Gxi meib.
49.11: yia xij pun yia Eei zwavj Bov penj Jauq, yia Eei tomb Jauq yaag xij lyepg Jiad.
49.5: zyruq kxvq, yia maiq kcvb Zwrtq seij uaq zang   zyruq Paaiq yia zruj ninb Eei pru, weig txb yaa-Kopq Rwrnj taaib lxd ninb, pun i-saa-laa-en taaib kapq zunq ninb uaq. weig zu'g ziuj zyruq mavg ninb Taaib yia. yia Eei Tinb huvb penj yia Eei Qa'q.
49.9: yia xij Buaj zu'g wrnj Eei myenb, ‘Zwrtq taaib maa'b!’ cvj kxvq Buaj yem Mwavj Eei myenb, ‘Zwrtq taaib yem Fav maa'b!’ “ninb Bua yem Jauq zavg tu'q Eang, tu'q hopq. yetg zuvq Fav Eei Bovb Lav xij penj ninb Bua lxd Eang Eei txvj.
49.16: mavg maa'b! yia zx'q meib Eei Buaj fiaq Jyenq yia Eei puab zaavb x. meib Eei zivb laatg zanb zang yem yia Eei Ra'Myen.
49.4: mq paag yia kxvq, “yia laaub lwig yaag zruj maiq Zwrtq haiq Euvg. yia pc'g pc'g Dxtq Qa'q yaag maiq lamb lovg. mq paag yia hxpg zu'g tu'q Eei pwrng yem zyruq uaq. yia Eei zivb Eeig yaag Zauj yia Eei Tinb huvb yem.”
49.10: ninb Bua maiq vxg yaag maiq Gaatq, Ryaaub Jxm Zauj Eutg to'g maiq hxig ninb Bua, weig zu'g Kxb lyenb ninb Bua uaq taub xij txb ninb Bua, yend ninb Bua kan maaib uamb zivq Eei txvj.
49.22: zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia xij yaapq puad heug maang kua'q myenb, yaag Zia keb heug maang fivj, ninb Bua zyrug Lxpq Jyenq meib Eei txn Bua, yaag Eiaj Jyenq meib Eei sia'q Rwrnj.
49.12: mavg maa'b! yia Eei pc'g fivj xij yem ko Eei teib puv taaib. maaib teij xij yem pa'q puv Zauj fai puv taaib. maaib teij xij yem si-nim teib puv taaib.”
49.15: “maa haib la'Ku'q hopq ninb Eei Exj Eei kub vwaad fai maiq Kxb lyenb ninb kanb yuvd Eei fu'Jweiq fai? maiq kunq ninb haib la'Ku'q, yia maiq la'Ku'q meib.
49.13: o luvb aag, Fyenb yrub Eei paauj Ruv. o Dau aag, xij zu'g xnb lx'g. o zwavj Bov aag, Fyenb yrub Eei paauj Ruv maa'b! weig zu'g zyruq xn ninb Eei pc'g fivj Eei Hruq, yaag Kxb lyenb ninb Eei zu'g Kruq Eei myenb.
49.1: o Kxib Rru Eei myenb aa'b! mwavj yia maa'b! yem ko Eei zwavj fivj, xij zu'g mwavj lovj. yia maiq kcvb Zwrtq seij, zyruq heug yia. yia yem maa Eei ka'sia uaq zang, ninb Tevj yia Zwrtq Buaj.
49.26: yia xij pun zeij meib Bua uaq teij Eang ninb Bua kanb Eei xq. ninb Bua yaag xij zu'g hopq kanb Eei Ryaamq Gwin mivb Navq hopq tiuq nx. uaq zang maang myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q, yia se zyruq, meib Bua Eei Fruj zyruq, zua'g meib uaq taub, se yaa-Kopq henq haig Eei Tinb huvb.”
49.25: mq paag zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “maiq kunq myenb henq myenb Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq tu'q Zaavq Rwrnj, x'q myenb kwaatq mivb Eei myenb yaag tu'q Fruj, haiq taub Zauj meib txib tekg, yia zyrug Zauj uaq taub txib tekg. yia yaag xij Fruj meib Eei naamb Erud.

11.3: ninb zuvq xij pwavq Hruq Taaib zyruq. ninb maiq zeid ziuj kanb Eei mziv pwatg Eei syemq, yaag maiq zeid ziuj ninb Eei mnxmb haid Eei tunj sig.
11.8: Zxg hopq Exj Eei kub vwaad xij yem naavb Jia'q Eei Kwrtg Daavg Eyenj, kwavg Exj Eei kub vwaad xij lom pia'g naavb to'g Eei Kwrtq.
11.9: ta'faanb yem yia Eei Zivb Revg Bov Eei txvj, naaiq teij ka'naaiq maiq hxig, maiq zruj myetg. weig zu'g hiuq zyruq Eei myenb pwavq Revg luvb Diaq, Navq uam pwavq Kxiq nx.
11.7: vovb Eeid zuvq Zauj Jyepq Jwavg Eang, ninb Bua Eei txn Jwavg pweij, syenb yaag xij Eang Byaub Gaauq Navq vovb nx.
11.5: ninb xij lovg pcvb fim Eei Jauq txvj hrub Laav, yaag lovg zyepg zua'q Eei Jauq zruj la'sin sai Jyenq.
11.16: maaib tiub tomb Jauq pun ninb Eei pc'g fivj zevg Fiag Eei myenb yem atg-si-lia Rwrnj, Navq zinb Daavg i-saa-laa-en myenb yem i-yipq teib puv Rwrnj Eei Jauq nx.
11.14: ninb Bua xij Fiag mivb Bx'q yem fai puv Eei fi-li-saa-tia myenb. ninb Bua lomb Rxib mivb luq yem tov puv Eei myenb. ninb Bua xij mivb Zaavq e-Dom Zauj mo-apg. am-mon myenb yaag zu'g yem ninb Bua Eei puab Diaq.
11.4: ninb xij lovg hxpg Eei Jauq syemq myenb Jomg myenb, yaag pcvb fim Eei tunj yem luvb Diaq zu'g zatq Fiag Eei myenb. ninb xij Fiag livg tivg luvb Diaq myenb Eei zwid, yaag taij x'q myenb.
11.2: zyruq Eei sivj livb xij yem ninb, sivj livb pun ninb maaib Zovb mevb Zauj wrnb zaav, sivj livb pun ninb haib Zaavb laavb yaag maaib tomb Qa'q, sivj livb pun ninb haib mevb pc'g yaag pun ninb Taaib zyruq.
11.6: Yiab Juq zyrug Zauj pa'ki yuvb txn yem, Da'maaub Beuj yaag Zauj yuvb txn pweij, vovb txn Zauj syenb lunj Jwavg yem Jwavg Eang, fu'Jweib faij yaag xij txb ninb Bua.
11.13: e-faa-im mweig Jia'q Eei sig zyrug Jiaj mig a'q, hxig yu-Daa Eei myenb yaag zu'g Pai kwavg. e-faa-im zyrug maiq mweig Jia'q yu-Daa, yu-Daa yaag maiq hxig e-faa-im a'q.
11.12: ninb xij lyepg Jiad tomb keb pun maang kua'q myenb, cvj txb i-saa-laa-en zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb taaib zunq. ninb xij yem Daub peib Eei pyei puv luvb kxn, pun zu'g yem Raanj Eei yu-Daa myenb kapq zunq.
11.15: zyruq yaag xij pun i-yipq Eei Kxib Zovj Gaai. ninb xij Wavj puad pun Ryaaub Jxm pwrng Jiaj yu-fe-titg Daaib kub vwaaig. Daaib zyrug pun Gxi penj siag tiub Do'q, pun myenb haib Jiaj mivb, zauj yaag maiq Dxn.
11.11: Tauj uaq Nxi, zyruq xij suv ta'Eeig Rung puad weig syru ninb zevg Fiag Eei pc'g fivj, se yem atg-si-lia, i-yipq, patg-lotq, e-Ti-o-pia, e-laam, Baa-Bi-lon, haa-matq Zauj Kxib Rru Eei myenb.
11.1: Jyetg-si Eei kxn xij Zwrtq tiub Zunj, ninb Eei Ruvb xij Zwrtq Gwaaq Gwaab yaag zyavb pyruq.
11.10: Tauj uaq Nxi, maaib taub Jyetg-si Eei zeib fun xij lyepg Jiad zruj maang fivj Eei Javb hog, maang kua'q myenb zyrug taaib lxd ninb. ninb hitq Eei txvj maaib Favb laavg haig.

33.18: meib Bua Eei Hruq zyrug feib favq zinb Daavg Zwrtq taaib kamb Riaj haig Eei sig. kanb zyrug naaig kanb, “Tevj saauq uaq taub yem haaij? Ryav Rrub zinb uaq taub yem haaij? saauq laaub uaq taub yem haaij?”
33.8: tomb Jauq Waavb Waav uaq, Jiaj mivb Jiaj taaib Eei myenb maiq yavb. lyepg Jiad Eei vcvg waag Dxtq mig a'q, myenb mavg Piaj zxvb zevj myenb, yaag maiq Taaib haiq taub.
33.3: haid Funb Funb Eei Qiaj Bwi, maang fivj myenb zyrug pyauj. meib Jiad taaib uaq zang, maang kua'q myenb Raanj Revg.
33.21: yem uaq zyruq xij weig yia Bua hing ninb Eei Favb laavg, yem uaq maaib Do'q maaib Daaib Javq Eei txvj. lovg zeib Rcv Eei Ravq maiq kan uaq teij uam, yaag maiq maaib Rweig Eei tomb Ravq Jiaj.
33.14: yem si-on Eei zwib myenb kamb Riaj haig. maiq kan Tinb huvb Eei myenb sin zinj Jyenq. “yem yia Bua Bu'Dovj, haiq taub haib Zauj puaq Qwi Eei trud yem? yem yia Bua Bu'Dovj, haiq taub haib Zauj yetg liud zia'g Eei trud yem?”
33.23: meib Bua Zxv Eei Laav Danb mig a'q. Zxv Laav Eei Dyrub zyrug maiq haib wrnq. Diab Bwavb yaag Zxv maiq tu'q Javq. uaq zang ninb Bua zyrug pun Gxi Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq Zamq Eei. lyemb zauj Bai Eei myenb yaag tu'q Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq.
33.6: yem meib Eei seij zeiq ninb xij lyepg kxnb Do'q wrnq, maaib puvb zua'g Eei Fruj en Zauj Zovb mevb Zauj wrnb zaav. ninb Taaib zyruq penj ninb Jaaij haig Eei zinb zxib.
33.2: o zyruq aag, Toq Kxb lyenb yia Bua. yia Bua zuaq Jyenq meib. Toq Dxmb Dxm zruj yia Bua Eei Qa'q. yia Bua zu'g Kruq Eei zyavb hog, Toq zruj yia Bua Eei Fruj en.
33.20: mavg si-on zivb maa'b! se yia Bua tivg taaib Jiaj zipq Eei zivb. meib Bua Eei mziv xij tu'q pwatg ye-lu-saa-lem, se pcvb xn yem Eei txvj, maiq zu'g swiq Eei Dopg liub. Zxv Dopg liub Eei tovg yetg liud maiq pcv Zwrtq, ninb Eei yetg tiub Laav yaag maiq tavj.
33.24: yem si-on zivb Eei myenb maiq maaib haiq taub kxvq, “yia putq pcvg.” yem uaq Eei pc'g fivj Eei zwid yaag tu'q kwavg liud a'q.
33.7: mavg maa'b! ninb Bua henq haig Eei pcv yem Jaaib hxvg Qa'q Eyemq Bwi Eei. lyepg Taaib pcvb Eei kovb zob Eyemq tu'q Hruq mun Eei.
33.19: meib Bua maiq tu'q cvj pwatg uaq fivj Zyruq Eei myenb, se kxvq Do Eei, a'g tu'q pia'g Hruq Eei waag, se kanb fivj kxvq kanb Euvg, tovb meib Bua maiq hiuq Eei waag.
33.17: meib Bua Eei mziv zuvq tu'q pwatg maaib Favb laavg Eei huvb, yaag tu'q pwatg Javq haig Eei teib puv.
33.11: meib Bua taaq Eei za'eij se Navq Bia'q, meib Bua zruj Eei Jauq Navq Byaub Gaauq. meib Bua Tauq Eei Qiaj se Navq trud puaq Qwi meib Bua kanb.
33.5: zyruq tu'q myenb Taaib weig zu'g ninb yem Lav Eei txvj, ninb pun pcvb fim Zauj zruj hxpg Eei Jauq pwavq si-on.
33.9: Dau Waavb Waav Raub Raub uaq, le-Baa-nxn zu'g Eaiq yaag Kru Gaai, saa-lon Navq teib puvb Waav. Baa-saan Zauj Kaan-men Eei Dyavb nxmb pyob Revg.
33.16: ninb zuvq xij yem Lav Eei txvj. ninb Daaub Kauj Eei txvj se wrnq haig Eei la'pyeiq. ninb zuvq tu'q laavb zi'g Eang. ninb hopq Eei uam yaag maiq tavj.
33.4: ninb Bua Eei ka'naaiq zu'g myenb Zaavq mivb, Navq Jopg Eeig lunj Eang Revg, myenb Dutg Dutg Eei zx'q Navq kwanb Jopg Eeig Ropg pwavq nx.
33.10: zyruq kxvq, “ib zang yia xij Jiad taaib. ib zang yia xij tu'q myenb Taaib. ib zang yia xij tu'q myenb Zev.
33.22: weig zu'g zyruq zruj yia Bua Eei syemq zwid Jyen.   zyruq se Jiu leib latg pun yia Bua uaq taub.   zyruq tovb yia Bua Eei huvb. ninb xij Fruj yia Bua.
33.12: maang fivj xij zu'g puaq Qwi Navq Wi nx, Navq Fimq zu'g Va'q taaib puaq trud.”
33.15: se tovb kan zruj hxpg Eei Jauq, yaag kxvq zyen waag uaq taub. ninb Gemb zeij myenb weig tu'q Eaanb Eei sig, yaag fevj puad maiq zipq Eaanb Mwavj. ninb zotq Jyenq mnxmb maiq mwavj taij myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei waag, yaag Fipq Jyenq mziv maiq mavg x'q sig.
33.13: meib Bua yem ko Eei myenb aa'b! mwavj haid yia zruj Eei sig. meib Bua yem fatq Eei myenb aa'b! xij zu'g Eyemg yia maaib Qa'q.
33.1: meib zruj myetg Eei myenb aa'b! se kanb maiq kcvb zu'g myetg Eei myenb, meib xij zu'g Kruq a'q. zruj kuq kwaij sig Eei myenb, se kanb maiq kcvb zu'g myenb zruj kuq kwaij Eei sig pun Eei myenb, meib xij zu'g Kruq a'q. meib tivb Fiag maiq zruj myetg Eei zyavb hog, meib kanb xij zu'g myetg. meib tivb Fiag maiq zruj kuq kwaij Eei sig uaq zang, myenb zyrug zruj kuq kwaij Eei sig pun meib.

16.3: ninb Bua Buaj yu-Daa myenb, “Toq Tevj yia Bua Namq, Tevj yia Bua tivg. Toq pun meib Eei tovb linb Txvq Navq luvb zyavj aanj penj luvb mwrnd zang Eei Mwavj. Tevj pivj zu'g zung Eei myenb, maiq tuvq maaig pyauj sig myenb.
16.8: hetq-Bon Eei Deig Gaai Revg, sipg-maa Eei a'vung Mei yaag Gaai. kunq ziaj nxm kua'q Eei huvb zruj waaig kaub lovj Jiaj Eei a'vung Gwaab, tovb Daauq mivb Tauj yaa-se, cvj Jiaj mivb Tauj teib puvb Waav. Gwaab Eei Zunj Yaavj Jyenq mivb, zuvq Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Kxiq.
16.9: weig naaiq yia Eyemq Navq yaa-se myenb, weig sipg-maa Eei a'vung Mei Eyemq. hetq-Bon Zauj e-le-aa-le aag, yia Eei uamb mweig xij lyrug Fiag pun meib Dxn. Fyenb yrub Eei heug Jyenq syru pyrub zua'g Zauj laavb zi'g Eei Qiaj sekq Revg mig a'q.
16.7: weig naaiq mo-apg myenb Qa'q Eyemq, taub taub weig mo-apg Eyemq Bwi Eei. ninb Bua Raub Eyemq Kruq haig weig Kin-haa-le-setq Eei a'vung pyrub Gaai Fuaq.
16.5: Ga'haaq maaib taub Daa-witq Eei zeib fun lovg zyepg zua'q Namq myenb Eei Jauq lyepg huvb weig. ninb xij zweid Jyenq zyepg zua'q Eei kunq, ninb xij syemq zwid yaag lxd pcvb fim Eei Jauq, yaag syepg syepq Eei zruj hxpg.
16.14: mq paag ib zang zyruq kxvq, “Jiaj liud pua Havj, ziuj Zivq kov Eei Havb sruj pwavq, mo-apg Eei Favb laavg Zauj ninb Eei zwavj myenb Zamq zuvq zu'g mavg Piaj. tu'q mcvg Zwrtq Eei myenb yrug zo'g yrug mau.”
16.4: Toq pun zu'g zung Zwrtq Eei mo-apg myenb Zauj meib Bua yem, Toq zruj ninb Bua pivj Eei txvj weig pyauj Dutq xij myetg yia Bua uaq taub.” zeij myenb uaq taub Jiaj uaq zang, zu'g myetg Eei Jauq yaag tivb mig a'q, yem kua'q ka'Euad zeij myenb uaq taub yaag maiq pwatg mig a'q.
16.2: mo-apg myenb yem aan-non Do'q Eei Jaub prug, Navq Daij Jyenq Eei nx'g, Navq zu'g zung Zwrtq laud Eei nx'g txn.
16.6: yia Bua haid kxvq mo-apg myenb mauj haig, za'kevb mauj Jiaj Daavg. ninb Bua Zevb Lo puvj waab mauj Qiaj Jiad, mq paag ninb Bua puvj Eei waab mauj penj Kuvb waag.
16.13: naaiq se zyruq Jaab Daavg kxvq Tauj mo-apg Eei waag.
16.12: mo-apg myenb mivb yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj, ninb Bua Kuvj zruj pun kanb Kruq Navq. ninb Bua mivb Tauj ninb Bua Eei zyenb Eei txvj tauj kauj, ninb Bua maiq tu'q haiq Euvg.
16.11: weig naaiq yia Eei Hruq Raub Eyemq mo-apg. yia Eei Hruq Do Jiaj Eei txvj yaag weig Kin-haa-le-setq Eyemq.
16.1: meib Bua xij zu'g fuvj pa'ki yuvb txn mivb pun kunq teib puv uaq taub, yem se-e-laa yavb teib puvb Waav mivb Tauj si-on Bov
16.10: yem pyruq Eei Wivj Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g Eei Jauq zu'g zx'q mig a'q. yem a'vung Wivj maiq maaib haiq taub paauj Ruv fai heug, yem a'vung tiuq Eei zxvb maiq maaib haiq taub Eweib a'vung pyruq, weig zu'g yia, Tinb huvb, pun heug Eei Qiaj sekq.

40.18: meib haib txb haiq taub taaib peiq Tinb huvb? haib lovg haiq Euvg favj peiq ninb?
40.8: miaq Gaai mivb, pyavb yaag pyob, mq paag yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei waag yetg liud yem.”
40.3: maaib laanb myenb heug Jyenq kxvq, “yem teib puvb Waav xij zu'g liug leid zyruq Eei Jauq. yem teib puvb haand xij zu'g weig Bua Eei Tinb huvb Kxi tiub tomb Jauq za'g Eei.
40.21: meib Bua maiq hiuq fai? meib Bua maiq haid Jiaj fai? yem tovb Zx uaq maiq maaib haiq taub Buaj meib Bua fai? yem lyepg Daub peib Eei kxnb Do'q meib Bua maiq mevb pc'g fai?
40.14: ninb Zauj haiq taub Zaavb laavb Zivj haib hiuq tu'q haiq Euvg mevb? fai haiq taub Faauj ninb hiuq tu'q pcvb fim Eei Jauq? haiq taub Faauj ninb maaib wrnb zaav, fai pun ninb hiuq Tov Euvb Euvg Jauq?
40.23: ninb pun tomb Jyen Twij, yaag pun kunq luvb Diaq Eei Jyen maiq lamb lovg.
40.6: maaib Qiaj kxvq, “heug maa'b!” yia zyrug kxvq, “yia xij zu'g heug haiq Euvg?” “yetg zuvq paamb myenb se Navq miaq nx. ninb Bua Eei Favb laavg yaag Navq Daub Waav Eei pyavb.
40.2: xij zu'g Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem kxvq xn Hruq Eei waag, yaag zunb Buaj ninb, ninb zu'g Kruq naang Eei zyavb hog Jiaj mig a'q. ninb Eei zwid yaag tu'q kwavg mig a'q. ninb zu'g zyruq tivg ninb zruj Eei yetg zuvq zwid i kruq.
40.20: myenb Jomg myenb Navq naaig fovg hxg maiq Jiad, ninb zyrug kinq maiq haib latq Eei Dyavj. ninb lxd maaib puab taub Eei zavg myenb, lyepg Jiad maiq haib Kiv Eei miub favj.
40.24: ninb Bua Navq Javb Jav zwavj Eei ka'naaiq Zo'q ho'g zwavj Fiag Dau, Ko'q Jav Fiag Ruvb, Tinb huvb yetq pyomq ninb Bua zyrug Eauj Gaai, Ryaaub zung pwrng ninb Bua mivb Navq Byaub Gaauq zu'g pwrng mivb nx.
40.28: meib Bua maiq hiuq fai? meib Bua maiq haid Jiaj fai?   zyruq se yetg liud yem Eei Tinb huvb, se zeij Jomg luvb Diaq uaq taub. ninb maiq Kwrnj yaag maiq Kruq, ninb Eei wrnb zaav maiq maaib haiq taub haib hiuq tu'q Tauj.
40.7: miaq Gaai mivb, pyavb yaag pyob, weig zu'g zyruq Eei Qiaj pyomq zu'g. paamb myenb Dovg haaij zuvq Navq miaq nx.
40.29: ninb pun Kruq Eei myenb maaib Qa'q, yaag pun mau Eei myenb henq Jiad taaib.
40.19: miub favj c'q, zavg myenb toj taaib. Jyemb zavg lovg Jyem pwav Jyenq, yaag Zi'q Eaanb limg pun.
40.17: maang kua'q myenb yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen maiq funj penj haiq Euvg. ninb funj ninb Bua maiq maaib haiq Euvg Jaab zinb, za'kevb maiq lamb lovg.
40.31: mq paag Kauj zyruq Eei myenb zuvq tu'q syavb Qa'q. ninb Bua zyrug Navq tomb Jaavq yav Jyenq Daatq Daij faauj, ninb Bua zyrug Tiuj yaag maiq Kruq, ninb Bua yavb yaag maiq mau.
40.30: Havb Jeiq lunj Eei myenb haib Kruq, haib mau. henq Eei myenb lunj myenb yaag haib Di'q zu'g Dxpg.
40.27: o yaa-Kopq aag, meib weig haiq tiug kxvq, i-saa-laa-en aag, meib weig haiq tiug vopq kxvq, “yia Eei Jauq pivj Jyenq zyruq. yia hxpg zu'g tu'q Eei, yia Eei Tinb huvb zuvq maiq kunq a'q.”
40.11: ninb kruj ninb Eei myenb Navq kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb kruj kanb Eei yuvb kwanb nx. ninb lovg puad Lxq zunq ninb Eei pa'ki yuvb txn Lxpq Jyenq yem ninb Eei la'Kwrtq, yaag manb mang txb txb Jyenq txn Eei pa'ki yuvb maa.
40.5: zyruq Eei Favb laavg xij hing Zwrtq taaib, paamb myenb yetg zuvq xij lomb Rxib pwatg. weig zu'g zyruq kanb Eei Rwib kxvq liud a'q.”
40.9: o si-on zivb Eei myenb aa'b! meib Bua txb Kuq fyenj, xij zu'g faauj Bovb Lav. o ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei myenb aa'b! meib Bua txb Kuq fyenj. meib Bua xij zu'g Zwrtq Qiaj Lo Eei heug, Zwrtq Qiaj heug, maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. xij zu'g kxvq Buaj yu-Daa Eei zivb, “naaiq se meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb.”
40.16: le-Baa-nxn Eei Dyavj maiq kauj zruj zaavb puaq, yem uaq Eei Yiab zxib yaag maiq kauj zruj ziag Eei ka'naaiq.
40.4: nxmb nxm hxvd xij zu'g tinb faauj taaib, yetg zuvq Bovb Lav Bovb aiq xij zu'g zruj aiq Fiag. maiq ywrnb Eei txvj xij zu'g fib Bcvg. Lavb Lav aib aiq Eei txvj xij zu'g penj Daub pcvb.
40.10: mavg maa'b! zyruq Tinb huvb txb Jyenq tomb Qa'q taaib. ninb Eei puad Tevj ninb kunq. mavg maa'b! ninb Eei zivb Eeig Zauj ninb yem, ninb winb pun Eei yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen.
40.22: Tinb huvb zweid Jyenq paamb ken kub vwaaig, yem paamb ken Eei myenb Navq Jopg Eeig. ninb Zxv Gxi luvb Navq Zxv Bc'g kcvb Dia, yaag Zxv Gxi Navq myenb yem Eei Dopg liub.
40.12: haiq taub lovg puab zaavb x Laau Kxiq Eei uam, fai lovg puab naamj Dx'g luvb? haiq taub zx'q luvb Diaq Eei niab Buv tapq nxm Tovq, fai lovg Ryavj Ryav Bov, fai lovg Tinb pcvb tavq Ryav Bovb aiq.
40.15: mavg maa'b! maang fivj se Navq Tovq Eei yetg Dyepq uam, yaag funj Navq yem Tinb pcvb tavq Eei niab Buv. ninb prub zwavj Kxib Rru Navq ti'q tyen niab Buv.
40.13: haiq taub haib za'q tu'q zu'g zyruq Eei Hruq fai zruj ninb Eei Zaavb laavb myenb Faauj ninb?
40.1: meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb kxvq, xij zu'g xn Hruq, xij zu'g xn yia Eei pc'g fivj Eei Hruq.
