40.26: meib Bua Zau Myen mavg kub vwaaig, haiq taub zeij naaiq teij yetg zuvq? se tovb txb Leib kwanb ziuj sruj mrug Zwrtq taaib, yaag heug nxmb nxm Eei Buaj uaq taub. weig ninb henq haig Eei tomb Qa'q zyrug maiq Zaa yetg nxm Leij.
40.25: Zivb Revg uaq taub kxvq, “meib Bua txb haiq taub peiq yia? haiq taub Zauj yia fib Navq?”

59.18: ziuj ninb Bua zruj Eei sig ninb xij Jaauq win. ninb xij nrud ninb Eei winb wavq, Jaauq win pun ninb Eei winb Jaa. lyemb Kxib Rru Eei myenb ninb xij Jaauq win.
59.3: weig zu'g meib Bua Eei puad maaib Ryaamq kua'q Jyenq. zwid yaag kua'q Jyenq meib Bua Eei puab Do'q. meib Bua Eei Rwib kxvb pc'g, meib Bua Eei Byetg kxvq x'q Eei waag.
59.8: pcvb xn Eei Jauq ninb Bua maiq hiuq, zruj Eei sig maiq maaib pcvb fim. ninb Bua pun kanb Eei Jauq Fwrtq. haiq taub yavb naaiq teij Jauq maiq hiuq tu'q pcvb xn.
59.19: Navq naaig yem fai puv, myenb zyrug kamb Riaj zyruq Eei Buaj. yem Ba'Nxi Zwrtq uaq puv, ninb Bua Taaib ninb Eei Favb laavg, weig zu'g ninb xij taaib Navq pe'q haig Eei Do'q, maaib zyruq Eei Ryaauj zung Jyenq taaib.
59.9: weig naaiq pcvb fim Eei Jauq leib yia Bua ko, zruj hxpg Eei Jauq zung maiq zaaig yia Bua. yia Bua lxd Fav mq paag mavg maa'b! Kuvj maaib Mwavj. yia Bua lxd Favb laavg mq paag Kuvj yavb Mwavj Navq.
59.7: ninb Bua Eei zauj Tiuj mivb zruj x'q sig, ninb Bua syepg syepq Eei taij, pun maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb Eei Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq. ninb Bua Namq Zwrtq Eei penj zwid, ninb Bua Eei Jauq Kuvj maaib paaig waaig paaig Waav Eei sig Navq.
59.5: ninb Bua Navq puag naavb to'g Jauj, yaag Navq Zi'q kcvb Exg Byxvd. haiq taub Eang naaiq teij Jauj zyrug taig. maaib nxm Jauj zu'g Bx'q huq zyrug Zwrtq naavb to'g.
59.16: ninb pwatg maiq maaib yetg taub, kevb! Bua'g hxvb haig maiq maaib haiq taub Tevj ninb Bua Toq. ninb lovg kanb Eei puad pun ninb tu'q hivb, ninb kanb Eei kovb fim yaag paaq Jyenq ninb.
59.20: zyruq kxvq, “zua'g myenb uaq taub zuvq xij taaib si-on, Tauj yaa-Kopq Eei Ra'Myen, tovb kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid Eei myenb.”
59.17: ninb lovg zruj hxpg Eei Jauq weig Lia'g Jaapq zu'q Jyenq, lovg Fruj en zruj Lia'g muag Dovj Jyenq. ninb lovg Jaauq win Eei sig zruj lwib hruj zu'q, yaag zx'q Jxm Hruq Eei sig zruj tomb lwib Daauq pwij.
59.14: pcvb fim Twij Rwrnj Ga'haaq, zruj hxpg Eei Jauq yem ko Eei txvj. yem tomb zwavj zaamg lxd maiq pwatg zyen leid, zruj zivj Eei Jauq yaag maiq tu'q pia'g.
59.4: maiq maaib yetg taub pcvb fim Eei koj sig, maiq maaib yetg taub Hruq zivj Eei mivb sig txvb. ninb Bua pavg Kuvb waag Rcv yaag kxvb pc'g. ninb Bua taaq to'g Eei za'eij, zruj Zwrtq penj waaig Eei sig.
59.21: zyruq kxvq, “yia kanb c'q, naaiq se yia Zauj ninb Bua lyepg Jiad Eei vcvg waag. yia Eei sivj livb, tovb yem Jyenq meib, Zauj yia pun meib kxvq Eei waag, yem naaiq mivb maiq leib Gxi meib yaag maiq leib Gxi meib Eei fu'Jweiq fai meib Eei hod txig zeib fun Tauj maang kruq maang txig.” zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq.
59.2: mq paag meib Bua Eei zwid pun meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb Gc'q Jyenq. meib Bua Eei zwid Txvq ninb Eei Myen, pun ninb maiq mavg meib Bua yaag maiq mwavj meib Bua.
59.6: ninb Bua Eei kcvb Exg Byxvd maiq haib lovg txvj lwib hruj. ninb Bua zruj taaib Eei ka'naaiq yaag maiq haib pwav kanb Eei sin. ninb Bua zruj Eei Kuvj penj zwid Navq, ninb Bua Eei puad Kuvj zruj to'g, zruj Zyruq.
59.13: yia Bua vcvg Jyenq, maiq Eyemg zyruq. yia Bua Win mivb, maiq kan yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb. yia Bua kxvq waag zeij myenb yaag Zeuj lung, cvj yem Hruq Namq Zwrtq, kxvq Zwrtq kxvb pc'g Eei waag.
59.12: weig zu'g yia Bua Eei zwid yem meib Eei Ra'Myen Yaavj Jyenq faauj, yia Bua Eei zwid zruj zxvb zevj koj yia Bua. yia Bua zruj txvg Eei sig Zauj yia Bua yem, yia Bua zruj Eei zwid yia Bua yaag hiuq mig a'q.
59.15: yetg teij zyen leid maiq maaib. haiq taub kwavg x'q sig, taauj Rwrnj zu'g x'q myenb zruj hxig.   zyruq mavg pwatg maiq maaib pcvb fim Eei sig, ninb zyrug maiq a'Neiq.
59.11: yia Bua yetg zuvq Navq Jyepq nx Funb, yaag Navq pc'g kopq heug Raub Eei Qiaj. yia Bua lxd pcvb fim Eei Jauq mq paag maiq maaib yetg teij. yia Bua lxd Fruj en mq paag leib yia Bua ko haig.
59.1: mavg maa'b! zyruq Eei puad maiq zeid navq, maiq haib Fruj meib Bua. ninb Eei mnxmb yaag maiq zeid Duv, maiq haib mwavj meib Bua.
59.10: yia Bua Lua Jyenq Fovg Navq mziv mcvb nx, yia Bua Lua Jyenq mivb Navq maiq maaib mziv Eei myenb. luvb aanj zang yia Bua Di'q zu'g Dxpg Navq penj luvb maanb Mwavj. yem henq Jiaj Eei myenb Bu'Dovj, yia Bua Navq Janb taig.

37.18: “o zyruq aag, za'kevb zyen Eei. atg-si-lia Eei huvb paaig waaig naaiq teij maang kua'q maang fivj yaag pun ninb Bua Eei teib puv penj Daub Waav Revg.
37.8: uaq taub tomb pcvb pyeiq haid kxvq atg-si-lia Eei huvb Zwrtq laa-Kitq zivb, ninb zyrug Twij cvj lxd pwatg huvb tiaj yem lipq-naa zivb Bx'q Jaaj.
37.33: “weig naaiq zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq atg-si-lia Eei huvb, “+‘ninb maiq tu'q pia'g naaiq nxm zivb, yaag maiq pwrnq yetg Ritq fxv pia'g. ninb maiq tu'q nanq Txvb paaib yem naaiq nxm zivb Eei Ra'Myen, yaag maiq tu'q Dwi nia Lav Bx'q zivb.
37.3: ninb Bua kxvq Buaj i-saa-yaa, “he-se-Ki-yaa Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘ib Nxi se Dxtq naang, zu'g taanb, zu'g Eaiq Eei Nxi. se Navq msia'q txn xij yuvd kub vwaad yaag maiq maaib Qa'q yuvd.
37.32: weig zu'g maaib teij zevg Fiag Eei myenb xij yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zwrtq, cvj maaib teij pyauj Dutq mcvg Eei myenb yem si-on Bov Zwrtq taaib. nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Dovg haaij zuvq xij Navq naaiq nx zruj.’
37.21: aa-mxtq Eei txn, i-saa-yaa, pun waag mivb Buaj he-se-Ki-yaa, “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘meib tauj kauj kxvq Tauj atg-si-lia Eei huvb, sen-naa-Ke-lipq, uaq teij waag yia haid mig a'q.’
37.35: “+‘weig yia kanb yaag weig yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, yia xij peu Jyenq naaiq nxm zivb, yaag xij Fruj naaiq nxm zivb.’+”
37.14: he-se-Ki-yaa to'g liud trug fyenj myenb txb taaib Eei fyenj, ninb zyrug pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Kxi fyenj an Jyenq zyruq Eei Ra'Myen.
37.23: meib kxvq to'g Ki haiq taub? meib lovg meib Eei Qiaj kxvq haiq taub? meib lovg meib Eei mziv zruj mauj pun haiq taub? meib zruj pun i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb.
37.6: i-saa-yaa kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “xij zu'g Buaj meib Bua Eei zyruq, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “maiq tuvq kamb Riaj meib Bua haid liud naaiq teij waag, tovb atg-si-lia Eei huvb Eei pru kxvq Ki yia Eei waag.
37.34: ninb yavb haiq tiub Jauq taaib, ninb yaag xij zu'g yavb uaq tiub Jauq Rwrnj. ninb zuvq maiq pia'g naaiq nxm zivb.’ naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
37.2: ninb Paaiq kruj huvb ting uaq taub e-li-yaa-Kim Zauj sepq-naa srub piuq Zauj zruj kaub Lo uaq teij sai myenb, yetg zuvq zu'q Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru, mivb lxd aa-mxtq Eei txn, trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa.
37.36: uaq mwrnd zyruq Eei finb myenb Zwrtq mivb yem atg-si-lia myenb Eei Zyavq taij yetg sinj Yetg waang pyaa Zin taub myenb taig. ta'Eeig Dxm Ryruq Eei myenb Jiad sin taaib pwatg yetg zuvq penj sei Revg mig a'q.
37.20: o zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb aag, Toq Fruj yia Bua pyauj Dutq atg-si-lia huvb Eei puab Diaq weig pun luvb Diaq maang kua'q myenb hiuq tu'q meib kanb zruj zyruq.”
37.24: meib lovg meib Eei trug fyenj myenb Ki zyruq. meib kxvq, “yia lovg yia Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia Zamq faauj Lav haig Eei Bov, zuvq pia'g le-Baa-nxn Do Jiaj Eei txvj. yia kxij kaub Lav Jiaj Eei sij-Daa zovb Dyavj yaag kxij kaub lovj Jiaj Eei zovb. yia pia'g lomg Tauj kaub ko Jiaj Eei txvj, pia'g Tauj kaub hod Jiaj Eei kemb.
37.28: “+‘mq paag yia hiuq tu'q meib yem haaij, yaag hiuq tu'q meib haiq zang Zwrtq mivb cvj pia'g taaib. yia yaag hiuq meib Qiaj Jiad nrud yia.
37.7: yia xij pun ninb maaib Euvg Hruq. ninb tu'q haid Euvg waab Ryaauj zyrug Rwrnj ninb kanb Eei teib puv. yem ninb kanb Eei teib puv, yia pun ninb zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij taig.”+’+”
37.29: laaij meib Qiaj Jiad, nrud yia, kxvq yia, meib puvj Eei waab mauj yaag Tauj yia Eei mnxmb. yia zyrug lovg yia Eei Lia'g vau, vau Jyenq meib Eei Ba'zxv, yaag zx'q yia Eei hanb Kruq fapq Jyenq meib Eei Rwib, pun meib taauj Gaav Rwrnj meib taaib Eei Jauq.
37.19: yaag zx'q teib puv Eei zyenb zxi pia'g trud myetg Revg, weig zu'g maiq zeid zyenb, se myenb kanb Eei puad lovg Dyavj, lovg la'pyeiq zruj taaib.
37.17: o zyruq aag, Toq pcv mnxmb mwavj. o zyruq aag, Toq nuvj Gxi mziv mavg. mwavj sen-naa-Ke-lipq Eei waag, se ninb Paaiq myenb taaib Ki zyavb Jyenq Eei Tinb huvb Eei yetg zuvq waag.
37.38: maaib Nxi sen-naa-Ke-lipq yem miub pyauq ka'Euad paaij ninb Eei zyenb, nitq-lokq, uaq zang, maaib i taub ninb Eei txn, atg-lam-me-lekq Zauj saa-le-se, lovg Ru'g Daauq taij ninb. Ga'haaq zyrug pyauj mivb yem aa-laa-latq teib puv. sen-naa-Ke-lipq Eei txn, e-saanj-hatq-Don, Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb.
37.31: yu-Daa Eei zeib fun tu'q mcvg Zwrtq zevg Fiag Eei myenb, zyrug Navq ka'naaib zwavj, kxn Fiag Ruvb, kub vwaaig zyavb pyruq.
37.30: “+‘o he-se-Ki-yaa aa'b! naaiq se weig meib zruj nxm Javb hog. ib Havj meib Bua tu'q Eang ninb kanb Zwrtq Eei ka'naaiq, ta'Eeig Havj fib Navq Eei tu'q Eang ninb kanb Zwrtq taaib Eei ka'naaiq. mq paag ta'faam Havj xij zu'g zwavj yaag xij zu'g syru, xij zu'g zruj Wivj zwavj a'vung pyruq yaag Eang uaq teij pyruq.
37.27: naaiq teij zivb Eei pc'g fivj Eei Qa'q Revg mig a'q. ninb Bua zyrug Hruq waaig Revg yaag zu'g Eaiq. ninb Bua se Navq yem Daub Waav Eei miaq, Navq miab yaav lunj Eei nx, se Navq yem pyaub vxb Zwrtq taaib Eei miaq, maiq kcvb Lo, zu'g Eutg trud puaq Gaai.
37.11: meib haid kxvq atg-si-lia Eei zwavj huvb Navq haiq nx zruj pun maang kua'q zu'g myetg Revg mig a'q. meib Namq taaib meib haib tu'q Fruj Eei fai?
37.5: he-se-Ki-yaa Eei Jyen mivb Tauj i-saa-yaa uaq.
37.9: atg-si-lia Eei huvb haid kxvq, i-yipq teib puv, Kutq myenb Eei huvb, Ti-laa-haa-Kaa, Zwrtq taaib xij Zauj ninb Bx'q Jaaj. haid liud ninb zyrug Paaiq trug fyenj myenb mivb he-se-Ki-yaa uaq Navq naaiq nx kxvq,
37.16: “o nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, tovb yem uaq teij i taub Ke-lu-Bim Bu'Dovj Eei weig uaq taub aa'b! Kuvj meib kanb zruj luvb Diaq maang kua'q Eei Tinb huvb. meib zeij luvb zeij Dau.
37.37: atg-si-lia Eei huvb, sen-naa-Ke-lipq, zyrug leib Gxi uaq nxm txvj Rwrnj mivb yem ni-naa-we.
37.4: Riaj zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, mwavj haid uaq taub tomb pcvb pyeiq, tovb ninb Eei zyruq, atg-si-lia Eei huvb, Paaiq taaib kxvq Ki zyavb Jyenq Eei Tinb huvb uaq teij waag. zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, zyrug weig ninb haid naaiq teij waag hatg ninb. weig naaiq Toq meib Tevj naaiq teij zevg Fiag Eei myenb tauj kauj.’+”
37.10: “xij zu'g kxvq Buaj yu-Daa Eei huvb, he-se-Ki-yaa, ‘meib maiq tuvq mwavj meib Kauj Eei Tinb huvb Duaq meib. ninb kxvq, “ye-lu-saa-lem zuvq maiq zu'g Jiu pun yem atg-si-lia huvb Eei puab Diaq.”
37.22: naaiq se zyruq Eei waag kxvq ninb, “+‘si-on zivb Eei myenb mavg Piaj meib, Wrtq meib. ye-lu-saa-lem myenb yem meib Bua Eei Ga'haaq Gaav Wavj mGxvq pun meib.
37.12: uaq teij ziaj nxm kua'q Eei zyenb haib Fruj ninb Bua fai? se yia Eei ovb Taaij myetg uaq teij kua'q Eei zyenb, tovb ko-saan, haa-laan, le-sepq Zauj yem Ten-atg-saaj Eei e-Den myenb Eei zyenb.
37.15: he-se-Ki-yaa tauj kauj kxvq Buaj zyruq,
37.13: haa-matq Eei huvb, aan-patg Eei huvb, sej-faan-waa-im zivb fai he-naa fai ipg-waa Eei huvb tiaj yem haaij?’+”
37.1: he-se-Ki-yaa huvb haid liud uaq taub tomb pcvb pyeiq kxvq Eei waag, ninb petq ninb Eei lwib hruj cvj zu'q Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq.
37.26: “zyruq kxvq, ‘meib Bua maiq haid Jiaj fai? yia tivg zyavj laub a'q. lob Nxi yia taaq za'eij, ib zang pun Zwrtq taaib a'q. se yia lovg meib zruj pun weib wrnq Eei zivb Baav penj ka'naaib Dwi.
37.25: yia yem kanb nxm teib puv wetq uamb Kwrtq yaag yem uaq hopq uam. yia lovg yia Eei zaub penq kwaaib i-yipq teib puv Eei yetg zuvq Do'q Gaai.”+’

4.3: yem si-on zevg Fiag Eei myenb, tovb Zxg yem Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem uaq teij, zyrug tu'q myenb heug Zivb Revg. se mrud laanb maaib mcvg zyavb Jyenq faauj Buaj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei myenb.
4.4: zyruq xij saaj Revg si-on Eei sia'q Eei wij. zyruq xij lovg ninb Eei Qa'q syemq yaag lovg trud puaq fyruj Revg kua'q ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Ryaamq.
4.2: Tauj uaq Nxi, zyruq xij pun Zwrtq taaib Eei Zunj Rweig, Favb laavg haig. teib puv Zwrtq Eei kcvb zwavj xij pun yem i-saa-laa-en tu'q mcvg Zwrtq Eei myenb lovj Hruq haig yaag tu'q Favb laavg.
4.6: luvb Nxi zang zyrug Txvq laavb yaag penj nxm txvj pivj Txvq Jyenq Byuvb Ryaauj.
4.5: uaq zang zyruq xij zeij txq Bwrnj yem kxmj si-on Bov Zauj yem naaig kapq zunq Eei zwavj myenb kub vwaaig. weig luvb Nxi zang se Navq Bwrnb syruj, luvb mwrnd zang Navq trub Byetg Fav. yem yetg zuvq Favb laavg kub vwaaig maaib ka'naaiq Ria Jyenq.
4.1: Tauj uaq Nxi, siag taub msia'q txn xij nanq Jyenq yetg taub mJavg txn kxvq, “yia Bua kanb lxd Eang lxd zu'q. Kuvj Toq pun yia Bua haib kwei meib Eei Buaj zruj yia Bua Eei Goj. Toq pun yia Bua maiq zu'g Eaiq.”

51.18: meib yuvd Eei zwavj naamb Erud maiq maaib haiq taub yend ye-lu-saa-lem. meib txb Lo Eei yetg zuvq fu'Jweiq, maiq maaib yetg taub Ken meib.
51.8: weig zu'g kcv xij vaatg ninb Bua Navq vaatg lwib hruj, kcvb mau xij vaatg Navq vaatg pa'ki yuvb pyei. mq paag yia Eei kovb fim xij yetg liud yem, yia Eei Fruj en Tauj maang kruq maang txig.”
51.3: weig zu'g yia, zyruq, zuvq xij xn si-on, yaag xij Kxb lyenb si-on Eei yetg zuvq Baav waaig Eei txvj. yia xij pun ninb Eei teib puvb Waav Navq e-Den Wivj, kwavg Waav Eei txvj yaag Navq yia, zyruq, Eei Wivj. yem si-on ka'Euad zyrug maaib Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g, maaib lcvd zivb Zauj paauj Ruv Eei Qiaj.
51.21: weig naaiq meib zu'g syrug Kruq Eei myenb aa'b! meib Gwin yaag maiq zeid laaij tiuq Gwin.
51.14: zu'g wrnj lob Eei myenb xij syepg syepq Eei tu'q puvj Gxi. ninb maiq taig, maiq zu'g Fiag yemb ken. ninb Eei Eang hopq yaag maiq tavj.
51.23: yia xij zx'q uaq nxm zaanq an Jyenq zeij meib uaq teij myenb Eei puad. ninb Bua txij meib kxvq, ‘Baapq Fiag pun yia Bua Zaaiq Jyenq meib Jiaj maa'b!’ meib zyrug pun meib Eei ti'g taand Navq Dau, yaag Navq heib hxvg Eei Jauq sweib ninb Bua Jiaj.”
51.6: meib Bua Zau Myen mavg luvb, yaag mavg ka'Diaq Dau, weig zu'g luvb xij mitg Revg Navq trub syruj, Dau yaag xij Navq lwib hruj nx, huq Revg. yem naaig Eei myenb yaag Navq uaq nx taig Revg. mq paag yia Eei Fruj en yetg liud yem, yia Eei kovb fim yetg liud maiq haib Jomg.
51.2: xij zu'g Namq kaaj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij, apg-laa-ham, yaag Namq mavg kaaj saa-laa, tovb yuvd meib taaib uaq taub. weig zu'g apg-laa-ham Du'g laanb myenb yem Eei zyavb hog yia heug ninb. yia yaag Zeij fu'q pun ninb, pun ninb Eei myenb sruj Zamq.
51.20: meib Eei myenb meib mivb, pweij Jyenq yem tiub tiub Jaub Kuq Navq Juv zu'g myenb zcv muvd Lopq Jyenq. ninb Bua zu'g zyruq nrud Tauj taaub, yaag zu'g meib Eei Tinb huvb hemj.
51.7: “meib Bua hiuq tu'q haiq Euvg hxpg Eei myenb, se maaib yia Eei leib latg yem meib Eei Hruq Eei myenb aa'b! mwavj yia maa'b! myenb taanb meib Bua, maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. myenb Wrtq meib Bua yaag maiq tuvq Hruq namj.
51.19: meib zu'g naaiq teij i Euvg ze'g naang, maaib haiq taub haib Tevj meib Raub Eyemq? meib zu'g paaig, zu'g myetg, meib Eei myenb zu'g vxg, zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. haiq taub xij xn meib Eei Hruq?
51.17: ye-lu-saa-lem aa'b! Jiad taaib, Jiad taaib, sruq Jiad taaib maa'b!   zyruq Qiaj Jiad, nrud meib zyrug Zunq pun meib hopq Eei zaanq meib tu'q hopq liud a'q, zuvq hopq Tauj Kuvj zevg tiub zaa Navq zyrug pun meib luvb luvb laib laib Eei.
51.11: zyruq zua'g Rwrnj Eei myenb zyrug Rwrnj, paauj Jyenq Ruv taaib Tauj si-on. ninb Bua zuvq xij maaib yetg liud Eei Fyenb yrub. ninb Bua xij tu'q Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g. yrub Raub Zauj Tauq Qiab Do'g Eei Jauq xij Jiaj mig a'q.
51.5: yia pcvb fim Eei Jauq Tauj fatq, yia Eei Fruj en yaag Zwrtq mivb, yia kanb xij kunq maang kua'q. Kxib Rru zuaq Jyenq yia, zuaq Jyenq maaib lamb Namq yia xij Fruj ninb Bua.
51.9: zyruq aag, Eia taaib, Eia taaib maa'b! lovg meib Eei Qa'q Fruj yia Bua maa'b! Eia taaib Navq lob Nxi uaq teij txig Jiaj txig Eei zyavb hog. se meib Va'q laa-hapg penj yetg Ganj yetg Ganj, yaag Ropq Tov Juvb huvb maiq zeid?
51.16: yia zx'q yia Eei waag Faauj meib, yaag lovg yia Eei puad peu Jyenq meib. yia Zxv luvb cvj lyepg Dau Eei kxnb Do'q, yaag kxvq Buaj si-on myenb, ‘meib zruj yia Eei pc'g fivj.’+”
51.4: “o yia Eei pc'g fivj aag, mwavj yia maa'b! o yia Eei kua'q Eei myenb aa'b! pcv mnxmb mwavj yia. yia xij zx'q yia Eei leib latg Jiu pun maang fivj. yia pcvb fim Eei leid xij zruj Fav ziuj ninb Bua.
51.10: se meib pun Kxiq Gaai mivb, pun Do Eei uam Gaai, zruj pun Kxiq Do Eei txvj penj Jauq, pun zua'g Rwrnj Eei myenb Jiaj maiq zeid?
51.22: meib Eei zyruq, se zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, tovb xij weig ninb Eei pc'g fivj Zcvj sig, Navq naaiq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia zx'q Gxi yem meib Bua Eei puad pun myenb luvb luvb laib laib Eei zaanq, se yia Qiaj Jiad Eei zyavb hog pun meib hopq Eei zaanq, yem naaiq mivb meib Bua maiq zu'g hopq.
51.12: “yia, se yia kanb, xn meib Bua Eei Hruq. meib Bua penj haiq taub Zivj kamb Riaj haib taig Eei myenb? se kamb Riaj paamb myenb, ninb Bua Kuvj Navq miaq nx.
51.15: yia se zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb. yia Qruq Kxiq pun uamb laavg Bwi Funb Funb Eei. yia Eei Buaj se nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq.
51.13: meib Bua yaag la'Ku'q zeij meib Bua taaib uaq taub se la'Ku'q Zxv luvb cvj lyepg Dau Eei kxnb Do'q uaq taub zyruq. weig naaiq meib Bua Zivj taaib zyavb Nxi kamb Riaj haig xij zeij meib Bua uaq teij Qiaj Jiad, nrud Eei sig. ninb Bua lyepg Hruq xij myetg meib Bua, mq paag ninb Bua Qiaj Jiad, nrud meib Bua Eei sig Jiaj haaij mig a'q?
51.1: zyruq kxvq, “meib Bua kan pcvb fim Eei Jauq yavb yaag taaib lxd zyruq Eei myenb, mwavj yia maa'b! xij zu'g Namq Tauj meib Bua yem zu'g Divb Zwrtq taaib uaq nxm la'pyeiq, yaag Namq mavg meib zu'g wetq Zwrtq taaib uaq nxm la'pyeib Kwrtq.

62.3: meib zyrug penj Rweig haig Eei nivq yem zyruq Eei puad, yem meib Eei Tinb huvb Eei puad yaag penj huvb nivq.
62.8: zyruq suv Zwrtq ninb Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad, se ninb henq haig Eei puad, lcvd waag, “yem naaiq mivb yia yetg liud maiq zx'q meib Eei laavb zi'g pun meib Eei winb wavq zruj Eang hopq. kanb fivj myenb yetg liud yaag maiq tu'q hopq meib Dxtq Qa'q tu'q taaib Eei syavb a'vung tiuq.
62.9: mq paag syru Eei myenb tu'q Eang yaag Zev zyruq. syru a'vung pyruq uaq teij yaag tu'q yem yia Eei sivj ting Eei laatg ka'Euad hopq.”
62.7: yaag maiq tuvq pun ninb hitq Kwrnj. zuaq Tauj ninb lyepg Jiad ye-lu-saa-lem, yaag pun ye-lu-saa-lem yem luvb Diaq penj myenb Zev Eei txvj.
62.5: Navq taub txn Zauj taub maiq pweij Jiaj txn Eei sia'q txv Jaa, meib Eei txn Bua xij Navq uaq nx Zauj meib txv Jaa. syavb laavb Navq haiq nx a'Neiq syavb Bwavd, meib Eei Tinb huvb xij Navq uaq nx a'Neiq meib.
62.4: yem naaiq mivb myenb maiq kxvq meib se “zu'g kwavg mig a'q.” meib Eei teib puv yaag maiq maaib haiq taub kxvq penj “kwavg Waav Eei teib puv.” mq paag meib xij tu'q myenb heug “yia a'Neiq Eei se ninb.” meib Eei teib puv yaag heug “txv Jaa mig a'q.” weig zu'g zyruq a'Neiq meib, meib Eei teib puv yaag xij txv Jaa.
62.2: maang kua'q xij pwatg meib zruj hxpg Eei Jauq, zwavj huvb tiaj xij pwatg meib Eei Favb laavg. meib yaag xij tu'q nxm syavb Buaj, se zyruq kanb Eei Rwib Tevj Zwrtq Eei Buaj.
62.6: o ye-lu-saa-lem aag, yia pun syruq kcv myenb yem meib Eei zivb laatg kub vwaaig, ninb Bua zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd maiq sekq. meib Bua heug zyruq Eei myenb, maiq tuvq pun kanb hitq Kwrnj,
62.12: myenb xij heug ninb Bua penj “Zivb Revg Eei pc'g fivj,” “zyruq zua'g taaib Eei myenb.” myenb yaag heug meib penj “lxd tu'q taaib.” yaag heug “maiq kwavg Waav Eei zivb.”
62.11: mavg maa'b! zyruq zunb Jomg luvb Diaq kxvq, “kxvq Buaj si-on, ‘mavg maa'b! meib Eei Fruj en taaib Tauj. mavg maa'b! ninb Eei zivb Eeig yem ninb uaq, ninb winb pun Eei zivb Eeig yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen.’+”
62.1: weig si-on yia Eyend maiq Jyenq Qiaj, weig ye-lu-saa-lem yia maiq haib sekq. zuaq Tauj ninb zruj hxpg Eei Jauq Zwrtq taaib Navq cvq Zwrtq Fav, ninb Eei Fruj en Navq zia'g Jyenq Eei trub paaq.
62.10: Jiaj mivb, yavb zivb kcvb Jiaj mivb maa'b! weig naaiq teij pc'g fivj liug leid zyavj Jauq. Zeij Jiad, Zeij Jiad tomb Jauq. zx'q Gxi la'pyeiq, weig maang fivj myenb Zia keb faauj.

12.3: weig naaiq meib Bua zyrug yem Fruj en Eei uamb zivq Fyenb yrub Eei Damq uam.
12.4: Tauj uaq Nxi, meib zuvq xij kxvq, “xij zu'g txb ziag zyruq, yaag heug ninb Eei mevb. xij zu'g pun maang kua'q hiuq tu'q ninb zruj Eei sig, zunb ninb Eei mevb pun myenb Taaib.
12.2: mavg maa'b! Tinb huvb se yia Eei Fruj en, yia xij Kauj ninb yaag maiq kamb Riaj, weig zu'g zyruq Tinb huvb se yia Eei Qa'q Zauj yia Eei Ruv, ninb yaag penj yia Eei Fruj en.”
12.6: si-on Eei pc'g fivj aag, xij zu'g heug yaag Fyenb yrub Eei paauj Ruv, weig zu'g yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb se Lo haig.”
12.5: xij zu'g paauj Ruv Zev zyruq weig zu'g ninb zruj Favb laavg Eei sig. xij zu'g pun luvb Diaq myenb hiuq tu'q naaiq teij sig.
12.1: Tauj uaq Nxi, meib zuvq xij kxvq, “o zyruq aag, yia xij Zev meib. maiq kunq meib Qiaj Jiad yia, meib Eei ka'Qiaj fiu mig a'q. meib yaag xn yia Eei Hruq.

46.3: “o yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun aag, se i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun zevg Fiag Eei yetg zuvq myenb, yem meib Bua Zwrtq seij taaib yia Lxpq Jyenq meib Bua. yem maa Eei ka'sia uaq zang yia zuvq paaq Jyenq meib Bua.
46.8: “Javj Jyenq, lovb lovj Eei Namq. meib Bua zwib myenb xij zu'g yem Hruq Namq lovj.
46.9: Javj Jyenq lob Nxi Zwrtq taaib Eei sig, weig zu'g yia se Tinb huvb yaag maiq maaib kanb taub. yia se Tinb huvb. maiq maaib kanb taub Navq yia.
46.7: ninb Bua zx'q zyenb Eei favj an Jyenq Ba'taub kcv mivb. ninb Bua xn Jyenq yetg nxm txvj, favj zyrug yem Jyenq uaq. miub favj maiq haib swiq mivb kanb nxm txvj. maiq kunq maaib myenb taaib heug Jyenq Toq ninb, miub favj maiq haib tau, yaag maiq haib Fruj myenb pyauj Dutq ninb Eei Kruq naang.
46.5: “meib Bua xij zx'q yia peiq haiq taub? xij pun yia Zauj haiq taub fib Dovg? meib Bua xij zx'q yia peiq yia Zauj haiq taub fib Navq?
46.4: Tauj meib Bua Havb Jeiq koj, Ba'pyei pc'g, yia, se yia zyruq, xij paaq Jyenq meib Bua. yia xij peu Jyenq yaag xij Fruj meib Bua.
46.2: ninb Bua Jaaiq Jutq, lomb Rxib Do'q Fiag, maiq haib peu kanb Tx Eei ka'naaiq. ninb Bua kanb zuvq zu'g Zaavq mivb.
46.6: zx'q Bua'g toj Zwrtq Jyem, yaag lovg Tinb pcvb tavq Ryav Eaanb Eei myenb, Zivq Jyemb zavg toj penj zyenb Eei favj, ninb Bua zyrug kweig Fiag paaij.
46.13: yia pun yia hivb Jiaj Eei Nxi taaib fatq, zuvq leib maiq ko a'q. yia Eei Fruj en yaag maiq vaib. yia xij pun si-on tu'q Fruj en, pun i-saa-laa-en tu'q yia Eei Favb laavg.
46.12: meib Bua Hruq vcvg, leib pcvb fim Jauq Eei myenb aa'b! mwavj yia maa'b!
46.11: yia xij heug tomb Jaavq yem tov puv taaib, se heug taub myenb yem ko Eei teib puv taaib ei yia Eei za'eij zruj zyavj. yia kxvq liud, yia za'kevb xij pun Zwrtq taaib, yia tivg liud Eei, yia za'kevb zruj.
46.1: Ben Do'q Fiag, ne-Bo Jaaiq Jutq Fiag. Baa-Bi-lon Eei miub favj yem scvb Kuq Zauj vovb Eei ti'g taand Tx. meib Bua kcv Eei ka'naaiq, pun scvb Kuq Tx Niaq yaag Kruq.
46.10: yem tovb Zx uaq yia kxvq setq mweid xij Zwrtq taaib Eei sig, yaag yem lob Nxi kxvq maiq kcvb tu'q zruj Eei sig. yia Eei za'eij lyepg tivg mig a'q. ta'faanb yia a'Neiq zruj Eei yia zuvq xij zruj zyavj.

13.18: ninb Bua lovg Jwavb zinj pwrnq myenb lunj myenb taig. ninb Bua yaag maiq Kxb lyenb yem ka'sia Eei kub vwaad. ninb Bua Eei mziv yaag maiq Kxb lyenb fu'Jweiq.
13.8: ninb Bua zyrug za'kevb! kamb Riaj haig, zu'g mun, Raub Kruq, nyruq Jyenq sin Navq msia'q txn mun kub vwaad nx. kamb Riaj kau, laanb mavg laanb. ninb Bua Eei Myen Rang si'q Navq trub Byetg nx.
13.3: yia kanb Paaiq yia kinq taaib Eei myenb, yia heug yia Eei henq haig Eei pcv, se uaq teij zruj mauj Zevb Lo Eei myenb, Bx'q tovb yia Qiaj Jiad uaq teij.
13.21: mq paag maaib teib puvb Waav Eei Yiab zxib pweij naaig, nx'g kuq lov yem pwavq pyaub Baav, nx'g lxb Txb yaag yem uaq, cvj maaib Yiab yuvb yem naaig Zavj heij.
13.14: Navq zu'g zung Eei Faib, yaag Navq pa'ki yuvb kwanb maiq maaib myenb hxvb zunq, kx'g myenb xij Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei pwrnb fivj, kx'g myenb xij pyauj Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei pwrnb teig.
13.6: meib Bua xij zu'g Eyemq weig zu'g zyruq Eei Nxi Tauj fatq a'q. naaiq nxm Nxi xij Tauj Navq nrnb Jiaj uaq taub txb zu'g myetg Eei Jauq taaib.
13.2: xij zu'g yem Bovb Fav kub vwaaig lyepg tomb keb, xij zu'g heug ninb Bua yetg zuvq, xij zu'g yaapq meib Eei puad heug ninb Bua taaib pia'g zruj Lo Eei myenb Eei zivb kcvb.
13.20: Baa-Bi-lon zyrug yetg liud maiq maaib myenb yem, maang kruq maang txig maiq maaib haiq taub yem. maiq maaib aa-lapg myenb yem naaig Zxv Dopg liub, yaag maiq maaib puvj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb yem naaig puvj yuvb.
13.7: weig naaiq mrud taub myenb Eei puad zyrug mau, taub taub Eei Hruq yaag yu'g Revg.
13.19: peiq zwavj kua'q, Baa-Bi-lon kaub Rweig Jiaj, penj Ken-Dia myenb puvj waab mauj Eei Favb laavg zivb. naaiq nxm zivb xij zu'g Navq soj-Dom Zauj ko-mo-laa, tovb Tinb huvb Byenq ninb Bua uaq zang.
13.17: mavg maa'b! yia Zo'q mi-Dia myenb taaib Bx'q Baa-Bi-lon. naaiq teij myenb funj Eaanb maiq lovg Jyenq, ninb Bua yaag maiq zeid a'Neiq Jyem.
13.11: yia xij tivg luvb Diaq Eei zwid laaij zruj Eei x'q sig, yaag tivg myenb waaig myenb weig ninb zruj Eei zwid. yia xij pun zruj mauj Eei myenb Eei Jauq tavj, yaag zatq Jyenq myenb to'g myenb Zevb Lo Eei sig.
13.5: ninb Bua yem ko Eei teib puv, yem Jomg luvb kxn taaib, se zyruq Qiaj Jiad Jyenq xij myetg Revg naaiq zyavb nxm teib puv.
13.9: mavg maa'b! zyruq Eei Nxi xij Tauj. penj to'g haig Eei Nxi, piuj mevb ninb Qiaj Jiad, nrud myenb, weig pun luvb Diaq penj Daub Waav, yaag pun yem teib puv ka'Euad Eei zwib myenb zu'g myetg Revg.
13.16: ninb Bua Eei kub vwaad txv Jyenq ninb Bua zu'g kwc'q mwrng Revg. ninb Bua Eei pyauq zu'g luq, ninb Bua Eei auq yaag zu'g Zaa.
13.4: mwavj maa'b! yem Bov kub vwaaig maaib Qiaj Bwi, Navq tomb kwanb myenb Eei Qiaj Bwi nx. mwavj maa'b! maaib ziaj kua'q myenb Eei Qiaj Bwi, Navq Zamb fivj myenb kapq zunq taaib. nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq tiug Rxib Junb pcv Bx'q Jaaj.
13.10: luvb zavg Eei Leij Zauj Leib kwanb zuvq maiq cvq Zwrtq Fav. Ba'Nxi Zwrtq taaib zuvq Mwavj mig a'q. Laaj yaag maiq ziuj Fav.
13.22: Yiab Jub pen, yem weib wrnq Eei txvj heug, Yiab Juq yem Rweig haig Eei ting heug. Baa-Bi-lon zu'g tivg zwid Eei zyavb hog Tauj fatq a'q. ninb Eei Nxib Eia'g yaag maiq tu'q Tx Daauq.
13.12: yia xij pun paamb myenb kaub zo'g zyen Jyem, se kaub zo'g o-fi Eei Jyem.
13.15: winb wavq lxd pwatg haiq taub, uaq taub zu'g Ropq Tov. haiq taub zu'g zx'q, uaq taub zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij.
13.13: weig naaiq yia, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, nrud haig, ka'Qiaj pywib Zwrtq uaq Nxi, xij pun luvb tovd, paamb ken yaag zu'g Dang Pyen ninb Eei txvj.
13.1: naaiq se aa-mxtq Eei txn, i-saa-yaa, pwatg laaug yaavb kxvq Tauj Baa-Bi-lon Eei waag.

26.18: yia Bua yaag maaib Jyenq sin, mun tu'q Kruq, mq paag Kuvj yuvd Zwrtq Eei se Navq Ryaauj. yia Bua maiq haib zruj haiq Euvg weig Fruj luvb Diaq, yaag maiq maaib myenb Zwrtq seij yem paamb ken.
26.3: lyepg tivg Hruq Eei myenb meib pun maaib pcvb xn tunb yunb Eei, weig zu'g ninb Kauj meib.
26.8: o zyruq aag, yia Bua kan meib syemq Eei Jauq, yaag zuaq Jyenq meib. yia Bua Eei Hruq kaub xij Jiaj Eei se meib Eei mevb Zauj hxpg zu'g Javj Eei Buaj.
26.19: mq paag meib Eei myenb, taig mivb cvj xij zyavb Jyenq, ninb Bua Eei sei cvj xij navb taaib. pweij Jyenq niab Buv Eei myenb aa'b! Eia taaib Fyenb yrub Eei paauj Ruv. meib Tevj Dau Eyemd Navq luvb Dxm Eei Byuvb swiq, meib yaag xij pun taig mivb laub Eei myenb cvj navb taaib.
26.9: luvb mwrnd zang yia Eei Hruq Javj haig meib, yia Eei Hruq Qa'q lxd meib. weig zu'g meib yem luvb Diaq syemq Eei zyavb hog, luvb Diaq myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q zruj hxpg Eei Jauq.
26.7: Kuq myenb yavb Eei Jauq se pcvb Eei. zivj Eei zyruq aag, meib pun Kuq myenb Eei Jauq ywrnb.
26.5: ninb pun yem Lav Eei txvj uaq teij Zauj yem Lav Eei zivb Fiag Revg, Baav Fiag Tauj Dau. zuvq Baav Fiag Tauj niab Buv.
26.16: zyruq aag, ninb Bua zu'g Kruq Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua taaib lxd meib. meib Bx'q Faauj ninb Bua uaq zang, ninb Bua Qa'q kxvq Zwrtq tauj kauj Eei waag.
26.20: yia Eei pc'g fivj aa'b! xij zu'g pia'g meib Bua Eei ken, kwrn Jyenq kcvb, xij zu'g pivj Jyenq lovg ti'q tyen zyavb hog zuaq Tauj ninb Qiaj Jiad Eei zyavb hog Jiaj.
26.17: Navq msia'q aaq lamb Dutq sin Eei zyavb hog, mun tu'q Kruq haig, Qa'q heug. o zyruq aag, yia Bua yem meib Eei Ra'Myen Navq uaq nx.
26.14: ninb Bua taig mivb, maiq haib cvj tu'q mcvg zyavb, ninb Bua yem yemb ken, maiq haib navb. meib tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid yaag myetg ninb Bua, meib sxtq kwavg ninb Bua Eei mevb hog, maiq maaib haiq taub Javj tu'q ninb Bua.
26.4: xij zu'g yetg liud Kauj zyruq, weig zu'g zyruq Tinb huvb se yetg liud yem Eei la'pyeiq.
26.21: mavg maa'b! zyruq xij yem ninb kanb yem Eei txvj Zwrtq taaib tivg luvb Diaq myenb zruj txvg Eei zwid. Dau xij hing Zwrtq zu'g taij taig Eei myenb Eei Ryaamq, maiq cvj pyopq zu'g taij taig Eei myenb.
26.2: Kxi Gxi zivb kcvb pun uaq nxm kua'q Eei Kuq myenb, se kan lovj Tinb huvb Eei myenb pia'g taaib.
26.6: zauj zyrug Zaaiq Jyenq, se myenb Jomg myenb Eei zauj, Zauj tavb tonj myenb Eei zaub Zaaiq.
26.13: o zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb aag, Zwrtq liud meib, maaib Eiag Eei zyruq kunq yia Bua, mq paag yia Bua Kuvj Eyemg meib Eei Buaj Navq.
26.12: o zyruq aag, meib xij lyepg pcvb xn pun yia Bua. yia Bua zruj zyavj Eei yetg zuvq se meib weig yia Bua zruj.
26.15: o zyruq aag, meib Tipq yia Bua Eei kua'q Eei pc'g fivj, meib Tipq yia Bua Eei kua'q Eei pc'g fivj, meib zyrug tu'q myenb Taaib. meib Zapq kua'q Eei puvb puv kapg Jaaij Javq Zwrtq.
26.11: o zyruq aag, meib Eei puad suv Lav, ninb Bua yaag maiq pwatg. Toq pun ninb Bua pwatg meib weig meib Eei pc'g fivj Jxm Hruq, ninb Bua zyrug zu'g Eaiq. Toq pun meib Eei winb wavq zu'g trud puaq Qwi.
26.1: tovb uaq Nxi yem yu-Daa teig ninb Bua xij paauj naaiq tiub Ruv. yia Bua maaib nxm wrnq Eei zivb, Tinb huvb Eei Fruj en zruj zivb laatg weib Jyenq.
26.10: sij kxvq Zeij en pun x'q myenb, ninb maiq ho'g hiuq zruj hxpg Eei Jauq. ninb yem Hruq zivj Eei myenb Eei teib puv zruj x'q sig, yaag zia'q maiq tu'q zyruq Eei haavb taaub.

28.18: meib Bua Zauj zu'g taig Eei Qa'q lyepg Eei vcvg waag zyrug paaig mig a'q. Zauj yemb ken kxvq hxpg Eei waag yaag lyepg maiq wrnq. maaib tomb ze'g naang Navq uam yemj taaib, meib Bua zyrug zu'g Zaaiq Fiag Revg.
28.8: nxmb nxm tiab kub vwaaig maaib loq Eei ka'naaiq kua'q pwavq, maiq maaib yetg nxm txvj maiq laib Lopq.
28.3: e-faa-im Eei tiuq Gwin myenb Zevb Lo uaq nxm pyavb nivq, xij zu'g Zaaiq Fiag zaub Diaq.
28.21: zyruq xij Jiad taaib Navq ninb yem pe-laa-sim Bov uaq zang. ninb xij Qiaj Jiad Navq yem ki-Be-on hxvd, weig zruj ninb Eei kov, ninb Eei kanb Euvg kov. ninb zruj ninb Eei sig, ninb Bua'g hxvb Eei sig.
28.14: weig naaiq meib Bua Wrtq myenb Eei myenb aa'b! tovb yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb kunq naaiq teij pc'g fivj Eei myenb, mwavj zyruq Eei waag maa'b!
28.23: xij zu'g pcv mnxmb mwavj yia Eei Qiaj, xij zu'g lovg Hruq mwavj yia kxvq Eei waag.
28.6: ninb xij pun syemq zwid Jyen maaib pcvb fim Eei Hruq, xij pun yem zivb kcvb uaq teij maaib Qa'q vcvg tu'q hivb taaib Bx'q Jaaj Eei myenb.
28.2: mavg maa'b! zyruq maaib taub maaib Qa'q henq haig Eei myenb Navq kxv tomb px'g Zauj tomb Ryaaub Jia'q, yaag Navq seij haig Eei Byuvg Fiag taaib yemj. ninb xij lovg Qa'q zxi Fiag Tauj Dau.
28.20: Zruj navq haig, suv maiq za'g zauj, swavj yaag hepg, Txvq maiq Bweid sin.
28.24: zruj Deig Eei myenb laib Dau weig zwavj ka'naaiq, ninb zanb zang laib Jyenq mivb fai? ninb zanb zang Qruq nia kwaaib ywrnb fai?
28.28: zruj Fuaq Eei laavb zi'g xij zu'g lovg mxg mxg, myenb maiq zeid yetg liud Bx'q. maiq kunq ninb lovg ninb Eei maab Zia Eei Ziab yenb vanj, ninb Eei maad maiq zeid mxg.
28.7: naaiq teij myenb laaij a'vung tiuq luvb luvb laib laib Eei, yaag laaij tiub Kuq livb livb Kivb Kiv. sai myenb Zauj trug waag myenb laaij tiub Kuq luvb luvb laib laib Eei, yaag laaij a'vung tiuq ninb Bua movb movb lovb lovb. ninb Bua laaij tiub Kuq livb livb laib laib Eei. pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig ninb Bua pia'g Hruq txvg. syemq zwid Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua syemq maiq hxpg.
28.29: naaiq yaag zeid yem nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq taaib. ninb Faauj Eei waag za'kevb Bua'g hxvb haig, ninb Eei Zovb mevb yaag Peij fug haig.
28.19: naaiq teij ze'g naang haiq zang Jiaj zyrug kwaatq meib Bua mivb. Dxmb Dxm, luvb Nxi luvb mwrnd ninb xij kwaatq Jiaj mivb.” sij kxvq pia'g Hruq naaiq teij waag zyrug haid za'kevb! kamb Riaj haig.
28.17: yia xij pun pcvb fim Eei Jauq zruj Laav Dx'g, yaag pun zruj hxpg Eei Jauq zruj tivg za'g Eei Laav. px'g xij kwaatq meib Bua Daaub Kauj Eei txvj, uaq teij kxvb pc'g Eei waag. uam xij yemj meib Bua pivj Eei txvj.
28.27: myenb maiq lovg Niaq Eei Jaab sig vanj Tovb hau, yaag maiq lovg Ziab yenb vanj yenb si. xij zu'g lovg Dyavb Donj Bx'q Tovb hau, yaag lovg pyaaq Bx'q yenb si.
28.11: sij kxvq meib Bua maiq mwavj yia, Tinb huvb xij lovg kanb fivj myenb Zauj kanb Euvg waag Zauj meib Bua kxvq.
28.5: Tauj uaq Nxi nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq zyrug Navq nxm Favb laavg nivq, Navq Rweig haig Eei nivq pun ninb zevg Fiag Eei pc'g fivj Dovj Jyenq.
28.9: “ninb xij Faauj pun haiq taub hiuq? ninb Pxq mevb ninb zunb Eei waag pun haiq taub? pun Zo'q ho'g kwavg Exj Eei fu'Jweiq, pun Javb Jav leib Exj Eei kub vwaad fai?
28.16: weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia yem si-on lyepg nxm la'pyeiq zruj kxnb Do'q, se seij Jiaj Eei la'pyeiq. penj pyaub kx'q Jaaij haig Eei la'pyeiq weig lyepg wrnq Eei kxnb Do'q. ‘haiq taub syenj Kauj zyrug maiq zu'g Waav.’
28.4: naaiq Favb laavg Eei pyavb xij ziag Revg, tovb yem Daub Jung Eei hxvb taaub kub vwaaig. se Navq zua'g Daavg Zunb ken Nxi Eei vovb Exj pyruq. myenb yetq pwatg zyrug kc'q taaib Eang mig a'q.
28.10: weig zu'g ninb kxvq, livg Jaa livg, livg Jaa livg, leib latg Jaa leib latg, leib latg Jaa leib latg, yem naaiq ti'q tyen, yem uaq ti'q tyen.”
28.22: Navq naaig meib Bua maiq tuvq Wrtq. Riaj meib Bua Eei limg Jaa zyetg. zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, Buaj yia, ninb tivg zyavj myetg Revg zyavb nxm kua'q.
28.12: ninb xij kxvq pun mwavj Eei myenb Navq zinb Daavg ninb kxvq, “naaiq se hitq Eei txvj, xij pun Kruq Eei myenb tu'q hitq,” yaag kxvq, “naaiq se hitq Kwrnj Eei txvj,” mq paag ninb Bua maiq Kavq mwavj.
28.15: meib Bua kxvq, “yia Bua Zauj zu'g taig Eei Qa'q lyepg Jiad vcvg waag. yia Bua Zauj yemb ken kxvq hxpg. maiq kunq maaib tomb! ze'g naang Navq uam yemj taaib, maiq haib zu'g yia Bua. weig zu'g yia Bua lovg kxvb pc'g Eei waag zruj yia Bua Daaub Kauj Eei txvj, yaag lovg Jaaq Eei waag zruj txvj pivj.”
28.13: weig naaiq zyruq Eei waag zyrug Navq naaiq weig ninb Bua. livg Jaa livg, livg Jaa livg, leib latg Jaa leib latg, leib latg Jaa leib latg. yem naaiq ti'q tyen, yem uaq ti'q tyen. ninb Bua zyrug mivb yaag ta'Ryaauj Dxpg, zu'g mun, zu'g Lopq Jyenq yaag zu'g zx'q.
28.1: e-faa-im xij zu'g Kruq a'q. ninb Eei Favb laavg xij ziag Revg, Navq ninb tiuq Gwin Eei pyeiq zeiq Dovj Zi'q taaib Eei pyavb nivq, uaq teij Favb laavg Eei pyavb ziag Revg, se yem Eang peuq hopq zuvj uaq teij Gwin mivb Eei myenb Eei mGxvq.
28.26: weig zu'g ninb Eei Tinb huvb Faauj ninb, yaag Faauj ninb zruj tu'q hxpg.
28.25: ninb kwaaib Dau ywrnb, Ga'haaq ninb zwavj Tovb hau yaag haad yenb si maiq zeid? ninb zwavj Byaub witq ziuj ninb Eei hxvb, yaag zwavj Byaub Baa-li hxpg ninb Eei txvj, cvj zwavj ta'Zaanq yem Deib Len maiq zeid?

54.3: weig zu'g meib xij Yaavj mivb zaaij mivb Byaaug. meib Eei zeib fun yaag tu'q Ripg Zamb kua'q, yaag tu'q lyepg vwaab kxn yem ninb Bua Eei zivb Waav.
54.8: yia ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq zyrug pivj yia Eei Myen maiq mavg meib Du'g tavb Navq, mq paag yia yetg liud xij Namq meib, Kxb lyenb meib.”   zyruq, tovb zua'g meib uaq taub, Navq naaiq nx kxvq.
54.9: “naaiq teij sig weig yia se Navq no-yaa Eei luvb Diaq. uaq zang yia lcvd maiq pun Byuvb swib imj cvj yemj luvb Diaq Navq yem no-yaa Eei zyavb hog yemj nx. yia yaag Navq uaq nx hruq waag yia maiq cvj Qiaj Jiad meib, yia yaag maiq hemj meib.
54.7: “yia kwavg meib tavb paaq Navq, mq paag yia za'kevb xij Kxb lyenb meib, txb meib Rwrnj.
54.5: weig zu'g zeij meib taaib uaq taub se meib Eei Goj. ninb Eei Buaj se nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq. i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb se zua'g meib uaq taub. myenb heug ninb penj kxmj luvb Diaq Eei Tinb huvb.
54.16: “mavg maa'b! yia zeij Lia'g zavg. ninb pyomq trub Taanj Zwrtq trub Byetg, yaag zruj Zwrtq ua'g king Pwij xij zu'g lovg ua'g king zruj Eei kov. yia yaag zeij Zwrtq zruj myetg Eei myenb weig zruj waaig.
54.17: zruj Zwrtq hxig meib Eei ua'g king maiq haib hxig maiq zu'g. ta'faanb koj meib Eei myenb, meib haib pun ninb Bua zu'g tivg zwid. naaiq se zyruq Eei pru Ripg taaib Eei pwrng. yia yaag pun ninb Bua tu'q pcvb fim Eei Jauq.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
54.14: meib xij Kauj pcvb fim Eei Jauq lyepg wrnq. meib tu'q leib Gxi zu'g zeij Eei Jauq weig zu'g meib maiq zu'g kamb Riaj. hc'q myenb kamb Riaj Eei sig leib meib ko, weig zu'g hc'q myenb Eei sig maiq taaib nitq fatq meib.
54.4: “maiq tuvq kamb Riaj weig zu'g meib maiq zu'g Eaiq. maiq tuvq Eaiq weig zu'g meib maiq zu'g syrug mavg Piaj Eei Jauq. meib zuvq xij la'Ku'q lunj Eei zyavb hog zu'g Eaiq Eei sig, yaag maiq zu'g cvj Javj laaij zruj aub kwaaq zu'g myenb taanb Eei Jauq.
54.2: “xij zu'g Zapq meib Zxv Dopg liub Eei Dau, Zxv meib Eei Dopg liub Eei Dia Javq, maiq tuvq zanq. xij zu'g pcv meib Zxv Dopg liub Eei Laav Daauq, Bxv meib Zxv Dopg liub Eei tovg wrnq.
54.6: zyruq heug meib Navq zu'g leib kwavg, Hruq mun, Hruq Raub Eei auq, Navq Havb Jeiq lunj Eei auq zu'g leib kwavg.” naaiq se meib Eei Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
54.13: yia, zyruq, xij Faauj meib Eei yetg zuvq naamb Erud. meib Eei naamb Erud yaag xij tu'q pcvb xn Zamq.
54.12: yia xij lovg la'pyeib Jaaij si'q Eei, Rav Eei, zruj meib Eei laaub, lovg Fav Eei, Rav Eei la'pyeiq zruj meib Eei zivb kcvb, yaag lovg la'pyeib Jaaij zruj meib Eei yetg zuvq zivb laatg.
54.15: sij kxvq haiq taub Zo'q myenb kapq zunq Bx'q meib se maiq zeid yia zruj. haiq taub taaib Bx'q meib, uaq taub zuvq xij laaij meib zu'g swei.
54.11: “o zu'g Kruq, zu'g tomb Ryaauj pwrng mivb pwrng taaib yaag maiq tu'q xn Hruq Eei zivb aa'b! yia xij lovg la'pyeiq mcvb Buaq Zeij meib Jiad, lovg Banq Buaq Rav Eei la'pyeib Jaaij lyepg meib Eei kxnb Do'q.
54.1: “o maiq haib maaib scvb yuvd, maiq yuvd Jiaj kub vwaad Eei msia'q txn aa'b! kunq paauj Ruv a'q. maiq mun Jiaj kub vwaad Eei msia'q txn aa'b! xij zu'g Fyenb yrub Eei paauj Ruv, heug Qiaj Lo Eei, weig zu'g kwavg Waav Eei auq zuvq xij maaib fu'Jweiq kaub Zamq txv Jaa Eei msia'q txn.”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
54.10: maiq kunq tomb Bov zu'g zx'q Gxi, fiub Bov zu'g Dang tovd, yia xij yetg liud zyepg zua'q Eei Namq meib, maiq puvj Dxtq. yia lcvd pcvb xn Eei vcvg waag yetg liud maiq leib Gxi meib.” naaiq se zyruq, tovb Kxb lyenb meib uaq taub, kxvq Eei waag.

63.18: meib Eei Zivb Revg pc'g fivj tu'q meib Eei sivj ting penj ninb Bua Eei pwrng weig Zaamj paaq, mq paag ib zang yia Bua Eei winb wavq Zaaiq Fiag.
63.3: “yia kanb Du'g taub Navq yem uaq zxvb Eweib a'vung tiuq, zwavj fivj Bu'Dovj maiq maaib yetg taub myenb Zauj yia yem. yia nrud Jyenq Zaaiq ninb Bua Fiag, Qiaj Jiad haig, zx'q ninb Bua Zaaiq Jyenq. ninb Bua Eei Ryaamq Byaapq zu'g yia Eei lwi, kua'q pwavq yia Eei lwib hruj.
63.8: weig zu'g zyruq kxvq, “ninb Bua Dovg haaij zuvq penj yia Eei pc'g fivj, maiq kxvb pc'g Duaq yia Eei naamb Erud.” ninb zyrug penj ninb Bua Eei Fruj zyruq.
63.19: yia Bua se Navq meib maiq tu'q kunq Jiaj Eei myenb, yaag Navq maiq tu'q kan meib Eei Buaj heug Jiaj Eei myenb.
63.9: yem ninb Bua Eei yetg zuvq Kruq naang, ninb yaag Zauj ninb Bua syrug Kruq. Fruj ninb Bua uaq taub se maiq zeid finb myenb, se zyruq kanb. ninb Namq ninb Bua, Kxb lyenb ninb Bua, zanb zang Lxpq ninb Bua mivb Navq lob Nxi nx Eei Nxib Eia'g.
63.7: yia xij kxvq Tauj zyruq zyepg zua'q Eei Namq myenb, yaag kxvq zyruq zruj hxpg zu'g Zev Eei sig, ziuj ninb Zeij pun yia Bua yetg zuvq sig yaag zruj lovj pun i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun, ei ninb Kxb lyenb yaag Zamb Zamq Eei zyepg zua'q Eei Namq ninb Bua.
63.5: yia mavg yaag maiq maaib haiq taub Tevj. yia Bua'g hxvb haig maiq maaib haiq taub taaib paaq. yia kanb Eei puad zyrug pun yia tu'q hivb, yia Eei ka'Qiaj paaq Jyenq yia.
63.16: meib zruj yia Bua Eei tia maiq kunq apg-laa-ham maiq Eyemg yia Bua, i-saa-laa-en yaag maiq lcvd yia Bua. o zyruq aag, meib zruj yia Bua Eei tia. yem lob Nxi Tauj ib zang meib Eei Buaj se “zua'g yia Bua uaq taub.”
63.17: o zyruq aag, meib weig haiq tiug pun yia Bua leib Gxi meib Eei Jauq, yaag pun yia Bua Hruq vcvg, maiq Taaib meib? Toq weig meib Eei pru Bua yaag weig meib Ripg taaib Eei fivb fivj myenb Rwrnj.
63.14: zyruq Eei sivj livb pun ninb Bua hitq Kwrnj, Navq txb scvb Kuq Fiag Tauj hxvd nx. meib zyrug Navq naaiq nx txb meib Eei pc'g fivj weig kanb lyepg Favb laavg Eei mevb.
63.4: weig zu'g Jaauq win Eei Nxi yem yia Eei Hruq, yia zua'g yia Eei pc'g fivj Eei Havj Tauj a'q.
63.2: meib Eei zxvb zu'q weig haiq tiug si'q? meib Eei lwib hruj weig haiq tiug Navq yem a'vung tiuq Eei zxvb Eweib a'vung tiuq Eei myenb?
63.6: yia nrud haig, Zaaiq Jyenq zwavj fivj. yia Qiaj Jiad Jyenq pun ninb Bua Gwin mivb, yaag toj ninb Bua Eei Ryaamq Fiag Dau.”
63.13: ninb txb ninb Eei pc'g fivj Jiaj Do Eei Kxiq Navq maad yavb teib puvb Waav. ninb Bua yaag maiq Di'q zu'g Dxpg.
63.12: ninb pun ninb henq haig Eei Qa'q yem mo-se Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad, ninb yem ninb Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj zx'q uam pun Gxi, weig lyepg ninb kanb Eei mevb Tauj yetg liud.
63.15: zyruq aag, Toq meib yem kub vwaaig luvb, meib Eei Zivb Revg, Favb laavg Eei txvj, mavg Fiag. meib Jxm Hruq Eei sig Zauj meib Eei Qa'q yem haaij? meib Hruq Namq, Hruq Kxb lyenb tivb Fiag, maiq Tauj yia Bua fai?
63.11: uaq zang ninb Bua Javj lob Nxi Eei zyavb hog, Javj zu'g mo-se Zauj ninb Eei pc'g fivj Eei Nxib Eia'g, txb ninb Bua Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei pc'g fivj Eei pyeiq zeiq Jiaj Kxiq uaq taub yem haaij? zx'q ninb Eei sivj livb yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj uaq taub yem haaij?
63.1: yem e-Dom teig Eei Bo-saa-laa zivb zu'q Jyenq Eomg taaib hovg si'q Eei lwib hruj naaiq taub se haiq taub? zxv Jyenq Favb laavg Eei lwib hruj lovg ninb henq haig Eei tomb Qa'q kan Jauq taaib naaiq taub se haiq taub? “se yia, zyruq, zunb kxvq Fruj en Eei Jauq, maaib tomb Qa'q Fruj myenb.”
63.10: mq paag ninb Bua vcvg Jyenq, pun zyruq Eei sivj livb Raub. weig naaiq ninb zyrug Win Rwrnj penj ninb Bua Eei winb wavq, ninb kanb Zauj ninb Bua Bx'q Jaaj.

8.18: mavg maa'b! yia Zauj zyruq Jiu pun yia Eei naamb Erud yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj zruj yem si-on Bov, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, pun taaib Eei Javb hog Zauj peiq Eei Jauq.
8.8: cvj kwaatq pia'g yu-Daa, yemj Revg Euvb Euvg cvj Jiaj mivb zuvq faauj Tauj Jaav. ninb xij yav Daatq pwavq meib Eei teib puv kub vwaaig, o i-maa-nu-en.”
8.3: yia zyrug mivb yia Eei auq uaq, ninb zyrug maaib Jyenq sin, yuvd tu'q taub txn. zyruq kxvq Buaj yia, “xij zu'g Tevj ninb Zwrtq Buaj heug maa-he-saa-laan-hatg-Batg.
8.21: ninb Bua xij zu'g Kwrnj naanb, Hruq sia Jyenq yrub teib puv. ninb Bua vxg Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua zyrug Qiaj Jiad haig, Zau Myen mavg kub vwaaig luvb, yaag zyruj ninb Bua Eei huvb tiaj Zauj ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb.
8.14: ninb zyrug penj nxm sivj ting mq paag weig i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa Eei i fivj myenb, ninb penj Ryavg zauj Eei la'pyeiq, yaag penj tomb la'pyeiq pun myenb Di'q zu'g Dxpg, penj muvd penj Laav zx'q yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei myenb.
8.6: “weig zu'g yia Eei pc'g fivj Gemb si-lo-aa lyrug Eei uamb syeng, yaag a'Neiq le-sin Zauj le-maa-li-yaa Eei txn.
8.2: yia yaag heug i taub Kauj tu'q wrnq Eei myenb Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj, se u-li-yaa sai myenb Zauj ye-Be-le-Ki-yaa Eei txn, sej-Kaa-li-yaa.”
8.20: xij zu'g mwavj Tinb huvb Faauj Eei waag Zauj zxvb zevj waag. sij kxvq maiq ei naaiq teij waag Eei myenb zuvq maiq tu'q pwatg luvb Dxm Ryruq Eei Fav.
8.7: weig naaiq, yia, zyruq, xij pun yu-fe-titg Daaib henq haig Eei uam yemj, se atg-si-lia huvb Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq Favb laavg. uam zyrug myend Zwrtq lyrug Fiag Daaib Eei tiub tiub Do'q, Zauj i puv Kamj,
8.19: sij kxvq maaib myenb kxvq Buaj meib Bua, “mivb naaig Bruq kwaaj myenb fai kaanq hei myenb, se kxvq waab sapq, kxvq waab Fomg Eei myenb,” pc'g fivj maiq zeid xij zu'g lxd naaig ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb fai? hxpg zu'g weig myenb navb myenb lxd taig mivb Eei myenb fai?
8.17: yia xij zuaq Jyenq zyruq. ninb pwav ninb Eei Myen maiq pun yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun pwatg. yia yaag xij Kauj ninb maaib lamb Namq txvj.
8.11: zyruq lovg ninb henq haig Eei Qa'q Zauj yia kxvq. ninb Kwinj yia maiq tuvq kan naaiq teij pc'g fivj Eei Jauq. ninb Navq naaiq kxvq,
8.9: maang kua'q myenb aa'b! liug leid Bx'q Jaaj, meib Bua zyrug zu'g Bx'q huq yaag kamb Riaj. yem ko Eei yetg zuvq kua'q Eei myenb aa'b! xij zu'g pcv mnxmb mwavj. liug leid Bx'q Jaaj meib Bua zyrug zu'g Bx'q huq yaag kamb Riaj. liug leid Bx'q Jaaj, meib Bua zyrug zu'g Bx'q huq yaag kamb Riaj.
8.16: zx'q zruj zxvb zevj Eei sru Dob Jyenq, zx'q Faauj Eei waag Bx'q Jyenq yenj, Jiu pun yia Eei saib kxj.
8.4: naaiq taub txn maiq kcvb haib heug ‘aa tc, aa maa’ Eei zyavb hog, Daa-matq-katg Eei zinb zxib Zauj yem saa-maa-lia luq taaib Eei ka'naaiq zyrug zu'g atg-si-lia Eei huvb Zaavq mivb Revg.”
8.10: meib Bua kunq taaq za'eij, mq paag maiq haib zruj maiq Zwrtq, kunq Zaavb laavb, mq paag zruj maiq Zwrtq, weig zu'g Tinb huvb Zauj Bua yem.
8.22: uaq zang ninb Bua xij mavg ka'Diaq Dau mq paag pwatg maaib Raub Kruq Zauj Mwavj Eei sig Navq, Zauj Mwavj Eei Kruq naang. ninb Bua yaag xij zu'g zung pia'g mapq mcvb mapq Mwavj Eei txvj.
8.12: “naaiq teij myenb kxvq penj peig Diaq taaq Eei za'eij, meib maiq tuvq kxvq Euvb Euvg penj peig Diaq taaq Eei za'eij. ninb Bua kamb Riaj Eei meib maiq tuvq kamb Riaj, yaag maiq tuvq pun hc'q zu'g kanb.
8.15: myenb Zamq zuvq Di'q zu'g uaq nxm la'pyeiq, ninb Bua zyrug Dxpg huq mwrng Revg. ninb Bua yaag zu'g Laav Lopq, zu'g zx'q mivb.”
8.13: se nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq meib xij zu'g funj Zivb Revg. se tovb ninb meib xij zu'g Taaib, yaag tovb ninb meib xij zu'g kamb Riaj.
8.1: zyruq kxvq Buaj yia, “zx'q Kwaaiq ka'naaiq Lo Eei taaib fiaq Prub Tov Eei Ravg kxvq, ‘maa-he-saa-laan-hatg-Batg’.

9.18: x'q sig Navq trud nx puaq, puaq Qwi Fimb Zru Fimb mwrng. x'q sig yaag Navq puaq lomb Diaq Eei trud, Zwrtq trub syrub ton, Zutg Zutq Eei faauj.
9.3: meib pun uaq nxm kua'q Eei myenb Yaavj Zamq, cvj Jaa Tipq xnb lx'g pun ninb Bua. ninb Bua yem meib Eei Ra'Myen Fyenb yrub, Navq myenb syru kcvb zwavj Fyenb yrub, yaag Navq myenb pun Gxi Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq xnb lx'g nx.
9.8: zyruq pun waag mivb kxvq yaa-Kopq, yaag Dxtq zu'g i-saa-laa-en.
9.19: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Qiaj Jiad zyrug Navq trud nx puaq Dau. pc'g fivj yaag Navq penj puaq trud Eei zaavb, maiq maaib haiq taub lyrub ninb Eei kxb yrud Eei mcvg.
9.9: zwavj pc'g fivj, se e-faa-im myenb, Zauj saa-maa-lia myenb zyrug hiuq a'q. ninb Bua Zev kanb Lo, puvj waab mauj kxvq,
9.7: ninb Eei huvb livg xij Jaa Zamq, pcvb xn Eei Jauq yetg liud maiq Jomg. ninb zuvq xij zweid Daa-witq Eei huvb weig kunq ninb Eei kua'q. ninb xij lovg pcvb fim Zauj zruj hxpg Eei Jauq lyepg Jiad, Zeij wrnq, yem naaiq mivb Tauj yetg liud. nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq xij Jxm Hruq Navq naaiq nx zruj.
9.5: Bx'q Jaaj pcv Eei lcvb lcvg heb Zauj kua'q Jyenq Ryaamq Eei teib teij lwi zuvq zu'g puaq, se txvj zaavb puaq trud.
9.16: weig zu'g txb pc'g fivj uaq teij txb ninb Bua yavb txvg Jauq. tovb ninb Bua txb Eei zwavj myenb zu'g lung.
9.20: ninb Bua yem Byaaug mcvj Zaavq mq paag ninb Bua Zxg Hruq sia. ninb Bua yem zaaij mcvj Eang, ninb Bua yaag maiq peuq. kx'g myenb zuvq Eang kx'g myenb Eei fu'Jweiq.
9.17: weig naaiq zyruq maiq a'Neiq myenb lunj myenb, yaag maiq Kxb lyenb ninb Bua Eei kub hanb fu'Jweiq Zauj aub kwaaq, weig zu'g taub taub maiq kan Tinb huvb yaag zruj x'q sig, mrud taub Eei Rwib kxvq maiq penj Eei waag. maiq kunq Navq naaig, ninb Eei ka'Qiaj Zxg maiq fiu. ninb Zxg suv Jyenq ninb Eei puad.
9.14: weig naaiq zyruq yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj, yetg Nxi ka'Euad Va'q mGxvq Zauj tweiq kwavg, lyemb taaub nxmb Zauj lua'g ti'g kwcvq.
9.4: weig zu'g meib wrtq nauq ninb Bua kaad Eei Dyavb kaad, yaag wrtq nauq Bx'q ninb Bua Eei Ba'taub Eei Dyavb Donj, Zauj zeij ninb Bua Eei pyaab pin, Navq meib Bx'q paaig mi-Dyen myenb uaq Nxi.
9.21: maa-natq-sej xij Bx'q e-faa-im, e-faa-im xij Bx'q maa-natq-sej, ninb Bua yaag lomb Rxib Bx'q yu-Daa. maiq kunq Navq naaig, ninb Eei ka'Qiaj Zxg maiq fiu. ninb Zxg suv Jyenq ninb Eei puad.
9.2: yavb Mwavj ka'Euad Eei pc'g fivj, zuvq tu'q pwatg tomb Fav. yem zu'g taig Eei tovb linb ka'Euad uaq teij, tu'q Fav ziuj Jyenq ninb Bua.
9.6: weig zu'g maaib taub kub vwaad weig yia Bua Zwrtq seij. maaib taub txn Zeij pun yia Bua. ninb tu'q huvb livg kunq yia Bua ninb yaag tu'q Buaj heug Bua'g hxvb Eei Zaavb laavb myenb, henq haig Eei Tinb huvb, yetg liud yem Eei tia, pcvb xn Eei huvb txn.
9.13: mq paag pc'g fivj maiq Rwrnj taaib lxd Bx'q ninb Bua uaq taub, ninb Bua maiq lxd nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq.
9.12: se yem tov puv Eei si-lia myenb, Zauj fai puv Eei fi-li-saa-tia myenb, zuvq mxvj Gxi Rwib na'q i-saa-laa-en. maiq kunq Navq naaig, ninb Eei ka'Qiaj Zxg maiq fiu. ninb Zxg suv Jyenq ninb Eei puad.
9.15: myenb koj Zauj zruj Lo Eei myenb se mGxvq, Faauj Jaaq Eei trug waag myenb se tweiq.
9.11: mq paag zyruq zruj pun yem le-sin Eei winb wavq taaib Bx'q ninb Bua, yaag Zo'q zu'g ninb Bua Eei winb Jaa.
9.1: mq paag yavb naaiq Jiaj, zu'g Kruq uaq teij maiq zu'g cvj yem Mwavj ka'Euad. zinb Daavg Tinb huvb pun sej-Bu-lun teig Zauj napq-Taa-li teig zu'g mavg Piaj, mq paag Ga'haaq ninb xij Taaib kan mivb Kxib Len Eei Jauq, se Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g Jx-Dcn Daaib, fivb fivj myenb Eei kaa-li-li teig.
9.10: “Wib zun Baav mig a'q, mq paag yia Bua xij lovg zu'g taaib Eei la'pyeiq Zeij Jiad. vovb Exj Dyavj zu'g kxij mig a'q, mq paag yia Bua xij zwavj sij-Daa zovb Dyavj tiq.”

32.18: yia Eei pc'g fivj tu'q yem pcvb xn Eei txvj, tu'q yem wrnq Eei pyauq, sekq Ria'g Eei hitq Kwrnj txvj.
32.3: uaq zang haib mavg tu'q pwatg Eei myenb Eei mziv maiq Fipq. mwavj tu'q haid Eei myenb Eei mnxmb yaag mwavj tu'q haid a'q.
32.8: myenb lovj myenb taaq lovj Eei za'eij, ninb Kuvj zruj Jyenq lovj Eei sig mivb.
32.19: maiq kunq twib px'g Fiag Bx'q Dyavb lomg Baav, zivb yaag zu'g paaig Revg,
32.9: meib Bua Kub yem Kub Eang Eei msia'q txn aag, Jiad taaib mwavj yia Eei Qiaj. pwavq eij Eei sia'q aag, pcv mnxmb mwavj yia xij kxvq Eei waag.
32.7: zruj waaig sig Eei myenb Eei za'eij se x'q haig, Kuvj taaq Zwrtq x'q Eei za'eij Navq weig lovg kxvb pc'g Eei Jauq pun myenb Jomg myenb zu'g myetg, maiq kunq tavb tonj Eei myenb Toq Eei waag hxpg.
32.5: yem naaiq mivb myenb maiq Taaib myenb Vovj myenb zruj Lo, yaag maiq Taaib zruj waaig sig Eei myenb,
32.16: pcvb fim Eei Jauq zyrug yem teib puvb Waav, zruj hxpg Eei Jauq yaag yem Daub lovj.
32.20: meib Bua yem tiub tiub Do'g Len zwavj ka'naaiq, puvj meib Bua Eei vovb Zauj lxb sweib Jyenq mivb Eang miaq, naaiq Euvg myenb zyrug maaib xnb lx'g.
32.17: zruj hxpg Eei Jauq pun myenb maaib pcvb xn, zruj hxpg Eei Jauq Zwrtq Taaib pcvb Eei sig Zauj maaib lamb Kauj txvj weig yetg liud.
32.14: huvb ting xij zu'g kwavg Waav, maaib pc'g fivj Zamq Eei zivb Kuvj Revg mig a'q. Bovb aiq weib wrnq Eei txvj Zauj laaub xij zu'g yetg liud penj Daub Waav, zruj Yiab lxb a'Neiq Eei txvj Zauj yuvb kwanb Eei miab Zyavq.
32.4: Rwib syepq Eei myenb haib Namq tu'q Tov yaag pia'g Hruq, a'lanb Eei myenb haib kxvq waag Byaavg yaag mevb Eei.
32.2: taub taub myenb zyrug Navq nxm txvj pivj Ryaauj, yaag penj pivj Byuvb Ryaauj Eei txvj, yaag Navq Do'q lyrug Daub Gaai, Navq Txvq laavb Eei la'pyeiq yem teib puvb haand.
32.6: weig zu'g Vovj Eei myenb kxvq Vovj Eei waag. Hruq Kuvj Namq zruj x'q sig Navq. ninb zruj sig maiq hxpg Tinb huvb yaag kxvq txvg zyruq Eei Jauq, weig pun Hruq sia Eei myenb vxg Jyenq yem, pun Jaav Gaatq Eei myenb maiq tu'q uam hopq.
32.13: xij zu'g weig yia Eei pc'g fivj Eei Dau Kuvj Zwrtq Fimb Zru Fimb mwrng, yaag weig Fyenb yrub Eei zivb Zauj yetg zuvq xnb lx'g Eei pyauq Raub Eyemq.
32.12: meib Bua xij zu'g weig meib Bua lovj haig Eei livb teig Zauj zyavb tu'q kitq Eei a'vung Mei Rwei la'Kwrtq.
32.15: zuaq Tauj sivj livb yem kub vwaaig toj Fiag yia Bua, Daub Waav zyrug Tiuq penj Daub lovj, Daub lovj yaag pwatg Navq Dyavb lomg.
32.11: meib Bua Kub yem Kub Eang Eei msia'q txn aag, xij zu'g sin zinj. meib Bua pwavq eij Eei sia'q aag, xij zu'g Hruq Waav Eanb Eanb Eei. Jaiq Gxi lwib hruj, sai Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru.
32.1: mavg maa'b! maaib taub huvb tiaj xij Hruq zivj Eei kunq. maaib tomb Jyen xij pcvb fim Eei kunq.
32.10: pwavq eij Eei msia'q txn aag, cvj Jiaj yetg Havj levb meib zyrug Hruq Waav, sin zinj, weig zu'g a'vung Wivj maiq maaib pyruq. syru pyruq Eei zyavb hog yaag maiq Tauj.

21.3: weig pwatg naaiq teij sig yia Eei sin mun tu'q Kruq haig, mun Eei Jauq lyemb zeib hxig yia Navq msia'q txn mun kub vwaad nx. laaij yia haid Eei, yia Hruq Waav haig a'q. laaij yia pwatg Eei, yia kamb Riaj haig.
21.8: zuaq mavg Eei myenb heug Jyenq kxvq, “zyruq aag, yia Nxib Nxi zanb zang sruq Jyenq laaub. mwrnb mwrnd yia yem yia zuaq Eei txvj.
21.9: mavg maa'b! maaib keb maad myenb taaib. ninb Bua yetg txij yetg txij keb Jyenq maad taaib. syruq kcv myenb zyrug kxvq, ‘Baa-Bi-lon Baav mig a'q. Baav mig a'q. ninb Eei zyenb Eei yetg zuvq miub favj,   zyruq Bx'q huq Tauj ka'Diaq Dau a'q.’+”
21.7: ninb haiq zang pwatg myenb keb maad, se penj yetg txij yetg txij Eei, cvj maaib keb lxb myenb Zauj keb lxb Txb myenb, ninb xij zu'g lovb lovj Eei mwavj. za'kevb lovb lovj Eei mwavj.”
21.5: ninb Bua Beng Naavj Lo Eei, zx'q zi'g timg Jyenq yrug Eang yrug hopq a'q. o pcvb pyeiq aa'b! Jiad taaib maa'b! zx'q yrub Raatq Txvb paaib.
21.16: weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq nx Buaj yia, “yetg Havj ka'Euad ziuj Zivq kov Eei Havb sruj, Ke-Daa Eei yetg zuvq Favb laavg xij Jiaj mig a'q.
21.17: Ke-Daa pwrnq Jwavb zinj henq haig Eei pcv zevg Fiag Eei myenb yaag zo'g.” naaiq se zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, kxvq liud a'q.
21.14: Jaav Gaatq Eei myenb taaib lxd meib Bua. meib Bua xij zu'g pun uam ninb Bua hopq. meib Bua yem Te-maa teib puv Eei myenb aa'b! txb Fuaq mivb pun pyauj sig Eei myenb Eang.
21.4: yia Eei Hruq Waav, lung Revg. kamb Riaj kau, sin zinj mig a'q. yia a'g tu'q zuaq Tauj Ryemb yaavb, mq paag Kuvj pun yia kamb Riaj, sin zinj Navq.
21.2: maaib Ywavb Yenq hing yaavb Eei sig pun yia tu'q pwatg. maaig myenb Eei myenb maaig myenb a'q. myetg Eei myenb, myetg a'q. o e-laam myenb aa'b! faauj mivb Bx'q a'q. o mi-Dia myenb aa'b! mivb weib Jyenq maa'b! tovb Baa-Bi-lon hxig myenb Tauq Eei yetg zuvq tomb Qiaj, yia, zyruq, pun tivb mig a'q.
21.6: zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq Buaj yia, “mivb a'q. mivb lxd myenb syruq kcv. ninb pwatg haiq Euvg pun ninb zunb kxvq a'q.
21.13: naaiq se kxvq aa-laa-Bia Eei waag. meib Bua kapq txig zruj scvb eij Eei De-Daan myenb aa'b! meib Bua Zxv Dopg liub yem aa-laa-Bia teib puvb Waav Eei Dyavb lomg.
21.12: syruq kcv myenb tau, “luvb Dxm xij Tauj, mq paag luvb mwrnd yaag taaib. sij kxvq xij naaig, kunq naaig a'q. kunq cvj Rwrnj taaib.”
21.15: weig zu'g ninb Bua pyauj Ru'g Daauq, pyauj pcv Zwrtq Paiq Eei Ru'g Daauq Zauj pcv Jyenq Eei Jwavb zinj, Zauj Bx'q Jaaj zu'g Kruq Eei sig.
21.11: naaiq se kxvq Du-maa Eei waag maaib taub yem sej-i heug yia, “syruq kcv myenb aa'b! luvb mwrnd Zxg maaib Dovg haaij laub? luvb mwrnd Zxg maaib Dovg haaij laub?”
21.1: naaiq se kxvq Tauj Kxib Len Eei teib puvb Waav Eei waag. Navq Ryaaub zung yem ne-kepg pwrng Jiaj nx, winb wavq yem teib puvb Waav, yem kamb Riaj Eei teib puv taaib.
21.10: o yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb aag, meib Bua zu'g Bx'q Navq Bx'q Byaub, yaag zu'g pwrng Navq pwrng Zu'q nx. yia haid nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, se i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, kxvq Eei waag, yia zyrug zunb Buaj meib Bua mig a'q.

64.3: meib zruj tovb yia Bua Namq maiq Tauj Eei Bua'g hxvb sig. meib Fiag taaib, Bov yaag yem meib Eei Ra'Myen tovd.
64.8: mq paag zyruq aag, meib Zxg zruj yia Bua Eei tia. yia Bua zruj pa'naib nia, meib se nanq nia zavg. yia Bua yetg zuvq penj meib Eei puab taub zruj Eei kov.
64.9: o zyruq aag, maiq tuvq Qiaj Jiad Zamq Jiaj Daavg, maiq tuvq yetg liud Javj yia Bua Eei zwid. yia Bua Toq meib mavg Jyenq yia Bua weig zu'g yia Bua yetg zuvq penj meib Eei pc'g fivj.
64.7: maiq maaib haiq taub tauj kauj Jrub meib Eei mevb. maiq maaib haiq taub tovd sin nanq Jyenq meib, weig zu'g meib pwav meib Eei Myen, maiq mavg yia Bua, yaag zx'q yia Bua kwavg Jyenq yem yia Bua Eei zwid ka'Euad.
64.5: meib zipq a'Neiq zruj hxpg Eei myenb, se Javj meib Eei Jauq Eei myenb. mavg maa'b! meib Qiaj Jiad weig zu'g yia Bua paamd zwid. yia Bua yem zwid ka'Euad laub Eei, uaq Euvg yia Bua haib tu'q Fruj fai?
64.4: yem lob Nxi taaib maiq maaib haiq taub haid Jiaj, fai haiq taub Eei mnxmb tu'q mwavj Jiaj, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub Eei mziv pwatg Jiaj haiq taub Tinb huvb Zwrtq liud meib, tovb Tevj zuaq ninb uaq teij myenb.
64.2: Navq trud zia'g yetg Dwi Dyavb Gwaab Eav puaq uam Bweij, weig pun meib Eei winb wavq hiuq tu'q meib Eei mevb, zyrug pun maang kua'q yem meib Eei Ra'Myen sin zinj.
64.6: yia Bua yetg zuvq zyrug Navq maiq Zivb Revg Eei myenb. yia Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq Kuq sig yaag Navq laib Lopq Eei lwib hruj. yia Bua yetg zuvq Navq Dyavb nxmb nx, Eauj Revg. yia Bua Eei zwib nipg yaag Navq Ryaauj nx, pwrng yia Bua mivb.
64.12: zyruq aag, maaib naaiq teij sig meib Zxg haib Eyend tu'q Jyenq Eei fai? meib Zxg maiq Ko lo, yaag pun yia Bua zu'g syrug syem haig Eei naang zivb fai?
64.11: yia Bua Zivb Revg, Rweig haig Eei sivj ting, tovb yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij yem weig Zev meib Eei txvj, zu'g trud puaq Qwi. yia Bua funj Jaaij Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq yaag zu'g paaig waaig Revg mig a'q.
64.1: o zyruq aag, Toq meib petq Gxi luvb Fiag taaib pun Bov yem meib Eei Ra'Myen tovd
64.10: meib Eei Zivb Revg zivb penj teib puvb Waav. lyemb si-on penj teib puvb Waav, ye-lu-saa-lem penj paaig Waav Eei txvj.

57.18: yia pwatg ninb zruj Eei Jauq mq paag yia Zxg xij zxg ninb. yia xij txb ninb, cvj xn ninb Eei Hruq.
57.3: “mq paag kaanq hei msia'q txn Eei txnb Jweiq Zauj Yenj Goj fai maaig pwrnb sin Eei myenb Eei naamb Erud, xij zu'g taaib naaiq maa'b!
57.8: yem kcvb Ga'haaq mcvj yaag yem kcvb zrug meib Bua lyepg meib Bua Eei Javb hog. meib Bua kwavg yia, Ryen Gxi swavj, zyrug faauj Zruj Kxi swavj Javq. meib Bua Zauj ninb Bua kxvq hxpg, meib Bua Namq ninb Bua Eei Zruj, yaag mavg ninb Bua lcvb kcvq Eei sin.
57.19: yia pun Raub Eyemq Eei myenb Zev yia.”   zyruq kxvq, “pcvb xn, pun yem ko, yem fatq Eei myenb tu'q pcvb xn. yia yaag xij zxg ninb.”
57.9: meib Bua txb Jyenq yrub mivb Tauj mo-lekq zyenb, yaag Jaa teij uamb Daav. meib Bua Paaiq meib Bua Eei kovb zob mivb ko Eei txvj, zuvq Fiag Tauj yemb ken.
57.7: yem Lav haig Eei Bovb Lav meib Bua timg txvj pweij, yaag yem naaig fovg hxg ziag.
57.5: meib Bua yem Ba'ov zwei Dyavj Bu'Dovj yaag yem tiub tiub Dyavb Eyemd ka'Diaq saanj. meib Bua yem hxvd ka'Euad, yem la'pyeib vaamb ka'Diaq, taij meib Bua Eei naamb Erud.
57.16: weig zu'g yia maiq yetg liud Rcv, yaag maiq zanb zang Qiaj Jiad. Raub heij yia zeij taaib maaib mcvg Eei myenb yem yia Eei Ra'Myen Hruq namj.
57.20: mq paag x'q myenb Navq Kxiq Eei uam myetq mivb myetq taaib, maiq haib yem tivg. uamb laavg pctq Zwrtq uamb pamg Zauj laib Lopq Eei uamb Fo'g.”
57.17: yia Qiaj Jiad ninb weig zu'g ninb mauq zyrug paamd zwid. yia Bx'q ninb, yia pwav yia Eei Myen maiq mavg ninb yaag Qiaj Jiad ninb. mq paag ninb Zxg ei Jyenq ninb Hruq hang Eei zruj.
57.14: cvj maaib taub xij kxvq, “zxg Jauq, zxg Jauq, liug leid zyavj Jauq maa'b! zx'q Gxi Txvq yia Eei pc'g fivj Eei Jauq Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq.”
57.4: meib Bua Jyetq haiq taub? meib Bua mxvj Rwib Laij Byetg Wrtq haiq taub? meib Bua zruj Zeuj lung Eei naamb Erud, kxvb pc'g Duaq myenb Eei funb fa'q, maiq zeid?
57.21: yia Eei Tinb huvb kxvq, “x'q myenb maiq haib maaib pcvb xn.”
57.2: ninb Bua tu'q pia'g pcvb xn Eei txvj. Hruq zivj Eei myenb yem zruq ka'Euad tu'q hitq Kwrnj.
57.6: meib Bua yem hxvd ka'Euad, la'pyeib Byaavg Bu'Dovj maaib meib Bua Eei pwrng. naaiq teij, se naaiq teij penj meib Bua Eei pwrng. meib Bua zx'q Ziaq ziag Eei Zauj fovg hxg ziag Eei laavb zi'g fovg hxg ninb Bua. naaiq teij sig yia Navq haiq nx haib Eaavg tu'q?
57.13: meib Bua heug Jyenq Toq Eei zyavb hog, pun meib Bua syru taaib naaiq teij miub favj Fruj meib Bua maa'b! Ryaauj xij zx'q ninb Bua pwrng mivb, lyemb Tauq yetg Rung Qiaj yaag xij pwrng ninb Bua mivb mig a'q. mq paag haiq taub Daaub Kauj yia tu'q Ripg naaiq nxm teib puv, yaag tu'q yia Eei Zivb Revg Bov penj ninb Bua Eei pwrng.”
57.12: yia xij kxvq Zwrtq meib Bua funj kanb zruj tu'q hxpg Zauj meib Bua zruj Eei sig, mq paag naaiq teij maiq Tevj meib Bua.
57.15: weig zu'g yem kaub Lav Jiaj uaq taub, se yetg liud yem, maaib Buaj heug Zivb Revg Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia yem Lav Eei, Zivb Revg Eei txvj, yia yaag Zauj zia'q tu'q kanb txvg, Hruq mun, Eyemg kanb zruj faij Eei myenb yem. weig pun Eyemg kanb zruj faij Eei myenb Eei Hruq fivq Jiad, yaag pun zia'q tu'q kanb txvg, Hruq mun Eei myenb Eei Hruq fivq Jiad taaib.
57.11: “maaib haiq Euvg hc'q meib Bua kamb Riaj Zivj taaib kxvb pc'g, maiq Javj yia, yaag maiq Namq Tauj yia yetg teij? yia Eyend Jyenq maiq Ko lo laub meib Bua Zivj taaib maiq kamb Riaj yia fai?
57.1: Kuq myenb taig mivb yaag maiq maaib haiq taub yem Hruq Javj. kan lovj Tinb huvb Eei myenb kwei seij, maiq maaib myenb mevb pc'g. Kuq myenb taig mivb zyrug pyauj Dutq ze'g naang.
57.10: meib Bua Kruq weig zu'g meib Bua Eei Jauq ko, mq paag meib Bua maiq kxvq, ‘maiq lamb Namq txvj a'q.’ meib Bua cvj maaib Qa'q henq Jiad taaib meib Bua zyrug maiq mau.

23.18: weig Tai-la'q zivb Eei myenb maaid maaig tu'q taaib Eei Eaanb ninb zyrug fuvj pun zyruq. ninb maiq syru fai an Jyenq uaq. mq paag ninb Eei leig zinb ninb pun zavg zyruq Eei myenb, weig pun ninb Bua tu'q Eang peuq yaag zu'q Rweig Eei lwib hruj.
23.3: si-hoj Eei laavb zi'g kan tomb uam taaib. Tai-la'q pavg nai-aa Eei kcvb zwavj tu'q Eaanb pia'g. Tai-la'q zyrug penj maang kua'q maaid maaig Eei tomb txvj.
23.8: haiq taub Navq naaiq taaq za'eij zruj pun Tai-la'q? Tai-la'q Zeij huvb nivq pun myenb. ninb Eei scvb eij myenb se huvb txn, ninb Eei maaid maaig myenb se luvb Diaq myenb Taaib Eei.
23.9: se nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq taaq za'eij, xij pun yetg zuvq zruj mauj Eei Favb laavg zu'g Eaiq, pun luvb Diaq myenb Taaib Eei yetg zuvq myenb zu'g paaig Myen.
23.7: naaiq se meib Bua naug Eitg Eei zivb, tovb lod! Nxi lyepg taaib Eei zivb fai? tovb yem naaig ka'Euad Eei pc'g fivj txb mivb yem ko Eei teib puv lyepg txvj yem fai?
23.5: naaiq teij fyenj Tauj i-yipq, i-yipq myenb weig Tai-la'q Eei Jaub lrug Raub tu'q Kruq haig.
23.16: “o tovb myenb la'Ku'q Eei maaig sin Eei msia'q txn aa'b! txb taanb paab yrub kxmj zivb. xij zu'g Patq taanb paab Kub mwavj, paauj Ruv Zamq, weig pun myenb Javj zu'g meib.”
23.17: Jiaj liud Zyetq zyepg Havj, zyruq zyrug pun Tai-la'q Rwrnj taaib zruj scvb eij Navq lod uaq nx. luvb Diaq maang kua'q cvj Zauj ninb maaid maaig Jiu Tov.
23.14: Taan-sitq Eei Ravq aa'b! xij zu'g Eyemq Bwi, weig zu'g meib weib wrnq Eei txvj zu'g paaig Waav.
23.4: o sai-Dxn aa'b! meib xij zu'g Eaiq a'q, weig zu'g Kxiq, se Kxiq wrnq Eei txvj kxvq, “yia maiq mun Jiaj kub vwaad yaag maiq yuvd Jiaj. yia maiq tu'q txb txn fai sia'q Lo taaib.”
23.2: meib Bua yem Kxib Rru Eei myenb, Zauj yem sai-Dxn Eei scvb eij myenb, tovb kan Kxiq maaid maaig zyrug Tevj meib Bua zruj puvb zua'g Eei myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij zu'g sekq Ria'g.
23.6: Jiaj mivb Tauj Taan-sitq maa'b! meib Bua yem Kxib Rru Eei myenb aa'b! xij zu'g Eyemq Bwi.
23.13: mavg Baa-Bi-lon myenb Eei teib puv maa'b! ib zang maiq penj haiq Euvg myenb a'q! se atg-si-lia myenb tivg zyavj pun Tai-la'q penj Yiab zxib yem Eei txvj. ninb Bua Zeij laaub weib Jyenq zivb, yaag Zc'q Fiag Tai-la'q Eei zwavj huvb ting, pun zivb penj paaig waaig Eei txvj.
23.12: ninb kxvq, “o zu'g zeij Eei sai-Dxn myenb aag, yem naaiq mivb meib maiq tu'q naug Eitg. “Jiad taaib, mivb uaq vaang sai-patg Kxib Rru maa'b! maiq kunq yem naaig meib maiq tu'q pcvb xn.”
23.15: Tauj uaq zang Tai-la'q zyrug zu'g myenb la'Ku'q pwavq Zyetq zyepg Havj, Dovg yetg txig huvb Eei Havb Jeiq laub. Zyetq zyepg Havj Jiaj liud, Tai-la'q zyrug Navq maaig sin Eei msia'q txn paauj Eei Ruv.
23.11: zyruq suv ninb Eei puad Jiaj Kxiq kub vwaaig, ninb Gamq tovd maang kua'q. ninb Fiag livg hatg xij zu'g myetg Revg Kaa-naa-an weib wrnq Eei txvj.
23.1: naaiq se kxvq Tai-la'q Eei waag. o Taan-sitq Eei Ravq aag, xij zu'g Eyemq tu'q Hruq mun haig, weig zu'g Tai-la'q zivb zu'g paaig waaig, maiq maaib pyauq, maiq maaib Ravb prug. yem sai-patg teig Eei Kxib Rru, meib Bua tu'q zipq naaiq teij waag.
23.10: Taan-sitq myenb aa'b! kunq Zwrtq mivb zruj livb teig a'q, Navq myenb yem nai-aa Daaib Len zruj nx. ib zang maiq maaib haiq taub laanb meib Bua.

6.3: ninb Bua naaiq taub heug uaq taub kxvq, “Zivb Revg, Zivb Revg, Zivb Revg, se nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq. ninb Eei Favb laavg pwavq luvb Diaq.”
6.8: yia cvj haid zyruq Eei Qiaj kxvq, “yia xij zu'g Paaiq haiq taub mivb? haiq taub xij weig yia Bua mivb?” yia zyrug kxvq, “yia yem naaiq. Toq Paaiq yia mivb.”
6.9: ninb kxvq Buaj yia, “xij zu'g mivb Buaj naaiq teij pc'g fivj, “+‘meib Bua mwavj liud cvj mwavj, yaag maiq pia'g Hruq. meib Bua mavg liud cvj mavg, yaag mavg maiq pwatg.
6.7: ninb pun naaiq nxm trub Taanj zu'g yia Eei Rwib meij zyrug kxvq, “mavg maa'b! naaiq nxm trub Taanj zu'g meib Eei Rwib meij, meib zruj txvg Eei sig zyrug tu'q zx'q Gxi mig a'q. meib Eei zwid yaag tu'q kwavg liud a'q.”
6.5: uaq zang yia kxvq, “yia zu'g Kruq a'q. yia zuvq zu'g myetg a'q. yia se Rwib meij maiq Zivb Revg Eei myenb. yia yaag yem Rwib meij maiq Zivb Revg Eei pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj, weig zu'g yia Eei mziv tu'q pwatg huvb tiaj, se nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq.”
6.4: weig ninb heug Eei Qiaj Bwi, kcvb Eei kxnb Do'q tovd. syruj yaag pwavq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq.
6.2: yem ninb kub vwaaig maaib sej-laa-fim sruq Jyenq. taub taub maaib Ju'q Kwaaiq Daatq, lovg i Kwaaiq Daatq pwav Myen, i Kwaaiq pwav zauj, i Kwaaiq lovg Daij.
6.6: maaib taub uaq teij sej-laa-fim Daij taaib lxd yia. yem ninb Eei puad maaib zia'g Jyenq Eei trub Taanj, se lovg Lia'g Fapq yem ziab txvb Fapq taaib Eei trub Taanj.
6.13: maiq kunq yem naaig zevg Fiag Eei myenb Zxg maaib zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq, xij zu'g cvj zu'g trud puaq Rung Navq kxij liud Eei zovb Dyavj fai Ba'ov zwei Dyavj, zevg Fiag Eei Dyavb kxn Zxg yem uaq. ninb Eei kxn se Zivb Revg Eei pwrnq.”
6.12: Tauj zyruq pun myenb zu'g kwaatq mivb ko Eei txvj, yem naaiq nxm teib puv zu'g kwavg Waav Eei txvj yaag maaib Zamq.
6.11: yia zyrug kxvq, “o zyruq aag, Dovg haaij laub?” ninb tau, “Tauj zivb zu'g paaig waaig Revg, maiq maaib haiq taub yem uaq, Tauj pyauq maiq maaib myenb yem, teib puv yaag Waav Revg,
6.1: utg-si-yaa huvb kwei seij uaq Havj, yia pwatg zyruq zweid Jyenq lyepg faauj Lav Eei weig. ninb Eei lwib syaamb Jia'q pwavq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq.
6.10: pun naaiq teij myenb Eei Hruq mxvd, pun ninb Bua Eei mnxmb zyetg, yaag pun ninb Bua Eei mziv Buaq. Riaj ninb Bua Eei mziv mavg tu'q pwatg, ninb Bua Eei mnxmb mwavj tu'q haid, ninb Bua Eei Hruq yaag haib mevb pc'g, zyrug Rwrnj taaib tu'q zxg lovj.’+”

55.3: meib Bua xij zu'g pcv mnxmb mwavj yaag taaib lxd yia. mwavj maa'b! meib zyrug tu'q zyavb Jyenq. yia xij Zauj meib Bua lyepg yetg liud Eei vcvg waag, xij zyepg zua'q Eei Namq meib Bua Navq Namq Daa-witq nx.
55.8: zyruq kxvq, “yia Namq Eei sig se maiq Navq meib Bua Namq Eei. yia Eei Jauq yaag maiq Navq meib Bua Eei Jauq.
55.9: weig zu'g luvb leib Dau Dovg haaij Lav, yia Eei Jauq yaag Navq uaq nx kaub Lav meib Bua Eei Jauq, yia Namq Eei sig yaag kaub Lav meib Bua Namq Eei sig.
55.7: x'q myenb xij zu'g leib Gxi ninb zruj x'q Eei Jauq. myenb waaig myenb xij zu'g kwavg Gxi ninb Namq Zwrtq Eei sig. pun ninb Rwrnj taaib lxd zyruq,   zyruq zyrug Kxb lyenb ninb. pun ninb Rwrnj taaib lxd yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Tinb huvb zyrug kwavg Revg ninb Eei zwid.”
55.5: meib maiq hiuq Eei kua'q Eei myenb meib xij heug taaib. maiq hiuq tu'q meib uaq Eei kanb kua'q myenb xij Tiuj taaib lxd meib, weig zu'g zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, se i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb Zeij Favb laavg pun meib.”
55.4: mavg maa'b! yia Paaiq ninb zruj zxvb zevj pun maang fivj myenb, pun ninb zruj pyeiq zeiq, zruj tomb Jyen kunq maang fivj.
55.2: meib Bua weig haiq tiug lovg Eaanb maaid maiq zeid zyen Eang hopq, yaag lovg tu'q taaib Eei kovb zinb maaid maiq Tevj myenb peuq Eei ka'naaiq. lovg Hruq mwavj yia yaag Eang lovj Eei Eang hopq, meib zyrug a'Neiq Eang kaub lovj Jiaj Eei ka'naaiq.
55.6: Zxg lxd tu'q pwatg Eei zyavb hog xij zu'g lxd zyruq. ninb Zxg yem fatq Eei zyavb hog xij zu'g Toq ninb.
55.13: zovb Dyavj xij Zwrtq taaib tiq Fimb Byx'g, faan zi'g lyrub Dyavj yaag Zwrtq taaib tiq Fimb lomg. naaiq se zruj weig zyruq Eei mevb, penj yetg liud Eei Javb hog yaag maiq haib Pai kwavg.”
55.12: meib Bua zuvq xij Fyenb Fyen yrub yrub Eei Zwrtq Baa-Bi-lon. pcvb pcvb xnb xn Eei Rwrnj. tomb Bov fiub Bov xij yem meib Bua Eei Ra'Myen Zwrtq Qiaj Bwi Eei paauj Ruv. yem lomb Waav Eei Dyavj yaag xij Baij puab zaavq.
55.11: yia Eei Rwib kxvq Zwrtq Eei waag se Navq naaig, maiq pc'g pc'g Dxtq, zuvq ziuj yia Namq Eei Jauq zruj, yaag ziuj yia Paaiq mivb Eei za'eij zruj zyavj.
55.1: zyruq kxvq, “Jaav Gaatq Eei taub taub myenb aa'b! taaib maa'b! yem naaiq maaib uam Eei. maiq maaib Eaanb Eei myenb aa'b! taaib maaid Eang. taaib maaid a'vung tiuq Zauj vovb Exj, maiq zu'g Zwrtq Eaanb, maiq funj Jaab zinb.
55.10: Byuvg Zauj sxv yem luvb twib Fiag, yaag maiq taauj Gaav Rwrnj Tauj pun Dau Dxn, Tevj Eim ku'g Eaab zyavb pyruq, pun haad Eim Eei myenb maaib Eim haad, pun Eang Eei myenb maaib laavb zi'g.

44.18: ninb Bua maiq hiuq tu'q yaag maiq haib mevb pc'g. weig zu'g zyruq pwav Jyenq ninb Bua Eei mziv, ninb Bua Zivj mavg maiq pwatg. ninb Bua Eei Hruq zu'g zotq Jyenq, zyrug maiq haib mevb pc'g.
44.8: maiq tuvq kamb Riaj, maiq tuvq Hruq Waav. yia zx'q naaiq teij sig Jaab Daavg kxvq Buaj meib Bua laub haig a'q maiq zeid? meib Bua yaag zruj yia Eei zxvb zevj myenb. Zwrtq liud yia, maaib kanb taub Tinb huvb fai? za'kevb maiq maaib kanb nxm la'pyeiq. yia maiq hiuq kanb nxm.”
44.3: yia xij toj uam Fiag pun Jaav Gaatq Eei myenb, pun Do'q lyrug Fiag Daub Gaai, yia xij toj yia Eei sivj livb Fiag meib Eei hod txig, yaag Zeij fu'q pun meib Eei zeib fun.
44.21: “o yaa-Kopq aag, Javj Jyenq naaiq teij sig, i-saa-laa-en aag, meib zruj yia Eei pru. yia zeij meib taaib weig zruj yia Eei pru. o i-saa-laa-en aag, yia zuvq maiq la'Ku'q meib.
44.14: ninb kxij sij-Daa zovb Dyavj, fai yem uaq lomg kinq tiub sai-patg zovb fai Ba'ov zwei Dyavj, fai ninb zwavj zuvb Dyavj zuaq Byuvg pun Dyavj Lo taaib.
44.23: o luvb aag, Fyenb yrub Eei paauj Ruv weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq nx zruj. o Dau Do Eei txvj, xij zu'g heug Bwi. o zwavj Bov aag, xij zu'g Zwrtq Qiaj paauj Ruv. o Dyavj lomg Zauj yem lomg Eei tiub tiub Dyavj yaag xij zu'g paauj. weig zu'g zyruq zua'g yaa-Kopq, yaag yem i-saa-laa-en tu'q myenb Taaib.
44.6: “zyruq, se i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, zua'g i-saa-laa-en uaq taub, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘yia zruj kxn yaag zruj setq mweid. Zwrtq liud yia, maiq maaib kanb taub Tinb huvb.
44.2: meib yem kub vwaab Bua'g uaq zang yia zeij meib Zwrtq taaib yaag xij Tevj meib. yia, zyruq, Navq naaiq nx kxvq. o yia Eei pru, yaa-Kopq aag, yia kinq taaib Eei myenb, ye-su-lun, maiq tuvq kamb Riaj.
44.20: ninb lovg saaiq txvj Eang hopq. ninb kanb Eei Hruq Duaq ninb mivb txvg. ninb maiq haib Fruj ninb kanb yaag maiq haib kxvq, “yem yia Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad naaiq taub miub favj se Jaaq Eei.”
44.24: zyruq, tovb zua'g meib uaq taub, se meib yem kub vwaab Bua'g ninb zeij meib taaib uaq taub, Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia se zyruq, tovb zeij maang mwrtg uaq taub. yia kanb Du'g taub Zxv luvb. yia Taan Gxi Daub peib uaq zang, maaib haiq taub Zauj yia yem?
44.28: yia yaag kxvq Tauj sai-latq, ‘ninb zruj yia Eei kruj yuvb Eei myenb. ninb yaag xij ei Jyenq yia Eei za'eij zruj. ninb xij kxvq Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem, “xij zu'g cvj Zeij Jiad taaib,” yaag kxvq Tauj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, ‘xij zu'g lyepg kxnb Do'q.”+’
44.7: uaq Euvg maaib haiq taub Navq yia? kunq pun ninb zunb a'q. pun ninb kxvq mevb yaag zweib yetg zweib Eeig Eei Buaj yia. yem yia lyepg yia lob Nxi Eei pc'g fivj taaib maaib haiq Euvg sig Zwrtq? cvj xij maaib haiq Euvg sig Zwrtq? pun ninb Jaab Daavg kxvq xij maaib haiq Euvg.’
44.19: maiq maaib haiq taub Namq Tauj, maiq maaib haiq taub maaib Zovb mevb fai haib pia'g Hruq zyrug kxvq, “yia lovg yetg pwrng zruj zaavb puaq trud, zi'q Fuaq, zi'q xq Eang. yia xij zu'g lovg zevg Fiag Eei Dyavj zruj kamb Riaq Eei ka'naaiq fai? yia xij zu'g kweig Fiag paaij Ganj Dyavj fai?”
44.17: zevg Fiag Eei Dyavj ninb lovg zruj taub zyenb, penj ninb Eei miub favj. ninb zyrug Pua'q Fiag paaij, cvj tauj kauj kxvq, “Toq Fruj yia. meib zruj yia Eei zyenb.”
44.27: yia Buaj Do Eei uam, ‘xij zu'g Gaai maa'b! yia xij pun meib Eei Daaib Gaai Revg.’
44.11: mavg maa'b! Zauj ninb zruj txig Eei myenb yetg zuvq yaag xij zu'g Eaiq. zruj zavg Eei myenb mtaaib paamb myenb Navq. pun ninb Bua taaib zunq, pun ninb Bua sruq Jyenq, ninb Bua zyrug kamb Riaj haig, lomb Rxib zu'g Eaiq.
44.5: naaiq taub xij kxvq, ‘yia se zyruq Eei,’ cvj maaib taub xij Zwrtq Buaj kan yaa-Kopq heug, cvj maaib taub fiaq Jyenq ninb Eei puad, ‘penj zyruq Eei mig a'q,’ yaag Zwrtq ninb Bua kanb Eei Buaj kan i-saa-laa-en.”
44.9: ta'faanb zruj miub favj Eei myenb se maiq lamb lovg. ninb Bua funj Jaaij Eei se maiq zig zinb. ninb Bua Eei zxvb zevj myenb mavg maiq pwatg yaag maiq hiuq, ninb Bua zyrug zu'g Eaiq.
44.16: ninb zx'q pwrng puaq trud, yem uaq zi'q xq Eang peuq. ninb Raauj trud yaag kxvq, “aaq! yia syruq haig. yia pwatg trud mig a'q.”
44.4: ninb Bua xij Zwrtq taaib Navq yem miab Zyavq Eei miaq nx, yaag Navq swib lyemb Dyavj zyavb maaib uam lyrug Jyenq Eei Do'g Len.
44.10: haiq taub zruj zyenb Eei favj fai toj miub favj se zruj Tevj maiq tu'q haiq Euvg Eei favj?
44.22: yia sxtq kwavg meib zruj txvg yia Eei sig Navq Bwrnj meib paamd Eei zwid Navq luvb Dxm Eei mrug. xij zu'g Rwrnj taaib lxd yia weig zu'g yia zua'g liud meib a'q.”
44.12: Lia'g zavg zx'q Lia'q an lrub trud puaq, yaag lovg ninb Eei Jaab sig taaq. ninb lovg Lia'g zweib Zauj ninb henq haig Eei puad taaq taaib. ninb Hruq sia, maiq maaib Qa'q. ninb maiq hopq uam, zyrug mau a'q.
44.15: naaiq teij Dyavj, myenb lovg zruj zaavb puaq, ninb lovg teij puaq trud Raauj Tevj kanb syruq fai lovg zi'q Fuaq. ninb yaag lovg zruj zyenb Eei favj taaib zavg, ninb tiu taub miub favj yaag kweig Fiag paaij.
44.13: Dyavb zavg pcv Laav Dx'g, cvj lovg patq waad Zwrtq favj. cvj lovg zu'g zu'g taaib, lovg ka'naaiq kwetq Wiv Junb. ninb zruj myenb Eei favj yaag Navq myenb nx Rweig Eei, an Jyenq pyauq.
44.1: “o yia Eei pru, yaa-Kopq aag, yia kinq taaib Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb aag, mwavj maa'b!
44.26: yia pun yia Eei pru Eei waag Zwrtq taaib zyen, yaag ziuj yia Eei trug fyenj myenb kxvq Eei waag zruj zyavj. ninb Bua kxvq, ‘ye-lu-saa-lem zuvq xij maaib myenb yem,’ yaag kxvq Tauj yu-Daa, ‘yu-Daa Eei zivb cvj tu'q lyepg taaib, Baav waaig Eei txvj yia cvj tu'q Zeij Jiad.’
44.25: yia pun kxvq zinb hod waag Eei myenb Eei waag penj kxvb pc'g Eei waag, pun Bruq kwaaj Eei myenb maiq Rav maiq Ryepq Eei. yia pun Zovb mevb myenb Eei waag Byenq mivb, pun ninb Bua hiuq Eei Jauq Vovj mig a'q.

20.3: zyruq kxvq, “Navq yia Eei pru, i-saa-yaa, sin lcvb kcvq Eei, heb yaag maiq taapg, Jiaj naaiq Jiaj uaq pua Havj weig zruj Javb hog Zauj peiq Eei Jauq tonq i-yipq Zauj e-Ti-o-pia,
20.4: Navq naaig atg-si-lia huvb xij kwaatq i-yipq myenb mivb yaag Zaavq e-Ti-o-pia myenb, maiq kunq koj lunj, sin lcvb kcvq Eei, heb yaag maiq taapg, kub Kwrtg nxm Zwrtq, pun i-yipq myenb zu'g Eaiq.
20.2: uaq zang, zyruq lovg aa-mxtq Eei txn, i-saa-yaa, trug waag. zyruq Buaj ninb, “meib Jaiq Gxi meib sai Jaaiq Eei la'maab Diab Zru yaag Tutq Gxi heb.” i-saa-yaa zyrug ei Jyenq zruj, sin lcvb kcvq Eei, heb yaag maiq taapg, Jiaj naaiq Jiaj uaq.”
20.6: uaq Nxi yem naaiq tiub Kxib Len Eei myenb zyrug kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! yia Bua maaib lamb Namq Eei yaag pyauj mivb lxd Tevj yia Bua pyauj Dutq atg-si-lia myenb uaq teij pwavb Eei sig. uaq Euvg, yia Bua ni? yia Bua Navq haiq nx haib pyauj tu'q Dutq?’+”
20.5: Kauj e-Ti- o-pia maaib lamb Namq yaag puvj waab mauj i-yipq uaq teij zyrug kamb Riaj yaag zu'g Eaiq.
20.1: atg-si-lia Eei huvb, saa-kxn, Paaiq ninb Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq mivb atg-Dotg uaq Havj, ninb zyrug mivb Bx'q cvj Zaavq tu'q uaq nxm zivb mig a'q.

5.18: lovg Jaaq Eei sig zruj Laav Tx zwid kan Jyenq mivb, yaag Tx x'q sig Navq lovg Laav Tx Zia uaq teij, xij zu'g Kruq a'q.
5.8: meib Bua yetg nxm pyauq Rcv Jiaj yetg nxm pyauq, yetg Rov Deig Rcv Jiaj yetg Rov, Tauj Rcv Revg Dau. Kuvj zevg kanb yem uaq Navq. naaiq Euvg myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q.
5.3: “o ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj Zauj yu-Daa myenb aa'b! Toq tunj yia Zauj yia Eei a'vung Wivj Eei sig.
5.21: ziuj kanb Eei mziv mavg, funj kanb maaib Zovb mevb, yaag ziuj kanb mavg, Namq taaib kanb kwai uaq teij, xij zu'g Kruq a'q.
5.14: yemb ken zyrug Bc Jaav, mxvj Gxi tomb Rwib, na'q Revg yem ye-lu-saa-lem zruj Lo Eei myenb Zauj myenb maanb, lyemb zruj Fyenb yrub naug Eitg Eei myenb.
5.23: se puvj zruj txvg Eei myenb weig tu'q zipq Eaanb Mwavj, maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb yaag maiq tu'q pcvb fim Eei Jauq uaq teij myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q.
5.6: yia xij pun Wivj penj Daub Waav, maiq taaq tweiq yaag maiq fyruj, Fimb Zru Fimb mwrng xij yem naaig Zwrtq taaib. yia xij hatg Bwrnj maiq pun twib Byuvg Fiag naaig.”
5.2: ninb wetq Wivj Raud Zwrtq la'pyeiq, cvj zwavj zavg hxvb Eei a'vung Mei. yem Wivj ka'Euad ninb Zeij nxm laaub, yaag yem Wivj zu'g nxm a'vung tiuq Eei zxvb. ninb zuaq Jyenq zyavb a'vung pyruq lovj, mq paag Kuvj zyavb maiq penj Eei pyruq.
5.20: kxvq x'q sig penj Kuq sig, Kuq sig penj x'q sig uaq teij, Zauj pun Mwavj penj Fav, Fav penj Mwavj, im penj kaam, kaam penj im uaq teij xij zu'g Kruq a'q.
5.24: weig naaiq Navq trub Byetg puaq Qwi Byaub Gaauq, miab Gaai yaag yem trud ka'Euad yopq Fiag, ninb Bua Eei Ruvb zuvq Navq latq Eei ka'naaiq nx, ninb Bua Eei pyavb ziag, zu'g Ryaauj pwrng Navq niab Buv, weig zu'g ninb Bua vcvg nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Eei leib latg, cvj mavg Piaj i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb Eei waag.
5.28: ninb Bua Eei fxvb Zav laig, yetg zuvq Jwavb zinj Laav yaag pcv Jyenq a'q. ninb Bua Eei maab teib pwatg Navq trub lau Eei la'pyeiq, ninb Bua Eei Bx'q Jaaj Ziab yenb Navq Ryaaub zung.
5.7: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Eei a'vung Wivj se i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun. yu-Daa myenb se ninb a'Neiq Eei a'vung Mei. ninb lxd pcvb fim Eei Jauq mq paag Kuvj pwatg taij myenb, Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei sig. ninb lxd zruj hxpg Eei Jauq mq paag Kuvj haid myenb heug Jyenq Toq Tevj Eei Qiaj Navq.
5.29: ninb Bua heug Navq syenb Eeid, yaag heug Navq syenb lunj. ninb Bua Funb Jyenq vaatg ninb Bua Zaa taaib Eei ka'naaiq txb mivb yaag maiq maaib haiq taub Fruj.
5.19: meib Bua kxvq, “Toq zyruq syepg syepq Eei zruj, Toq ninb kaanq zruj zyavj, weig pun yia Bua tu'q pwatg. Toq pun i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb Eei za'eij Tauj fatq. Toq pun taaib, weig pun yia Bua haib hiuq.
5.17: uaq zang pa'ki yuvb txn xij yem uaq Eang miaq Navq yem kanb Eei miab Zyavq. scvb Kuq Jung Zauj yuvb txn yaag yem putg zxib myenb Eei Daub Waav.
5.30: Tauj uaq Nxi ninb Bua xij txv Jyenq i-saa-laa-en myenb heug Navq Kxiq Eei uam Jiad laavg Bwi. sij kxvq haiq taub mavg uaq nxm kua'q, Kuvj maaib Mwavj Zauj Raub Eei sig. lyemb Fav zu'g Bwrnj Txvq Jyenq Mwavj mivb.
5.27: yem ninb Bua ka'Euad maiq maaib haiq taub Kruq fai Di'q zu'g Dxpg, maiq maaib haiq taub mFxmb ta'Vatq fai pweij mFxmb. sai Jaaiq Eei Laav yaag maiq lung, heb Laav yaag maiq tavj.
5.11: luvb Dxm Ryruq Jiad sin taaib zung tiuq hopq, hopq Jyenq Tauj Daamq mwrnd pyenj seij, hopq Tauj Gwin mivb. naaiq Euvg myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q.
5.5: ib zang yia Buaj meib Bua yia xij Navq haiq nx zruj pun yia Eei a'vung Wivj. yia xij Zc'q weib Wivj Eei Fimb laatg, txb Fimq mivb puaq kwavg. yia xij Bx'q Baav laatg, pun zu'g Zaaiq Fiag.
5.9: yia haid nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq kxvq, “zuvq maaib pyauq Zamq Eei xij penj pyaub Waav, pyauq Lo Eei, Rweig Eei yaag maiq maaib myenb yem.
5.16: mq paag nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq weig pcvb fim Eei Jauq tu'q myenb Taaib. Zivb Revg Eei Tinb huvb weig zruj hxpg Eei Jauq piuj mevb ninb Zivb Revg.
5.4: yia weig yia Eei a'vung Wivj cvj maaib haiq Euvg hxpg zu'g zruj tovb yia maiq kcvb zruj fai? yia mivb lxd a'vung pyruq lovj Eei, weig haiq tiug Kuvj Zwrtq maiq penj Eei pyruq.
5.10: zyepg txij vovb laib tu'q yetg Nxi Eei Dau, Kuvj haib tu'q yetg Tovq a'vung tiuq Navq. zyepg yetq Tovq Byaub Eim syru tu'q yetg Tovq.”
5.22: tu'q mevb taub hopq a'vung tiuq henq Eei myenb, Zauj taamq Lo Eei Peuj ziaj Euvg tiub Kuq uaq teij, xij zu'g Kruq a'q.
5.12: ninb Bua Eei yinb wig maaib tomb taanb paab, fiub taanb paab, maaib Rod, maaib Laub Dovb nuj, maaib a'vung tiuq, mq paag maiq Javj zu'g zyruq zruj Eei sig, yaag maiq Namq Tauj ninb Eei puad zruj Eei kov.
