5.15: zavg tavq Zauj haag tavq myenb zuvq zu'g zatq Fiag. mziv Lav Eei myenb yaag zu'g zatq Fiag aiq.
5.13: weig naaiq yia Eei pc'g fivj zu'g kwaatq mivb, laaij ninb Bua maiq pia'g Hruq. ninb Bua zruj Lo Eei myenb zuvq zu'g vxg taig, ninb Bua myenb maanb yaag Jaav Gaatq taig.
5.1: yia xij paauj tiub Ruv pun yia Namq uaq taub mwavj, paauj kxvq Tauj yia Namq uaq taub Eei a'vung Wivj. yia Namq uaq taub maaib nxm a'vung Wivj yem Bovb aiq, Daub Truq lovj Eei txvj.
5.26: ninb xij lyepg nxm Javb hog weig nxm ko Eei kua'q, yaag fiuq Zwrtq Qiaj heug yem uaq luvb kxn Eei myenb taaib. mavg maa'b! ninb Bua syepg syepq Eei kaanq Jyenq taaib.
5.25: weig naaiq zyruq Qiaj Jiad haig ninb Eei pc'g fivj, ninb suv ninb Eei puad Bx'q ninb Bua Fiag, zwavj Bov zyrug tovd. ninb Bua Eei sei Dwi Jyenq Jaaib hxvg Navq la'fapg Dwi. maiq kunq Navq naaig, ninb Eei ka'Qiaj Zxg maiq fiu, ninb Zxg suv Jyenq ninb Eei puad.

56.3: Zauj zyruq hxpg Eei kanb fivj myenb maiq tuvq pun kxvq, “zyruq Dovg haaij zuvq xij zx'q yia Zauj ninb Eei pc'g fivj pun Gxi.” yaag maiq tuvq pun im toq Eei myenb kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia Kuvj zruj Dyavb Krub Gaai.”
56.8: zyruq Tinb huvb, tovb txb zu'g kwaatq mivb Raanj Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb taaib zunq uaq taub, Navq naaiq kxvq, “Zwrtq liud yia pun kapq zunq liud Eei myenb, yia Zxg xij txb kanb teij myenb taaib Zauj ninb Bua kapq zunq.”
56.9: lomb Waav Eei yetg zuvq Yiab zxib Zauj Dyavb lomg yetg zuvq Yiab zxib taaib na'q maa'b!
56.7: yia zyrug xij txb naaiq teij mivb Tauj yia Eei Zivb Revg Bov, yaag pun ninb Bua yem yia Eei tauj kauj Eei pyauq maaib Fyenb yrub. ninb Bua puaq ziag Zauj fovg hxg ziag Eei ka'naaiq, yem yia Eei ziab txvb hxpg yia Eei Hruq Eei. weig zu'g yia Eei pyauq, myenb xij heug maang fivj myenb tauj kauj Eei pyauq.”
56.5: yia zuvq xij pun ninb Bua yem yia Eei sivj ting Zauj laatg ka'Euad maaib Javb hog yaag maaib Buaj kaub lovj maaib naamb Erud. yia zuvq xij pun ninb Bua maaib yetg liud Eei Buaj, yaag maiq haib Pai kwavg.
56.4: weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “ta'faanb im toq Eei myenb kan lovj yia Eei tivb kov Nxi Eei leid, kinq tovb yia hxpg Hruq Eei sig, yaag syenj wrnq yia lcvd Eei vcvg waag,
56.2: Navq naaiq ei Jyenq zruj Eei myenb, tovb Jyenb kan lovj Eei myenb, maaib xnb lx'g. se ninb kan lovj tivb kov Nxi Eei leid, maiq pun maaib wij, yaag kunq Jyenq kanb Eei puad, maiq zruj haiq Euvg x'q sig.”
56.6: cvj maaib taaib Eyemg zyruq Eei kanb fivj myenb xij fub suj ninb, Namq zyruq Eei Buaj yaag zruj ninb Eei pru, yetg zuvq kan lovj tivb kov Nxi Eei leid, maiq pun maaib wij, yaag syenj lovj yia lcvd Eei vcvg waag,
56.12: ninb Bua kxvq, “taaib maa'b! Bua mivb zx'q a'vung tiuq, Bua hopq peuq tiub Kuq. Fav Nxi xij Navq ib Nxi fai zuvq kaub yaaug.”
56.11: uaq teij Juq Zei haig, Eang yaag maiq hiuq tu'q peuq. kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb yaag maiq mevb pc'g haiq Euvg. kx'g myenb ziuj kx'g myenb Eei Jauq yavb. kx'g myenb trub kx'g myenb kanb tu'q lovj Navq.
56.1: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “meib Bua xij zu'g kruj Jyenq pcvb fim Eei Jauq yaag zruj hxpg Eei sig, weig zu'g yia Eei Fruj en Tauj fatq a'q. yia Eei kovb fim xij piuj mevb Zwrtq taaib.
56.10: i-saa-laa-en Eei syruq kcv myenb mziv mcvb, ninb Bua yetg zuvq maiq maaib Zovb mevb. ninb Bua yetg zuvq Navq Jub Vovj, maiq haib Fuvj. ninb Bua Kuvj xij pweij Jyenq, xij Beij Beij, mauq mFxmb.

53.3: ninb zu'g myenb mavg Piaj, zu'g myenb Gemb, ninb zu'g tiaq mun, zu'g tiaq Kruq. ninb se Navq myenb pwav Jyenq Myen, maiq xij mavg Eei myenb, ninb zu'g myenb mavg Piaj, yia Bua yaag maiq Taaib ninb.
53.8: ninb zu'g zeij, zu'g syemq, zu'g txb mivb. tovb ninb uaq txig myenb maiq maaib haiq taub Namq Tauj ninb weig yia Eei pc'g fivj paamd Eei zwid zu'g Bx'q, yaag yem zyavb Jyenq Eei myenb Bu'Dovj zu'g Pai kwavg.
53.9: maiq kunq ninb maiq zruj to'g, ninb Eei Rwib yaag maiq Duaq myenb, mq paag myenb liug leid pun ninb Zauj x'q myenb pyopq. taig uaq zang ninb Zauj putg zxib myenb Jwavg zruq zavj.
53.7: ninb zu'g hxig, zu'g tiaq Kruq, ninb yaag maiq Ko lo. ninb se Navq zu'g txb mivb taij Eei pa'ki yuvb txn, cvj Navq Japq pyei Eei pa'ki yuvb txn maiq Ko lo, yaag maiq mxvj ninb Eei Rwib.
53.5: taauj Rwrnj ninb laaij yia Bua zruj txvg Eei sig zu'g mun, laaij yia Bua paamd Eei zwid zu'g Bx'q faauj Ryaamq. ninb zu'g tivg zwid pun yia Bua tu'q pcvb xn. ninb zu'g Bx'q faauj Ryaamq pun yia Bua tu'q zxg lovj.
53.4: ninb Daam yia Bua Eei pcvg Tovj, Lxq yia Bua Raub Kruq Eei Jauq mivb Revg. maiq kunq Navq naaig, yia Bua funj ninb zu'g Bx'q, se zu'g Tinb huvb Bx'q, yaag zu'g Kruq.
53.2: ninb yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen Lo taaib Navq Zunj lunj, Navq Dyavb Ruvb yem Daub Gaai Zwrtq Zunj. maiq maaib favj zeiq fai Rweig Eei Jaaj pun yia Bua haid xij mavg. yaag maiq maaib Rweig Eei txvj la'q yia Bua Eei mweig.
53.6: yia Bua yetg zuvq Navq pa'ki yuvb, yavb txvg Jauq, kx'g myenb yavb kx'g myenb Eei Jauq Navq.   zyruq zx'q yia Bua zwavj myenb Eei zwid an Jyenq ninb, pun ninb Daam.
53.12: weig naaiq yia xij pun ninb Zauj zruj Lo Eei myenb maaib pwrng. ninb Zauj myenb henq myenb pun Gxi Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq, weig zu'g ninb zx'q ninb Eei mcvg toj Zwrtq zu'g taig, yaag zu'g funj Zauj zwib myenb fib Navq. maiq kunq Navq naaig, ninb Daam myenb Zamq Eei zwid, yaag weig paamd zwid Eei myenb Jrub Tinb huvb.
53.11: ninb zuvq tu'q pwatg kanb weig syrug Kruq zruj Zwrtq taaib Eei sig zyrug pwavq Hruq. weig naaiq taub Kuq myenb, se yia Eei pru Eei wrnb zaav, myenb Zamq tu'q funj penj Kuq myenb. ninb yaag xij Daam ninb Bua yetg zuvq Eei zwid.
53.1: haiq taub haib syenj yia Bua zunb Eei Jauq?   zyruq Eei Qa'q Zwrtq taaib pun haiq taub pwatg?
53.10: mq paag se zyruq Eei za'eij pun ninb zu'g faauj Ryaamq, pun ninb zu'g syrug Kruq.   zyruq lovg ninb zruj ziag fi'q zwid Eei ka'naaiq, ninb zuvq tu'q pwatg kanb Eei hod txig, yaag tu'q pun ninb zyavb Eei Nxib Eia'g Daauq.   zyruq a'Neiq Eei za'eij zyrug yem ninb Eei puad zruj tu'q Zwrtq.

19.18: Tauj uaq Nxi i-yipq teib puv maaib pyaa nxm zivb kxvq Kaa-naa-an waag, yaag txv Jyenq nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq  lcvd Jiad vcvg waag. maaib nxm uaq teij zivb ninb Bua xij heug “Ba'Nxi Eei zivb.”
19.8: zx'q Byaud Eei myenb xij Raub Eyemq, yem nai-aa Batg Byaud Eei yetg zuvq yaag Raub haig. pxvd muvd uaq teij xij Kruq Jyenq Fiag.
19.3: i-yipq myenb zyrug faij Hruq a'q. yia xij pun ninb Bua taaq Eei za'eij zruj maiq Zwrtq haiq Euvg. ninb Bua zyrug naaig miub favj Zauj mavg mcvg myenb, cvj naaig kaanq hei Zauj Bruq kwaaj myenb.
19.21: zyruq zyrug pun i-yipq myenb hiuq tu'q ninb. Tauj uaq Nxi i-yipq myenb xij Eyemg zyruq yaag lovg fovg hxg Zauj ziag Eei ka'naaiq zavg ninb. ninb Bua yaag xij lcvd vcvg waag pun zyruq cvj ziuj ninb Bua lcvd Eei waag Jaauq suv.
19.14: zyruq zruj pun ninb Bua Eei Hruq lung, ninb Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig pun i-yipq txvg Jauq. Navq hopq tiuq Gwin Eei myenb livb livb Kivb Kiv Eei yem ninb loq Zwrtq Eei ka'naaiq ka'Euad.
19.23: Tauj uaq Nxi maaib tiub tomb Jauq yem i-yipq Tov atg-si-lia. atg-si-lia myenb zyrug mivb i-yipq, i-yipq myenb yaag mivb atg-si-lia. i-yipq myenb yaag Zauj atg-si-lia myenb lomb Rxib zavg zyruq.
19.6: nai-aa Eei uamb zwrnj xij zweij, i-yipq Eei nai-aa Daaib Eei Do'q xij haapq Fiag Gaai Revg. lua'g ti'g Zauj tavb Zoq miaq yaag huq Revg.
19.2: “yia xij Zo'q i-yipq myenb Bx'q i-yipq myenb, kxb yrud xij Bx'q kxb yrud, Jwavg laavd myenb xij Bx'q kanb Eei Jwavg laavd myenb, zivb xij Bx'q zivb, kua'q xij Bx'q kua'q.
19.20: naaiq nxm tovg yem teib puvb Waav weig nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq zruj Javb hog yaag zruj zxvb zevj. sij kxvq i-yipq myenb zu'g myenb zeij zyrug heug zyruq, ninb zyrug Paaiq taub Fruj zyruq taaib Tevj yaag Fruj ninb Bua.
19.24: Tauj uaq Nxi, i-saa-laa-en Zauj i-yipq Zauj atg-si-lia, naaiq teij pua nxm kua'q, fib Navq Eei pun kxmj luvb Diaq Eei myenb tu'q fu'q.
19.7: nai-aa Daaib Len Zauj Daaib Kuq Eei Ba'Daaub Fatq yaag Gaai Eauj, zwavj yem nai-aa Daaib Len Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaib zwavj yaag Gaai, zuvq zu'g Ryaauj pwrng mivb, maiq maaib a'q.
19.19: Tauj uaq Nxi yem i-yipq teib puv ka'Euad zuvq maaib nxm ziab txvb Zeij taaib weig zyruq. yem i-yipq Eei kapg Jaaij ka'Len yaag maaib nxm la'pyeib tovg lyepg taaib weig zyruq.
19.17: yu-Daa teib puv yaag pun i-yipq myenb kamb Riaj haig. haiq taub haid uaq nxm Buaj zyrug kamb Riaj haig weig nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq tivg zruj pun i-yipq myenb.
19.11: soj-an zivb Eei Jyen se Vovj haig a'q. faa-lo maaib Zovb mevb Eei Zaavb laavb myenb taaq Vovj Eei za'eij. meib Bua fuvg haib kxvq Buaj faa-lo, “yia se Zovb mevb myenb Eei txn, zruj lob Nxi huvb tiaj Eei zeib fun”?
19.5: nai-aa Daaib Eei uam xij Gaai, Daaib Eei uam yaag Gaai Tauj Do'q Revg.
19.9: paig la'maab Eei kovb myenb Zauj Datq la'maab Diab mwrng Eei myenb maiq lamb Namq txvj a'q.
19.16: Tauj uaq Nxi, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq xij fevj puad yem i-yipq myenb kub vwaaig. ninb Bua zyrug Navq msia'q txn kamb Riaj, sin zinj.
19.4: yia xij zx'q i-yipq myenb Jiu pun yem taub to'g Eei zyruq Eei puab Diaq. maaib taub Zyruq haig Eei huvb tiaj xij kunq ninb Bua.” naaiq se zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, kxvq Eei waag.
19.10: yem teib puv zruj Lo Eei myenb xij zu'g paaig, maaig kov Eei yetg zuvq myenb Hruq Raub Kruq a'q.
19.22: zyruq xij Bx'q i-yipq, Bx'q cvj zxg lovj. ninb Bua zyrug cvj Rwrnj taaib lxd zyruq. ninb yaag mwavj ninb Bua Jrub Eei waag cvj zxg ninb Bua lovj.
19.12: meib Eei Zovb mevb myenb yem haaij? pun ninb Bua Buaj meib, Tevj meib hiuq tu'q, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Jiad Hruq Navq haiq nx zruj pun i-yipq.
19.15: maiq kunq mGxvq fai tweiq, taaub nxmb fai lua'g ti'g kwcvq, maiq maaib haiq Euvg haib Tevj i-yipq.
19.13: soj-an Eei Jyen penj ka'naaib Vovj mig a'q. mem-fitq Eei Jyen yaag zu'g Duaq. fivb fivj i-yipq myenb Eei pyeiq zeiq txb i-yipq myenb yavb txvg Jauq.
19.1: naaiq se kxvq Tauj i-yipq Eei waag. mavg maa'b! zyruq keb Jyenq syepq Eei Bwrnj taaib Tauj i-yipq teib puv. i-yipq Eei miub favj yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen Eanb Eanb Eei tovd, i-yipq myenb Eei Ba'Riu yu'g Revg.
19.25: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq xij Zeij fu'q pun ninb Bua. ninb kxvq, “i-yipq myenb se yia Eei pc'g fivj, atg-si-lia se yia Eei puad zeij taaib Eei myenb, i-saa-laa-en myenb se yia Ripg Eei pwrng, yia xij Zeij fu'q pun ninb Bua.”

38.18: yem yemb ken Eei myenb maiq maaib haiq taub haib Zev meib. taig mivb Eei myenb maiq haib Zev meib. Fiag uaq nxm Kwrtq Eei myenb maiq lamb Namq meib zyepg zua'q Eei Jauq.
38.8: mavg maa'b! yia xij pun Eutg Eei tovb linb yem aa-hatg Eei Tei Rwrnj Ga'haaq Gaav zyepg wrng Tei.’+” tovb linb zyrug Twij Rwrnj ninb Jiaj mivb Eei zyepg wrng Tei.
38.3: “o zyruq aag, Toq! meib Javj Jyenq yia yem meib Eei Ra'Myen zyepg zua'q Eei lovg Revg Hruq kan meib, yaag ziuj meib mavg, yia zruj tu'q lovj.” he-se-Ki-yaa zyrug Eyemq tu'q Hruq mun haig.
38.21: i-saa-yaa kxvq, “zx'q Dunb vovb Exj pyrub Gaai taaib opq he-se-Ki-yaa Eei zweib. ninb zyrug lovj mig a'q.”
38.14: yia heug Navq nx'g Ba'hinj Zauj nx'g aapq, yia heug Navq pc'g kopq. yia mavg kau kub vwaaig, mziv zuvq Kruq Revg. o zyruq aag, yia zu'g zeij. Toq taaib peu Jyenq yia.”
38.6: yia yaag xij Fruj meib Zauj naaiq nxm zivb leib Dutq atg-si-lia huvb Eei puab Diaq. yia xij peu naaiq nxm zivb.”
38.2: he-se-Ki-yaa zyrug Win Myen mivb Fovg uaq puv tauj kauj kxvq Buaj zyruq,
38.20: zyruq xij Fruj yia. yia Bua yetg seij zyrug yem zyruq Eei sivj ting Patq taanb paab paauj yia Eei Ruv.
38.7: “+‘naaiq se zyruq xij pun meib Eei Javb hog, pun Ziv zyruq xij ei Jyenq ninb lcvd Eei waag zruj.
38.19: Kuvj maaib zyavb Jyenq Eei myenb, se zyavb Jyenq Eei myenb haib Zev meib, Navq yia ib Nxi Zev meib nx. tia xij Buaj ninb Eei naamb Erud meib Dovg haaij zyepg zua'q.
38.17: yia zu'g Dovg naaiq Kruq mtaaib weig Tevj yia tu'q lovj. meib Namq yia zyrug Fruj yia leib Dutq zu'g myetg Eei Kwrtq, weig zu'g meib zx'q yia Eei yetg zuvq zwid zxi meib Eei Ga'haaq Gaav.
38.11: yia kxvq, “yia maiq tu'q pwatg zyruq, yia yem yaavb ken maiq tu'q cvj pwatg zyruq. yem naaiq nxm luvb Diaq yia maiq tu'q cvj pwatg haiq taub myenb.
38.5: “mivb Buaj he-se-Ki-yaa, ‘zyruq, meib Eei ovb Taaij, Daa-witq, Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “yia haid meib tauj kauj Eei waag yaag pwatg meib Eei uamb mweig. yia xij zxg lovj meib. yia xij Jaa pun meib zyavb zyepg Mmd Havj.
38.9: naaiq se yu-Daa Eei huvb, he-se-Ki-yaa putq pcvg lovj taaib fiaq Eei waag.
38.16: zyruq aag, myenb tu'q zyavb Jyenq se weig naaiq teij sig. yia Eei mcvg yaag Kauj naaiq teij sig tu'q zyavb Jyenq. Toq meib zxg yia lovj taaib, pun yia maaib mcvg zyavb Jyenq.
38.4: i-saa-yaa zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
38.10: yia Namq taaib, “yia Eei mcvg Tauj Daamb seij yia xij zu'g pia'g yemb ken Eei kcvb, zevg Fiag Eei Havj maiq tu'q zyavb a'q.”
38.22: he-se-Ki-yaa naaig, “maaib haiq Euvg Javb hog pun Ziv yia cvj tu'q mivb zavg zyruq Eei pyauq?”
38.12: yia yem Eei txvj zu'g Zc'q mivb leib Gxi yia Navq Zc'q puvj yuvb myenb Eei Dopg liub nx. yia Fung yia Eei mcvg Navq Datq Dia Eei myenb Fung Dia nx. Tinb huvb zx'q yia Japq Dutq Navq Dia yem Datq Dia Eei Jaab sig Japq Dutq nx. luvb Nxi luvb mwrnd meib xij pun yia Eei mcvg Tauj setq mweid.
38.15: mq paag yia haib kxvq haiq Euvg fai? weig zu'g ninb Zauj yia kxvq, ninb kanb yaag Navq naaiq nx zruj. weig zu'g yia Eei Hruq Kruq, yem yia yetg seij Eei Havb taaub yia xij sweib Jyenq yavb a'q.
38.13: yia lovg nxig zuaq Tauj luvb Fav, mq paag ninb Navq syenb nx, pun yia Eei yetg zuvq Buvq nauq. luvb Nxi luvb mwrnd meib xij pun yia Eei mcvg Tauj setq mweid.
38.1: txij uaq teij zyavb hog he-se-Ki-yaa putq pcvg Kruq, Kaaq teij taig mig a'q. aa-mxtq Eei txn, uaq taub trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, mivb mavg ninb cvj kxvq Buaj ninb, “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq. ‘meib xij zu'g liug leid Euvb Euvg suv weig zu'g meib zuvq xij zu'g taig. meib maiq haib lovj.’+”

31.3: i-yipq myenb mtaaib paamb myenb, maiq zeid zyenb. ninb Bua Eei maad mtaaib maaib xq maaib Ryaamq Eei, maiq zeid penj wrnb.   zyruq yetq suv puad, Tevj myenb Eei myenb Zauj tu'q myenb Tevj uaq teij zuvq xij Di'q zu'g Dxpg. ninb Bua zyrug yetg Fiag zu'g myetg Revg.
31.8: “atg-si-lia myenb xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij, yaag maiq zeid myenb Eei Ru'g. maaib Ru'g Daauq xij na'q Revg ninb Bua, mq paag maiq zeid paamb myenb Eei Ru'g. ninb Bua xij pyauj Ru'g Daauq, ninb Bua Eei myenb lunj myenb xij zu'g aapq zruj kov Kruq.
31.4: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj yia, “Navq taub syenb fai syenb lunj Funb ninb Zaa taaib Eei xq, maiq kunq heug kwanb puvj yuvb Eei myenb Zamq Eei kapq zunq taaib pxvd ninb, ninb maiq kamb Riaj ninb Bua yetg zuvq heug Eei Qiaj. ninb yaag maiq Waav ninb Bua Byrub Byrub Eei heug. nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq xij Navq uaq nx Fiag taaib yem si-on Bov Zauj si-on Eei Bovb aiq txvj Bx'q Jaaj.
31.2: mq paag zyruq maaib Zovb mevb zyrug xij pun zu'g ze'g naang. ninb yaag maiq Twij ninb Eei waag. ninb xij Jiad taaib Zauj x'q myenb Eei zeib fun Zauj Tevj x'q myenb uaq teij txib tekg.
31.6: o i-saa-laa-en myenb aa'b! Rwrnj taaib lxd zyruq, tovb meib Bua vcvg tu'q Niaq uaq taub.
31.9: ninb Bua Eei huvb tiaj laaij kamb Riaj zyrug pyauj. ninb Bua Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq pa'la'g kamb Riaj zyrug kwavg Jyenq Bx'q Jaaj Eei keb pyauj.” naaiq se maaib trud yem si-on yaag maaib trub lrub yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
31.5: Navq nx'g Daij yrub Jyenq kub vwaaig mavg, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq xij Navq naaiq nx peu Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem. ninb xij peu Jyenq yaag Fruj, ninb xij Jiaj kub vwaaig siaj Zwrtq.”
31.7: Tauj uaq Nxi meib Bua taub taub xij zx'q meib Bua kanb Eei puad paamd zwid lovg Jyem lovg Eaanb zruj taaib Eei miub favj zxi kwavg.
31.1: mivb Kauj i-yipq myenb uaq teij xij zu'g Kruq a'q. ninb Bua Kauj i-yipq myenb Eei maad, yaag Kauj ninb Bua Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia Zamq, yaag Kauj ninb Bua Eei keb maad pcv weig zu'g ninb Bua henq haig, mq paag ninb Bua maiq Kauj i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb fai lxd zyruq Tevj.

52.3: weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “meib Bua zu'g maaig maiq maaib Jaaj. meib Bua tu'q zua'g Rwrnj yaag maiq zu'g lovg Eaanb.”
52.8: mwavj maa'b! meib Eei syruq kcv myenb heug Bwi, lomb Rxib Fyenb yrub Eei paauj Ruv.   zyruq Rwrnj si-on uaq zang, ninb Bua kanb Eei mziv zuvq tu'q pwatg.
52.9: ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Daub Waav aag, lomb Rxib Zwrtq Qiaj paauj Ruv. weig zu'g zyruq Tevj ninb Eei pc'g fivj Jaiq Raub, ninb yaag zua'g ye-lu-saa-lem.
52.7: yavb Bov yavb zxv taaib Buaj Kuq fyenj Eei myenb Eei zauj Rweig haig. ninb zunb pcvb xn Eei Jauq, kxvq Kuq fyenj, zunb Fruj en Eei fyenj kxvq Buaj si-on, “meib Eei Tinb huvb zruj huvb mig a'q.”
52.5: zyruq kxvq, “ib zang yem naaiq yia maaib haiq Euvg? “yia Eei pc'g fivj zu'g pc'g pc'g kwaatq mivb.”   zyruq kxvq, “kunq ninb Bua uaq teij heug yaag zyavb Nxi maiq tivb lyrub Eei Ki yia Eei mevb.
52.14: myenb Zamq pwatg ninb zyrug hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj weig zu'g ninb Eei Myenb mweig waaig, pwatg maiq Navq myenb. ninb Eei favj zeiq yaag waaig Revg, maiq Navq myenb Eei favj.
52.4: weig zu'g zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “taaub tavb yia Eei pc'g fivj mivb i-yipq teib puv weig yem naaig. Ga'haaq atg-si-lia myenb zeij ninb Bua yaag maiq maaib haiq Euvg kxnb pcvj.”
52.2: o ye-lu-saa-lem aa'b! xij zu'g sru Gxi niab Buv Jiad sin taaib zweid Jyenq weig. o zu'g Zaavq Eei si-on aag, Jaiq Gxi Dob meib Eei Jaav Eei limg.
52.6: Navq naaiq yia Eei pc'g fivj zyrug hiuq tu'q yia Eei Buaj. weig naaiq Tauj uaq Nxi ninb Bua zuvq hiuq tu'q se yia Jaab Daavg kxvq. zeid Eei, se tovb yia.”
52.13: mavg maa'b! yia Eei pru xij lovg Zovb mevb zruj Euvb Euvg. ninb xij tu'q myenb Taaib, tu'q myenb Zev, Taaib faauj Lav.
52.12: meib Bua maiq zu'g Waavb Waav zaavb zaav Eei Zwrtq, yaag maiq zu'g pyauj mcvg, weig zu'g zyruq xij yem meib Bua Eei uaq Daavg mivb, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb xij yem meib Bua Eei Ga'haaq Gaav peu Jyenq meib Bua.
52.15: ninb zyrug hc'q ziaj kua'q myenb kamb Riaj. huvb tiaj xij weig ninb Gapg Jyenq Rwib, weig zu'g maiq maaib myenb Buaj Jiaj Eei, ninb Bua tu'q pwatg. ninb Bua maiq haid Jiaj Eei, ninb Bua yaag haib pia'g Hruq.
52.11: mivb a'q. mivb a'q. leib Baa-Bi-lon Zwrtq mivb maa'b! maiq tuvq mua'q zu'g maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq. yem naaig ka'Euad Zwrtq mivb. meib Bua kcv zyruq Eei Jaab txvj Eei myenb xij zu'g saaj kanb Zivb Revg.
52.1: si-on aag, Eia taaib, Eia taaib, cvj henq Jiad taaib maa'b! o Zivb Revg Eei zivb, ye-lu-saa-lem aa'b! zu'q Jyenq meib Rweig haig Eei lwib hruj. weig zu'g yem naaiq mivb maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid Zauj maaib wij Eei myenb maiq tu'q cvj pia'g meib.
52.10: zyruq xij yem maang kua'q myenb Eei Ra'Myen lovg ninb maaib Qa'q Eei Zivb Revg puad. yem Jomg luvb Diaq Eei myenb zyrug pwatg Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei Fruj en.

65.18: mq paag xij zu'g a'Neiq, xnb lx'g weig yia zeij taaib Eei ka'naaiq. weig zu'g yia xij zeij ye-lu-saa-lem penj myenb a'Neiq Eei txvj. zivb ka'Euad Eei pc'g fivj yaag xij xnb lx'g.
65.8: zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “a'vung tiuq yem a'vung pyrub Jxib Zwrtq yaag maaib myenb kxvq, ‘maiq tuvq zruj waaig. Zxg maaib lamb lovg Eei.’ yia zyrug weig yia Eei pru Navq naaiq nx zruj. yia maiq myetg ninb Bua yetg zuvq.
65.3: naaiq teij pc'g fivj txv Jyenq yia zanb zang Zua'q yia. ninb Bua yem Wivj zx'q ka'naaiq fovg hxg ziag, yaag yem Wib zun Dwi kub vwaaig puaq huv.
65.21: ninb Bua xij zruj pyauq weig kanb pia'g mivb yem. ninb Bua xij zruj Wivj zwavj a'vung pyruq yaag Eang Wivj Eei pyruq.
65.14: yia Eei zwavj pru xij paauj Ruv weig Hruq ka'Euad Fyenb yrub, mq paag meib Bua xij heug Zwrtq weig meib Bua Hruq pa'la'g Raub. meib Bua xij Eyemq Kruq weig Hruq mun tu'q syav.
65.23: ninb Bua zruj Eei kov ninb Bua maiq pc'g pc'g zruj, ninb Bua yuvd Eei kub vwaad yaag maiq zu'g ze'g naang, weig zu'g ninb Bua tu'q zruj zyruq Zeij fu'q Eei myenb, lyemb ninb Bua kanb Zauj ninb Bua Eei hod txig zeib fun.
65.6: “mavg maa'b! maaib waag fiaq Jyenq yia Eei Ra'Myen kxvq, yia maiq sekq. yia xij winb Revg pun ninb Bua, yia zuvq xij winb Rwrnj pun ninb Bua,
65.2: yia zyavb Nxi suv Jyenq yia Eei puad pun yetg fivj Hruq vcvg Eei myenb. ninb Bua sweib ninb Bua kanb Eei Hruq Namq Zwrtq Eei sig, yavb maiq hxpg Eei Jauq.
65.20: “yem naaig ka'Euad yetg liud maiq cvj maaib kub vwaad zyavb i ziaj Nxi Navq, fai maaib myenb koj myenb maiq zyavb pwavq sruj mrug. tu'q yetg pc'q Havj taig Eei myenb funj penj myenb lunj myenb, zyavb maiq Tauj yetg pc'q Havj taig uaq teij, funj penj zu'g zyruj Eei myenb.
65.24: ninb Bua maiq kcvb Toq, yia zyrug tau. ninb Bua Zxg kxvq Jyenq waag Eei zyavb hog yia zyrug haid.
65.7: lyemb ninb Bua Eei zwid Zauj ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei zwid. weig zu'g ninb Bua yem Bov kub vwaaig puaq huv, yaag yem Bovb aiq kxvq to'g Ki yia. yia zyrug ziuj ninb Bua zruj Jiaj taaib Eei sig Laau Rwrnj pun ninb Bua.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
65.19: yia zyrug weig ye-lu-saa-lem Fyenb yrub, yaag weig yia Eei pc'g fivj xnb lx'g. yem zivb ka'Euad maiq maaib haiq taub cvj haid Eyemq Eei Qiaj fai heug tu'q Raub Eei Qiaj.
65.17: “mavg maa'b! yia xij zeij syavb luvb syavb Dau. zinb Daavg Eei sig zuvq maiq Javj, lyemb maiq Namq Tauj.
65.11: “mq paag meib Bua kwavg zyruq Eei myenb, se meib Bua la'Ku'q yia Eei Zivb Revg Bov yaag Beng tiab weig kaatg zyenb, lovg Rxmg Peuj ziaj Euvg tiuq Ziaq ziag pun me-ni zyenb.
65.5: ninb Bua kxvq, ‘simq Gxi, maiq tuvq taaib fatq a'q, weig zu'g yia kaub Zivb Revg meib.’ naaiq teij myenb penj yem yia Eei Ba'zxv Eei syruj, penj zyavb Nxi zia'g Jyenq Eei trud.
65.9: yia xij pun yaa-Kopq maaib hod txig zeib fun, yaag pun yem yu-Daa Zwrtq Eei myenb tu'q Ripg yia Eei zwavj Bov. yia kinq taaib Eei myenb yaag tu'q Ripg. yia Eei zwavj pru yaag tu'q yem naaig.
65.16: Navq naaig, haiq taub yem teib puv weig kanb Toq fu'q, zyrug lovg zyen leid Eei Tinb huvb Eei Buaj Toq. haiq taub yem teib puv hruq waag, zyrug zyavq Jyenq zyen leid Eei Tinb huvb Eei Buaj hruq. weig zu'g zinb Daavg zu'g Eei ze'g naang zuvq la'Ku'q mig a'q, yia Eei mziv yaag maiq pwatg mig a'q.
65.4: ninb Bua mivb zweid Jyenq zruq Bu'Dovj, yem uaq zruq ka'Euad Jiaj mwrnd. ninb Bua Eang tuvb xq. ninb Bua Eei Zcvb yenq ka'Euad maaib kamb Riaq haig Eei xb Txv.
65.10: saa-lon Daub pcvb xij penj pa'ki yuvb Zauj yuvb kwanb Eei miab Zyavq, aa-Ko hxvd xij penj vovb kwanb pweij Eei txvj weig yia Eei pc'g fivj, tovb lxd yia uaq teij.
65.22: ninb Bua maiq zruj pyauq pun kanb taub yem. ninb Bua maiq zruj Wivj zwavj a'vung pyruq pun kanb taub Eang. weig zu'g yia Eei pc'g fivj zyavb Eei Nxi zuvq Navq Dyavj zyavb Eei Nxib Eia'g. yia kinq taaib Eei myenb zyrug a'Neiq ninb Bua Eei puad zruj Eei kov laub Eei.
65.12: yia zyrug tivg pun meib Bua Eei hod Gaav zu'g Ru'g Daauq, meib Bua yetg zuvq xij zu'g Baapq Fiag zu'g taij. weig zu'g yia heug meib Bua mq paag meib Bua maiq tau, yia kxvq mq paag meib Bua maiq mwavj. taauj Rwrnj meib Bua yem yia Eei Ra'Myen zruj x'q sig, yaag kinq tovb yia maiq a'Neiq Eei sig.”
65.15: meib Bua zu'g kwavg meib Bua kanb Eei Buaj, pun yia kinq taaib Eei myenb lovg penj zyruj Eei waag. zyruq Tinb huvb xij pun meib Bua zu'g taij, mq paag ninb xij zx'q kanb nxm Buaj pun ninb Eei pru Bua.
65.13: weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia Eei zwavj pru zuvq tu'q Eang, mq paag meib Bua xij zu'g Hruq sia. yia Eei zwavj pru tu'q hopq, mq paag meib Bua xij zu'g Jaav Gaatq. yia Eei zwavj pru xij tu'q Fyenb yrub, mq paag meib Bua xij zu'g Eaiq.
65.1: zyruq, kxvq, “yia liug leid zyavj pun maiq naaig Tauj yia uaq teij, hiuq tu'q yia, yaag liug leid zyavj pun maiq lxd yia uaq teij, tu'q lxd pwatg yia. yia kxvq, ‘yia yem naaiq. yia yem naaiq,’ Buaj maiq tauj kauj Jrub yia Eei mevb Eei yetg kua'q myenb.’
65.25: Yiab Juq Zauj pa'ki yuvb txn xij Jwavg Jyenq Eang. syenb xij Eang Byaub Gaauq Navq vovb. niab Buv penj naav Eei Eang hopq. ta'faanb yem yia Eei Zivb Revg Bov Eei txvj, ninb Bua yetg zuvq maiq hxig, maiq zruj myetg.”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.

27.3: yia, zyruq kruj Jyenq naaiq nxm Wivj, yaag zanb zang fu'q uam. Riaj maaib myenb taaib hxig, yia zyrug Nxib Nxi mwrnb mwrnd zuaq Jyenq.
27.8: meib zung ninb Bua, pun ninb Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb, Zauj ninb Bua txib tekg Rcv, meib lovg Zyruq Eei Qiaj zung ninb Bua Zwrtq Navq tov puv Eei Ryaaub Jxm pwrng Eei Nxi.
27.9: Navq naaig, yaa-Kopq zruj txvg Eei zwid tu'q kwavg liud a'q, ninb Eei zwid tu'q zx'q Gxi kwavg Revg mig a'q. se ninb zx'q ziab txvb Eei yetg zuvq la'pyeiq Bx'q mwrng penj Wi Revg, maiq maaib aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj fai puaq huv tiab yem uaq.
27.7: zyruq   Bx'q i-saa-laa-en Navq ninb Bx'q tovb Bx'q i-saa-laa-en uaq teij myenb fai? i-saa-laa-en myenb zu'g taij Navq taij ninb Bua uaq teij myenb zu'g taij Eei fai?
27.5: maiq zei c'q, pun ninb Bua taaib pavg yia kruj ninb Bua. pun ninb Bua Zauj yia zruj hxpg. zeid Eei, pun ninb Bua Zauj yia zruj hxpg.”
27.4: yia yaag maiq Qiaj Jiad. sij kxvq maaib Fimb Zru Fimb mwrng Zauj yia txib tekg, yia zyrug Zwrtq mivb Zauj ninb Bua txib tekg. yia zuvq lovg trud puaq Qwi Revg.
27.2: Tauj uaq Nxi, “xij zu'g paauj Ruv kxvq Tauj Kub yem Eei a'vung Wivj.
27.6: xij Tauj Eei Nxi, yaa-Kopq xij Navq Dyavj nx Fiag Ruvb, i-saa-laa-en xij Gxi pyavb Zwrtq Zunj. pyruq zyrug pwavq Revg luvb Diaq.
27.13: tovb uaq Nxi zyrug maaib tomb Ratg Eei Qiaj Bwi. yem atg-si-lia zu'g myetg Jyenq yem Eei myenb Zauj zu'g kwaatq mivb yem i-yipq teib puv uaq teij zyrug taaib yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Zivb Revg Bov zavg zyruq.
27.12: o i-saa-laa-en myenb aa'b! Tauj uaq Nxi zyruq xij yem yu-fe-titg Daaib mivb Tauj i-yipq Do'q zx'q meib Bua yetg taub yetg taub syru taaib Navq Bx'q Byaub nx.
27.11: Gwaab Gaai zyrug nauq Dutq. msia'q txn Raud taaib puaq trud. weig zu'g naaig fivj myenb maiq hiuq haiq Euvg, zeij ninb Bua taaib uaq taub zyrug maiq Kxb lyenb ninb Bua. nanq ninb Bua taaib uaq taub maiq Zeij en pun ninb Bua.
27.1: Tauj uaq Nxi,   zyruq xij lovg ninb Eei Ru'g Daauq, se ninb vcvg haig, henq haig Eei tomb Ru'g Daauq, taij lwib Jyenq mivb syepq Eei naav, le-wi-aa-Taan, se Qrub Qru mivb Eei naav, le-wi-aa-Taan. ninb xij taij yem Kxiq uaq taub tomb ka'naaiq.
27.10: weib wrnq Eei zivb penj zivb Waav, se penj kwavg Waav Eei txvj Navq teib puvb Waav nx. vovb txn yem uaq Eang miaq, ninb yaag pweij uaq, Eang Revg yem uaq Eei Dyavb Gwaab.

60.18: yem naaiq mivb yem meib Eei teib puv maiq haid Zyruq Eei, to'g Eei sig. yem meib Eei kapg Jaaij ka'Euad yaag maiq haid paaig waaig paaig Waav Eei Jauq. meib zyrug pun meib Eei zivb laatg maaib Buaj heug “Fruj en,” yaag pun meib Eei zivb kcvb maaib Buaj heug “Zev.”
60.8: “Daij taaib Navq Bwrnj yaag Navq pc'g kopq Rwrnj ninb Eei laud naaiq teij se haiq taub?
60.3: maang kua'q myenb xij taaib lxd meib Eei Fav, huvb tiaj xij taaib lxd meib luvb Dxm Ryruq Eei Fav.
60.21: meib Eei yetg zuvq pc'g fivj zyrug penj Kuq myenb. ninb Bua tu'q Ripg teib puv penj ninb Bua yetg liud Eei pwrng. ninb Bua se yia zwavj Eei Zunj, penj yia Eei puad zruj Eei kov weig piuj mevb yia Eei Favb laavg.
60.14: zeij meib uaq teij myenb Eei zeib fun xij taaib yem meib Eei Ra'Myen Do'q Fiag. mavg Piaj meib uaq teij, xij kweig Fiag meib Eei zaub Len paaij. ninb Bua xij heug meib zruj zyruq Eei zivb, i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb Eei zivb, si-on.
60.6: lxb Txb kwanb, lyemb mi-Dyen Zauj e-faa taaib Eei lxb Txb lunj, xij pwavq meib Eei teib puv. yem Qe-Baa Eei zwavj myenb xij taaib, yaag txb Jyem Zauj faan-ken-sen taaib zunb kxvq Zev zyruq Eei waag.’
60.2: mavg maa'b! Mwavj xij komq pwavq luvb Diaq, mapq mcvb Eei Mwavj komq maang fivj. mq paag zyruq xij ziuj Jyenq meib, myenb zyrug pwatg ninb Eei Favb laavg yem meib kub vwaaig.
60.20: meib Eei Ba'Nxi maiq mwrtq, meib Eei Laaj maiq cvj faij, weig zu'g zyruq zuvq xij zruj meib Eei yetg liud Eei Fav, meib zu'g Raub Eyemq Eei Nxib Eia'g yaag Jiaj mig a'q.
60.7: Ke-Daa Eei yetg zuvq pa'ki yuvb kwanb xij kapq zunq meib naaiq. ne-Baa-yotq Eei pa'ki yuvb kruq xij fub suj meib. ninb Bua xij faauj yia Eei ziab txvb, penj yia a'Neiq zipq fovg hxg ziag Eei ka'naaiq. yia xij pun yia Eei pyauq kaub Favb laavg Jiaj zinb Daavg.
60.19: Ba'Nxi maiq cvj zruj meib luvb Nxi zang Eei Fav, Laab Eutg maiq cvj ziuj meib, weig zu'g zyruq xij zruj meib Eei yetg liud Eei Fav, meib Eei Tinb huvb xij penj meib Eei Favb laavg.
60.17: yia xij txb Jyem taaib tiq tovb si'q, txb Eaanb tiq Lia'q. yia xij txb tovb si'q taaib tiq Dyavj, txb Lia'q tiq la'pyeiq. yia xij lovg pcvb xn weig zruj meib Eei Jyen, pun zruj hxpg Eei Jauq kunq meib.
60.11: meib Eei zivb kcvb xij zanb zang Kxi Gxi, zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd maiq kwrn, weig pun myenb txb maang kua'q Eei zinb zxib taaib pun meib, lyemb ninb Bua Eei huvb tiaj yaag yend Jyenq taaib.
60.5: uaq zang meib mavg pwatg zyrug a'Neiq haig, Fyenb yrub kau, Ba'Riu Bokg Bokg Eei, weig zu'g Kxiq puvb zua'g Eei huaj Win taaib lxd meib, maang kua'q Eei zinb zxib yaag xij taaib kwei meib.
60.9: zwavj Kxib Rru zuvq zuaq Jyenq yia, Taan-sitq Eei Ravb kwanb txb Jauq, txb Jyenq meib Eei txn Bua yem ko Eei txvj Rwrnj, cvj txb Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Jyem Eaanb taaib, weig Taaib zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb Eei Buaj, se i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb, weig zu'g ninb pun meib maaib Favb laavg.
60.16: maang kua'q maang huvb xij kruj Jyenq meib, Navq maa kruj ninb Eei fu'Jweiq nx. meib zyrug hiuq tu'q yia, zyruq, tovb meib Eei Fruj zyruq, zua'g meib uaq taub se, yaa-Kopq Eei henq haig Eei Tinb huvb.
60.4: “Zau meib Eei Myen mavg pyei puv, pwatg meib Eei pc'g fivj yetg zuvq kapq zunq taaib meib naaiq. meib Eei txn Bua yem ko Eei txvj Rwrnj, meib Eei sia'q yaag Navq fu'Jweiq nx, tu'q Lxpq Jyenq taaib.
60.10: “kanb fivj myenb xij Zeij meib Eei zivb laatg. ninb Bua Eei huvb tiaj xij fub suj meib. weig zu'g yia Qiaj Jiad meib zyrug Bx'q meib, mq paag ib zang yia Kxb lyenb meib, Zeij en pun meib.
60.22: kaub zo'g Jiaj Eei myenb xij penj yetg fivj, kaub faij Jiaj Eei fivj xij penj yetg tomb kua'q myenb. yia se zyruq. Tauj zyavb hog yia xij syepg syepq Eei zruj naaiq teij sig.”
60.12: weig zu'g haiq nxm kua'q, haiq fivj myenb maiq fub suj meib, zuvq zu'g paaig waaig. uaq teij nxmb nxm kua'q yaag xij zu'g paaig waaig Revg.
60.15: “maiq kunq meib zu'g kwavg zu'g Rxv, maiq maaib myenb Jiaj Jauq. yia xij pun meib zruj Lo, Pwij tu'q Zev, txig Jiaj txig penj Fyenb yrub Eei txvj.
60.13: “le-Baa-nxn kaub lovj Jiaj Eei Dyavj, xij Tauj meib naaiq, pua Kwaaiq nxmb Eei zovb Zauj i Euvg zovb Dyavj, weig zxv yia Eei sivj ting Eei txvj Rweig, yaag pun yia Eei zauj Zaaiq Eei txvj maaib Favb laavg.
60.1: “Jiad taaib, ziuj Jyenq Fav, weig zu'g meib Eei Fav Tauj a'q.   zyruq Eei Favb laavg Zwrtq taaib ziuj Jyenq meib.

41.18: yia xij yem Daub Lav Fav Eei txvj pun Daaib Zwrtq, pun yem hxvd ka'Euad maaib uamb zivq. yia xij pun teib puvb haand penj uamb Faavb, pun Daub Gaai penj uamb zivq.
41.8: “mq paag meib, i-saa-laa-en, se yia Eei pru, yaa-Kopq, tovb yia kinq taaib uaq taub, yia Eei lob kcv txig, apg-laa-ham Eei zeib fun,
41.3: ninb zung ninb Bua mivb yaag pcvb xn Eei Jiaj ninb Bua, yavb ninb Eei zauj maiq Zaaiq Jiaj Eei Jauq.
41.21: zyruq kxvq, “txb meib Bua koj Eei sig taaib kxvq maa'b!” yaa-Kopq Eei huvb tiaj kxvq, “ meib Bua xij Rcv hivb Eei leid kunq taaib kxvq a'q.
41.14: o yaa-Kopq aag, meib Navq kcvb mau maiq henq, maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. o i-saa-laa-en aag, meib faij. yia kanb xij Tevj meib.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq, tovb zua'g meib uaq taub, se i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb.
41.23: kxvq pun yia Bua mwavj weig pun yia Bua hiuq tu'q hod Gaav xij maaib haiq Euvg sig Zwrtq. yia Bua zyrug haib hiuq tu'q meib Bua se zyenb. zruj Kuq sig fai zruj x'q sig weig pun yia Bua Raub yaag kamb Riaj.
41.6: kx'g myenb Tevj kx'g myenb Eei Jwavg laavd myenb yaag kxvq Buaj ninb Eei kxb yrud, “xij zu'g zuvj taamq.”
41.2: “haiq taub yua'g taub myenb yem tov puv taaib? ta'faanb ninb Eei zauj Zaaiq Eei txvj ninb tu'q hivb Revg.   zyruq zx'q ziaj kua'q Jiu pun ninb, pun ninb kunq ziaj taub huvb tiaj. ninb lovg ninb Eei Ru'g Daauq taij ninb Bua, pun ninb Bua penj niab Buv, yaag lovg ninb Eei Jwavb zinj pun ninb Bua Navq zu'g Ryaauj pwrng Eei Byaub Gaauq.
41.20: weig pun myenb pwatg zyrug hiuq, se pun ninb Bua Namq lovj yaag mevb pc'g, se zyruq Eei puad Navq naaiq nx zruj, se i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb zeij Zwrtq taaib.”
41.24: mavg maa'b! meib Bua se za'kevb maiq lamb lovg. meib Bua Eei kov yaag zruj maiq Zwrtq haiq Euvg. kinq meib Bua uaq taub se kamb Riaq haig.
41.28: yia mavg Eei zyavb hog maiq maaib myenb. yia mavg mq paag yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj maiq maaib Zaavb laavb Eei myenb. yia naaig yaag maiq maaib haiq taub tau.
41.7: Dyavb zavg Kwinj Jyemb zavg. lovg zweib taaq ywrnb Eei myenb Zev hxng Eei myenb. kxvq, “hxng tu'q yaaug haig.” ninb cvj lovg tiv tiv Jyenq pun miub favj maiq haib Kiv.
41.29: mavg maa'b! ninb Bua yetg zuvq maiq lamb lovg. ninb Bua zruj Eei Jauq yaag maiq lamb lovg. ninb Bua toj taaib Eei miub favj Navq Kuvb Ryaauj nx.”
41.19: yia xij yem teib puvb Waav zwavj sij-Daa zovb Dyavj, ta'su'q Dyavj, faan zi'g lyrub Dyavj Zauj ka'lanq Dyavj. yia xij yem teib puvb haand zwavj pua Kwaaiq nxmb Eei zovb, cvj Zauj i Euvg zovb Dyavj,
41.17: “myenb Jomg myenb Zauj tavb tonj Eei myenb lxd uam, yaag maiq maaib. ninb Bua Jaav Gaatq, Byetg Bxvj Gaai, mq paag yia, zyruq, xij tau ninb Bua. yia, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, maiq kwavg ninb Bua.
41.27: yia zruj taaub taub kxvq Buaj si-on, ‘mavg maa'b! ninb Bua yem naaiq.’ yia Paaiq taub trug Kuq fyenj Eei myenb mivb ye-lu-saa-lem.
41.11: “ta'faanb nrud meib uaq teij myenb zuvq xij zu'g Eaiq, zu'g paaig Myen. vcvg meib uaq teij, xij zu'g paaig, zu'g myetg.
41.5: Kxib Rru Eei myenb tu'q pwatg zyrug kamb Riaj, Jomg luvb Diaq Eei myenb sin zinj. ninb Bua pia'g taaib fatq,
41.9: yia yem luvb kxn zx'q meib, yaag yem Daub peib ko Jiaj Eei txvj heug meib taaib. yia kxvq, ‘meib zruj yia Eei pru.’ yia kinq meib taaib yaag maiq kwavg meib.
41.16: meib xij Eomj ninb Bua. Ryaauj zyrug pwrng ninb Bua mivb. Ryaaub zung xij pwrng ninb Bua faatq Raanj. mq paag meib xij Kauj zyruq tu'q Fyenb yrub. meib xij Zev i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb.
41.4: haiq taub zruj naaiq teij sig yaag zruj tu'q Zwrtq, yem tovb Zx heug txig Jiaj txig Zwrtq taaib? yia, zyruq, yem kxn, Tauj setq mweid yia yaag yem Eei. yia se tovb uaq taub a'q.”
41.10: maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. yia Zauj meib yem. maiq tuvq Hruq namj weig zu'g yia zruj meib Eei Tinb huvb. yia xij pun meib henq yaag xij Tevj meib. yia xij lovg yia pcvb fim Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad paaq Jyenq meib.
41.22: kunq txb taaib Buaj yia Bua xij maaib haiq Euvg sig Zwrtq. Jiaj taaib Eei sig xij zu'g Buaj yia Bua weig pun yia Bua zaab mavg zyrug hiuq tu'q naaiq teij sig Eei setq mweid xij Navq haiq nx.
41.12: maiq kunq meib lxd Zauj meib txib tekg Eei myenb, meib lxd yaag lxd maiq pwatg. Zauj meib Bx'q Jaaj uaq teij xij Jiaj Revg, zu'g paaig mig a'q.
41.15: “mavg maa'b! yia xij pun meib penj Bx'q Byaub Eei Jaab sig, syav Eei, laig Eei, maaib Eaab Eei. meib xij Bx'q Bov Baav mwrng Revg, yaag zruj pun Bovb aiq Navq Bia'q nx.
41.13: weig zu'g yia, zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, nanq meib Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad. se tovb yia kxvq Buaj meib, maiq tuvq kamb Riaj, yia xij Tevj meib.
41.1: Tinb huvb kxvq, “Kxib Rru aag, xij zu'g yem yia Eei Ra'Myen sekq Ria'g, xij zu'g pun maang fivj tu'q syavb Qa'q henq Jiad taaib. pun ninb Bua taaib fatq yaag pun ninb Bua kxvq, pun Bua taaib zunq lomb Rxib zu'g syemq tivg.
41.26: haiq taub yem kxn kxvq naaiq teij sig, weig pun yia Bua hiuq, fai Jaab Daavg Buaj, yia Bua Zivj taaib haib kxvq, ‘kxvq tu'q zu'g Eei’? maiq maaib haiq taub Buaj yia Bua hiuq tu'q naaiq teij sig, maiq maaib haiq taub Jaab Daavg kxvq. maiq maaib haiq taub haid meib Bua kxvq haiq Euvg.
41.25: “yia yem pa'q puv kinq taub myenb taaib, ninb yem Ba'Nxi Zwrtq puv heug yia Eei Buaj. ninb xij Zaaiq Jyenq kunq Eei myenb Navq ninb Bua zruj uamb pamg, Navq nanq niab mx Eei myenb Zaaiq pa'naib nia.

1.18: zyruq kxvq, “ib zang taaib maa'b! Bua lomb Rxib Zaavb laavb taaq za'eij. maiq kunq meib Bua Eei zwid hovg si'q, zuvq xij Tiuq Navq sxv nx Bopq pc'g. maiq kunq meib Bua Eei zwid Rang si'q, zuvq xij pc'g Navq pa'ki yuvb pyei.
1.8: Kuvj zevg si-on zivb Navq zuaq a'vung Wivj Eei liub, Navq yem kwaab uam Deig Eei liub, yaag Navq zu'g weib kxmj Eei zivb.
1.3: vovb zia'q tu'q ninb Eei zyruq, lxb yaag zia'q tu'q ninb Eei zyruq Eei miab zob, mq paag i-saa-laa-en myenb zia'q maiq tu'q, yia Eei pc'g fivj maiq pia'g Hruq.”
1.21: naaiq nxm zyepg zua'q zivb ib zang Tiuq Navq penj maaig sin Eei msia'q txn. zinb Daavg maaib pcvb fim pwavq Revg, zruj hxpg Eei sig yem ka'Euad. mq paag ib zang Kuvj maaib taij myenb Eei myenb yem.
1.14: yia Rxv haig meib Bua Eei syavb Laaj zipq Zauj tivg taaib Eei zipq. ib zang yia Daam Niaq, zuvq haid Daam Kruq haig.
1.23: meib Bua Eei Jyen vcvg yia, yaag Zauj Janb za'g zruj txig. taub taub a'Neiq zipq Eaanb Mwavj, Qa'q zruj weig tu'q zivb Eeig. ninb Bua maiq Tevj kruj kub hanb fu'Jweiq, aub kwaaq Eei sig yaag maiq Tauj ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen.
1.6: yem zaub penq Tauj mGxvb pcvb, zyavb sin maiq maaib yetg nxm txvj lovj. Kuvj maaib faauj Ryaamq, putq faav, maaib Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei ka'naaib mun, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub zatq fai Tevj peu, fai lovg yrub Raatq mun Eei txvj.
1.2: luvb aa'b! mwavj maa'b! Dau aa'b! pcv mnxmb mwavj, weig zu'g zyruq kxvq, “yia txb naamb Erud yaag txb ninb Bua Lo taaib, mq paag ninb Bua vcvg yia.
1.20: mq paag sij kxvq meib Bua maiq Kavq mwavj, cvj vcvg Jyenq nx, meib Bua zyrug zu'g Ru'g Daauq myetg meib Bua.” naaiq se zyruq kanb Eei Rwib kxvq.
1.24: weig naaiq, zyruq, tovb nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, se i-saa-laa-en Eei henq haig Tinb huvb kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia xij pun yia Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq, hivb Jiaj yia Eei winb wavq, yaag Jaauq win pun yia Eei winb Jaa.
1.28: mq paag Hruq vcvg Eei myenb Zauj zwib myenb xij lomb Rxib zu'g paaig Revg. kwavg zyruq uaq teij yaag xij zu'g myetg.
1.7: meib Bua Eei kua'q penj Daub Waav, meib Bua Eei zivb zu'g trud puaq Qwi. meib Bua mavg Jyenq Eei zyavb hog, kanb fivj myenb xij paaig waaig meib Bua Eei teib puv, zyrug zu'g kanb fivj myenb Byenq penj teib puvb Waav Revg.
1.29: “meib Bua xij zu'g Eaiq laaij meib Bua a'Neiq uaq teij Ba'ov zwei Dyavj. meib Bua laaij meib Bua kinq taaib Eei Wivj xij zu'g paaig Myen.
1.19: sij kxvq meib Bua pwavq Hruq mwavj yia Eei waag, meib Bua zyrug tu'q Eang yem teib puv kaub lovj Jiaj Eei ka'naaiq.
1.17: xij zu'g ho'g zruj hxpg Eei sig, lxd pcvb fim Eei Jauq, Tevj zu'g zeij Eei myenb. xij zu'g peu kub hanb fu'Jweiq yaag Tevj aub kwaaq Beng suv.”
1.31: maaib Qa'q Eei myenb zyrug Navq la'maab swij Eei Eovb, ninb zruj Eei kov Navq trub fiv. i Euvg zuvq zu'g trud puaq, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub Bx'q tu'q trud taig.”
1.30: meib Bua zyrug Navq Ba'ov zwei Dyavj, nxmb Gaai mivb, yaag Navq maiq maaib uam Eei Wivj.
1.27: si-on weig pcvb fim Eei Jauq tu'q zua'g Rwrnj, weig zruj hxpg Eei Jauq yem zivb ka'Euad kxiq Hruq Eei myenb yaag tu'q zua'g.
1.11: zyruq kxvq, “meib Bua fovg hxg ziag ka'naaiq Zamq Eei, weig yia maaib haiq Euvg eij leid? yia tu'q puaq ziag Eei yuvb kruq Zauj wij Jung Eei scvb Kuq Mei zuvq kauj haig a'q. yia yaag maiq a'Neiq vovb kruq Zauj pa'ki yuvb txn Zauj yuvb kruq Eei Ryaamq.
1.5: meib Bua weig haiq tiug vcvg Jyenq mivb zyrug xij zu'g cvj zu'g Bx'q? zyavb nxm mGxvq mun, Hruq yaag mau Revg.
1.9: sij kxvq nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq maiq lyrub Fiag teij zeib fun Zwrtq sivj mcvg, yia Bua zyrug zu'g Navq soj-Dom, yaag Navq ko-mo-laa.
1.16: meib Bua xij zu'g saaj kanb Zivb Revg taaib, zx'q Gxi meib Bua Eei x'q sig pun yia maiq zu'g mavg. tivb Fiag, maiq tuvq zruj waaig sig.
1.4: aa, paamd zwid Eei yetg kua'q myenb, zwid Niaq haig Eei pc'g fivj, zruj x'q sig Eei zwavq, zruj paaig waaig Eei naamb Erud. ninb Bua kwavg zyruq, mavg Piaj i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb. ninb Bua Win Gaav leib ninb.
1.10: meib Bua zruj Lo, kunq soj-Dom zivb Eei myenb aa'b! mwavj zyruq Eei waag maa'b!   ko-mo-laa zivb Eei pc'g fivj aa'b! pcv mnxmb mwavj yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb Faauj Eei waag.
1.22: meib Bua Eei Eaanb Tiuq penj Eaanb Gaiq, meib Bua Eei tiub Kuq Peuj Jyenq uam.
1.12: meib Bua taaib yem yia Eei Ra'Myen Eei zyavb hog, haiq taub heug meib Bua taaib ling yia Eei laatg ka'Euad?
1.15: meib Bua suv Jyenq puad tauj kauj Eei zyavb hog, yia xij pwav Jyenq yia Eei mziv maiq mavg meib Bua. maiq kunq meib Bua tauj kauj Zamq, yia maiq mwavj. meib Bua Eei puad maaib taij myenb Eei Ryaamq kua'q pwavq Revg.
1.13: meib Bua maiq tuvq cvj txb meib Bua maiq lamb lovg Eei ka'naaiq fovg hxg pun yia, meib Bua Eei huv yia kamb Riaq haig. syavb Laaj Zauj tivb kov Nxi Zauj heug kapq zunq Eei tomb wig, yia tiaq maiq tu'q meib Bua zruj Eei zwid Zauj meib Bua kan leid kapq zunq Eei wig.
1.1: naaiq se aa-mxtq Eei txn, i-saa-yaa, pwatg laaug yaavb Eei sig, kxvq Tauj yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Jaub lrug txij utg-si-yaa, yo-Taam, aa-hatg Zauj he-se-Ki-yaa zruj yu-Daa huvb Eei zyavb hog.
1.26: yia xij pun meib Bua Eei syemq zwid Jyen Navq lod uaq nx, yaag pun meib Bua Eei Zaavb laavb myenb Navq taaub tavb uaq zang. Ga'haaq myenb zyrug heug naaiq nxm zivb penj pcvb fim, zyepg zua'q Eei zivb.”
1.25: yia xij lovg yia Eei puad zruj pun meib Bua. xij sinj meib Bua Navq sinj Jyem Eaanb Eei Gaiq Zwrtq. se Navq lovg Riab uam Roj Revg nx, zx'q Gxi maiq Zivb Revg Eei yetg zuvq.

39.3: trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, taaib lxd he-se-Ki-yaa naaig kaaj, “naaiq teij myenb kxvq haiq Euvg? yem haaij taaib?” he-se-Ki-yaa tau, “ninb Bua yem ko Eei teib puv taaib, se yem Baa-Bi-lon taaib.”
39.8: he-se-Ki-yaa tau i-saa-yaa, “meib trug taaib naaiq Jruj zyruq Eei waag se lovj Eei.” ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig zu'g ninb yem Hruq Namq, “ta'faanb yia Eei seij zeiq Taaib pcvb Eei, pcvb xn Eei.”
39.4: i-saa-yaa naaig, “yem meib Eei huvb ting ninb Bua tu'q pwatg haiq Euvg?” he-se-Ki-yaa kxvq, “ta'faanb yem yia Eei huvb ting maaib Eei ka'naaiq ninb Bua tu'q pwatg Revg. yem yia syru ka'naaiq Eei txvj, maiq maaib yetg Euvg yia maiq pun ninb Bua mavg.”
39.2: he-se-Ki-yaa zipq naaiq teij trug fyenj myenb yaag pun ninb Bua mavg ninb syru Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq Eei txvj yetg zuvq ka'naaiq. se pun ninb Bua mavg Jyem, Eaanb, laapg liug, Jaaij haig Eei yrub Zauj ninb Bx'q Jaaj Eei yetg zuvq ua'g king, Zauj yem syru Euvb Euvg Eei txvj Eei ka'naaiq. yem ninb Eei huvb ting Zauj zyavb nxm kua'q Eei ka'naaiq maiq maaib yetg Euvg he-se-Ki-yaa maiq pun ninb Bua mavg.
39.6: ‘Nxib Eia'g zuvq xij Tauj. yem meib Eei huvb ting Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq Zauj meib Eei ovb Taaij syru Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi Eei ka'naaiq, xij zu'g Zaavq mivb Tauj Baa-Bi-lon. yetg Euvg yaag maiq lyrub.’ naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
39.5: i-saa-yaa zyrug kxvq Buaj he-se-Ki-yaa, “mwavj nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Eei waag maa'b!
39.7: ‘maaib teij yem meib kanb Eei Ryaamb fei Zwrtq Eei txnb Jweiq funb fa'q zuvq xij zu'g kwaatq mivb yem Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb ting penj zu'g im toq Eei myenb.’+”
39.1: txij uaq teij zyavb hog Baa-laa-Dan Eei txn, Baa-Bi-lon kua'q Eei huvb, me-lo-Dakg-Baa-laa-Dan, haid kxvq he-se-Ki-yaa putq pcvg cvj lovj taaib zyrug fuvj fyenj Zauj zivb Eeig mivb pun ninb.

47.3: meib Eei sin xij zu'g lcvb kcvq Eei yem, meib Eei pivb Zyruq zyrug Zwrtq. yia xij Jaauq win, yia yaag maiq Eaavg haiq taub.”
47.8: “meib Namq Fyenb yrub, zweid Jyenq haid yem tu'q wrnq Eei myenb aa'b! mwavj naaiq teij waag maa'b! meib yem Hruq Namq taaib ‘Kuvj maaib yia. Zwrtq liud yia maiq maaib kanb taub. yia yetg liud maiq zruj aub kwaaq yaag maiq zu'g kwavg fu'Jweiq.’
47.9: yetg sib ken Navq, yem yetg Nxi ka'Euad, meib xij zu'g pwavb naaiq teij i Euvg sig pwavq Revg, se xij zu'g kwavg fu'Jweiq yaag penj aub kwaaq, maiq kunq meib zruj faatq Zamq, yaag zruj ziaj Euvg hruq Eei waag.
47.7: meib kanb kxvq, ‘yia yetg liud tu'q zruj huvb maag.’ mq paag meib maiq lovb lovj Eei Namq Tauj naaiq teij sig, yaag maiq Javj naaiq teij sig setq mweid xij Navq haiq nx.
47.5: “o Baa-Bi-lon myenb aag, zweid Jyenq sekg sekq Eei yaag pia'g Mwavj Eei txvj. yem naaiq mivb myenb maiq heug meib zruj ziaj kua'q Eei huvb maag.
47.14: mavg maa'b! ninb Bua se Navq Byaub Gaauq kxn, ninb Bua xij zu'g trud puaq Qwi. ninb Bua Fruj maiq tu'q ninb Bua kanb pyauj Dutq trud Eei Qa'q. naaiq maiq zeid haib Tevj myenb syruq Eei trub Taanj, yaag maiq zeid pun myenb Raauj Eei trud.
47.4: zua'g yia Bua uaq taub Eei Buaj heug nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq. ninb se i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb.
47.2: nanq mxg mxg Bwrnq maa'b! zx'q Gxi Byxvd Myen Eei Dia. Jaiq Gxi meib Eei lwib Daauq, pun Zamb zwib Zwrtq, yavb Jauq Jiaj Do'q.
47.6: yia Qiaj Jiad yia Eei pc'g fivj, zyrug pun yia Ripg Eei pwrng maaib wij. yia zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yem meib Bua Eei puab Diaq. meib Bua yaag maiq Kxb lyenb ninb Bua. meib Bua zx'q Dyavb kaad Niaq Eei kaad Jyenq myenb koj myenb.
47.13: meib Zaavb laavb Zamq Tauj meib zuvq Kruq haig. pun mavg luvb samj Leij Eei myenb, se pavg syavb Laaj kxvq zinb hod waag Eei myenb, Zwrtq taaib Fruj meib pyauj Dutq meib xij zu'g pwavb Eei sig.
47.12: “lyepg wrnq meib lunj Eei zyavb hog Qa'q zruj Eei faatq, Zauj ziaj Euvg hruq Eei waag maa'b! Riaj meib haib tu'q lovj, Riaj haib hc'q myenb sin zinj.
47.15: tovb meib Zauj Jyenq zruj kov Eei myenb, se yem meib lunj Eei zyavb hog meib Zauj ninb Bua maaid maaig, Kuvj haib Tevj meib Dovg naaiq Navq. ninb Bua kx'g myenb kan kx'g myenb Eei Jauq, maiq maaib yetg taub haib Fruj meib.
47.11: mq paag meib xij zu'g pwavb Zyruq Eei sig. meib yaag maiq haib zruj faatq Gc'q Dutq. meib xij zu'g pwavb tomb ze'g naang, yaag maiq maaib haiq Euvg haib siaj tu'q Zwrtq. meib Javj maiq zaaig Eei zyavb hog meib lyemb zeib zu'g myetg.
47.1: “o Baa-Bi-lon zivb Eei myenb aa'b! Fiag taaib zweid Jyenq niab Buv maa'b! Ken-Dia myenb aa'b! meib maiq maaib weig zweid. xij zu'g zweid Jyenq Dau. yem naaiq mivb myenb maiq heug meib zruj mau Eei, puab zauj lunj Eei myenb.
47.10: meib Kauj kanb zruj Eei x'q sig zyrug kxvq, ‘maiq maaib haiq taub pwatg yia.’ meib Eei Zovb mevb Zauj wrnb zaav txb meib txvg Jauq, meib zyrug yem Hruq Namq, ‘Kuvj maaib yia. Zwrtq liud yia maiq maaib kanb taub.’

10.18: ninb Eei kemb lomg Zauj Daub Truq lovj Eei Deig Eei Favb laavg,   zyruq yaag xij puaq Qwi Revg, Navq myenb putq pcvb vaaid mig a'q
10.8: ninb kxvq, ‘yia Eei pcvb pyeiq yetg zuvq zruj huvb maiq zeid?
10.33: mavg maa'b! zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, xij lovg tomb Qa'q Va'q Dyavb Gwaab Daauq Dutq. Lav Jiaj Eei Dyavj zuvq zu'g kxij nauq, Lav haig Eei Dyavj xij zu'g kxij Fiag.
10.3: Tauj tivg zwid Eei Nxi, zu'g ze'g naang yem ko Eei taaib, meib Bua Navq haiq nx zruj? meib Bua xij pyauj mivb lxd haiq taub Tevj? meib Bua Eei zinb zxib meib Bua xij syru haaij?
10.32: ib Nxi winb wavq xij yem nopq muvq, Ewrtq puab Jwrnb pun si-on myenb yem Eei Bov, se ye-lu-saa-lem yem Eei Bov.
10.21: maaib zevg Fiag Eei myenb xij Rwrnj taaib lxd henq haig Eei Tinb huvb, se yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun zevg Fiag Eei myenb xij Rwrnj.
10.14: Navq myenb lom pia'g nx'g laud, yia Eei puad lom pia'g nxmb nxm kua'q zx'q ninb Bua Eei zinb zxib. Navq myenb Raud nx'g kwavg Eei Jauj, yia yaag tu'q Revg zyavb nxm luvb Diaq. maiq maaib yetg Kwaaiq Daatq tovd, fai yetg suv Rwib heug.’+”
10.23: weig zu'g zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, zuvq xij zruj ziuj ninb tivg zyavj Eei zruj pun zyavb nxm teib puv.
10.6: yia xij Paaiq atg-si-lia myenb mivb Bx'q maiq kan Tinb huvb Eei yetg kua'q myenb. yia Paaiq ninb Bua mivb Bx'q Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad Eei yetg fivj myenb, weig luq yaag Zaavq ninb Bua Eei ka'naaiq, yaag Zaaiq ninb Bua Fiag Navq Zaaiq yem heib hxvg Eei uamb pamg.
10.34: ninb yaag xij lovg pruq kxij kemb lomg. le-Baa-nxn Eei tomb Dyavj yaag xij zu'g henq haig uaq taub kxij.
10.2: meib Bua xij pun tavb tonj Eei myenb maiq tu'q pcvb fim Eei leid, xij Kwei yia Eei pc'g fivj Eei myenb Jomg myenb, maiq pun ninb Bua tu'q hxpg zu'g tu'q Eei leid. weig pun aub kwaaq txvj luq Eei ka'naaiq, yaag pun kub hanb fu'Jweiq txvj Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq.
10.20: Tauj uaq Nxi, i-saa-laa-en zevg Fiag Eei myenb, se yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun, tu'q mcvg Zwrtq uaq teij, yem naaiq mivb maiq Kauj Bx'q ninb Bua uaq teij, mq paag ninb Bua xij zyepg zua'q Eei Kauj zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb.
10.24: weig naaiq, zyruq, se nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “o yia Eei pc'g fivj, yem si-on Eei myenb aa'b! maiq tuvq kamb Riaj atg-si-lia myenb. ninb Bua lovg pyaaq Bx'q meib Bua, cvj yaamb Dyavb Donj, Navq i-yipq myenb zruj nx.
10.28: atg-si-lia Eei pcv Tauj ai-yaatq zivb, cvj Jiaj mi-kon zivb, yaag zx'q ninb Bua Eei ka'naaiq an Jyenq mikq-maatq mig a'q.
10.7: mq paag atg-si-lia huvb Eei Hruq maiq zeid Navq naaiq nx Namq. yem Hruq ninb maiq zeid xij Navq naaig zruj. ninb Eei za'eij se ninb xij myetg, xij pun ziaj nxm kua'q zutg Revg.
10.29: ninb Bua Jiaj Tov Bovb Qavj, pweij mwrnd ke-Baa. laa-maa zivb Eei myenb sin zinj Revg, sau-lo Eei ki-Be-aa zivb Eei myenb pyauj mig a'q.
10.19: ninb Eei kemb lomg zevg Fiag Eei Dyavj zo'g haig, lyemb fu'Jweiq haib saauq tu'q Revg Eei.
10.17: i-saa-laa-en Eei Fav zyrug penj trud. ninb Bua Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb penj trub Byetg. yem yetg Nxi Navq ninb xij zx'q atg-si-lia huvb Eei Fimb Zru Fimb mwrng puaq Qwi Revg.
10.31: matq-me-naa myenb pyauj mig a'q. ke-Bim Eei pc'g fivj lxd txvj pivj.
10.30: kan-lim myenb aa'b! heug Bwi Eei maa'b! lai-saa myenb aa'b! mwavj maa'b! aa-naa-Totq myenb aa'b! za'kevb Kxb lyenb Eei.
10.27: Tauj uaq Nxi, atg-si-lia myenb pun meib Bua Daam Eei Daamj tu'q yem meib Bua Eei Ba'taub prub Fiag. kaad Eei Dyavb kaad zuvq zu'g wrtq nauq, maiq yem meib Bua Eei Jaav a'q.
10.11: uaq Euvg, yia maiq zeid haib zruj pun ye-lu-saa-lem Zauj ninb Eei miub favj, Navq yia zruj pun saa-maa-lia Zauj ninb Eei miub favj fai?’+”
10.5: “atg-si-lia myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q. yia lovg ninb Bua txvj pyaaq Bx'q yia Qiaj Jiad uaq fivj myenb, yia lovg ninb Bua txvj nanq Dyavb Donj Bx'q yia nrud Eei myenb.
10.9: Kaan-no zivb zu'g Kruq Navq Kaan-Ke-mitq zivb maiq zeid? haa-matq zu'g Navq aan-patg zivb maiq zeid? saa-maa-lia yaag zu'g Navq Daa-matq-katg zivb maiq zeid?
10.16: weig naaiq zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, xij pun atg-si-lia Jung haig Eei pcv putq pcvb vaaid. ninb Bua Eei sin zyrug Navq maaib trud zia'g taaib, Navq puaq Jyenq nx.
10.4: Zwrtq liud meib Bua zu'g Zauj Zaavq mivb Eei myenb, fai Bx'q Jaaj zu'g taij taig, maiq zevg haiq Euvg a'q. maiq kunq Navq naaig, ninb Eei ka'Qiaj Zxg maiq fiu. ninb Zxg suv Jyenq ninb Eei puad.
10.10: Navq yia suv puad Bx'q zavg miub favj uaq teij kua'q, uaq teij kua'q maaib zu'g taaib Eei miub favj kaub Zamq yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zauj saa-maa-lia.
10.22: o i-saa-laa-en myenb aag, maiq kunq meib Bua Eei myenb Dovg Kxiq Eei saab zyru Zamq, Kuvj maaib zevg Fiag Eei myenb tu'q Rwrnj Navq. zu'g myetg Eei Jauq tivg zyavj a'q, ziuj hxpg zu'g tu'q Eei xij zu'g winb pun ninb Bua, Navq uam pwavq myend nx.
10.12: zyruq yem si-on Bov Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem zruj zyavj ninb Eei yetg zuvq kov, ninb zyrug kxvq, “yia xij tivg atg-si-lia huvb Eei zwid, weig zu'g ninb Hruq mauj, Zev kanb Lo, mzivb Jaaj Lav.
10.15: pruq Zev kanb kaub Lo lovg pruq kxij Dyavj uaq taub fai? Fruj Zev kanb kaub Lo lovg Fruj uaq taub fai? pyaaq maiq haib nanq myenb, se myenb nanq pyaaq. Dyavb Donj maiq haib nanq myenb, se myenb nanq Dyavb Donj.
10.13: weig zu'g ninb kxvq, “+‘yia lovg yia Eei puad Eei Qa'q Navq naaiq nx zruj. yia Kauj yia kanb Eei Zovb mevb weig zu'g yia maaib wrnb zaav. yia swiq kua'q Eei kapg Jaaij, yaag Zaavq ninb Bua Eei zinb zxib. Navq taub henq haig Eei myenb, yia pun ninb Bua Eei huvb tiaj Twij weig.
10.1: lyepg maiq pcvb fim Eei leib latg Zauj fiaq pun myenb zu'g zeij Eei leid uaq teij xij zu'g Kruq a'q.
10.26: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq zyrug lovg pyaab pin Bx'q ninb Bua, Navq yem o-lepq Eei la'pyeiq Bx'q mi-Dyen myenb.   zyruq xij suv ninb Eei pyaab Byaag yem uam kub vwaaig, Navq ninb yem i-yipq zruj uaq nx.
10.25: yia Qiaj Jiad meib Bua Eei Jauq maiq laub paag mig a'q. yia zyrug nrud ninb Bua cvj pun ninb Bua zu'g myetg.”

25.3: weig naaiq henq Eei myenb maanb xij Zev meib, myenb to'g myenb Eei kua'q Eei zivb xij Taaib meib.
25.8: ninb xij na'q zu'g taig Eei Qa'q Tauj yetg liud. zyruq Tinb huvb xij sxtq Gxi mrud taub myenb Eei uamb mweig. ninb Eei pc'g fivj yem kxmj luvb Diaq zu'g tiaq Eaiq, Tinb huvb xij zx'q Gxi. naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
25.9: Tauj uaq Nxi myenb xij kxvq, “naaiq se yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb. yia Bua zuaq Jyenq ninb weig pun ninb Fruj yia Bua. naaiq se zyruq, yia Bua mtaaib zuaq ninb. yia Bua xij zu'g weig ninb Eei Fruj en a'Neiq, xnb lx'g.”
25.7: yem naaiq nxm Bov ninb xij myetg Txvq maang fivj Eei ka'naaiq, Zauj Byxvd maang kua'q myenb Eei Dia.
25.5: yaag Navq teib puvb haand Jxm Eei Qiaj. meib tavq Jyenq kanb fivj myenb Bwi Eei Qiaj. Bwrnj Txvq Jyenq pun yua'q Eei Qiaj Navq haiq nx syeng mivb, myenb to'g myenb Eei Qiaj Navq uaq nx sekq mig a'q.
25.4: weig zu'g meib zruj myenb Jomg myenb Daaub Kauj Eei txvj, yaag zruj txvj pun tavb tonj myenb zu'g Kruq Eei zyavb hog Kauj wrnq, cvj penj pivj tomb Ryaauj Eei txvj, yaag Tevj myenb pivj Eutg Txvq laavb. weig zu'g myenb to'g myenb Eei Qiaj se Navq tomb Ryaauj pwrng zivb laatg,
25.2: meib pun zivb penj ka'naaib Dwi, weib wrnq Eei zivb zu'g paaig waaig. meib pun kanb fivj myenb wrnq Eei zivb yem naaiq mivb maiq haib penj zivb, yetg liud maiq tu'q cvj Zeij Jiad.
25.6: yem naaiq nxm Bov kub vwaaig, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq xij weig maang fivj, Beng lovj Jiaj Eei laib Naavj, maaib syru Jyenq laub Eei a'vung tiuq, se lovj Jiaj Eei tiuq Zauj lovj Jiaj Eei Eang hopq.
25.12: meib Bua wrnq Eei, Lav Eei zivb laatg ninb xij Zc'q Fiag, Baav Fiag Tauj Dau, zuvq Fiag Tauj niab Buv.
25.11: ninb zyrug yem naaig ka'Euad suv puad Zwrtq Navq zyrub uam myenb suv puad Zwrtq zyrub uam nx. mq paag Tinb huvb xij pun ninb Bua zruj mauj Eei Jauq, Zauj ninb Bua Eei puad Eei puab taub zruj Eei, Dxtq Fiag aiq.
25.1: o zyruq aag, meib se yia Eei Tinb huvb. yia xij Taaib meib yaag Zev meib Eei mevb, weig zu'g meib zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig, ziuj meib lob Nxi tivg taaib Eei za'eij zyepg zua'q, tunb yunb Eei zruj zyavj.
25.10: zyruq Eei puad xij yem naaiq nxm Bov, mq paag mo-apg myenb xij yem kanb Eei txvj zu'g Zaaiq Fiag, Navq Byaub Gaauq zu'g Zaaiq Fiag Gaib Dwi ka'Euad.

22.18: zx'q meib Funb Jyenq Navq nxm ka'naaiq Junb Eei, cvj zxi pia'g nxm Lo, Javq Eei teib puv. yem naaig meib zyrug taig, meib Eei Favb laavg Eei maab Zia yaag xij zu'g kwavg Jyenq naaig. meib se pun meib Eei zyruq Eei pyauq zov myenb zu'g Eaiq.
22.8: Tinb huvb zx'q Gxi Txvq yu-Daa Eei ka'naaiq. Tauj uaq Nxi meib Bua zyrug yem maaib Buaj heug kemb  uaq nxm pyauq, zx'q Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king Zwrtq.
22.3: meib Bua Eei yetg zuvq Jyen lomb Rxib pyauj, lyemb Jwavb zinj maiq tu'q pwrnq yaag zu'g zx'q mig a'q. maiq kunq pyauj mivb Dovg haaij ko, ta'faanb lxd pwatg Eei, meib Bua yetg zuvq zu'g zx'q mig a'q.
22.21: yia xij zx'q meib Eei lwib Daauq pun ninb zu'q, cvj zx'q meib sai Jaaiq Eei Dia Tevj ninb sai Jyenq. yia yaag xij zx'q meib Eei hatg maad Jiu pun ninb, ninb zyrug zruj Navq tia weig ye-lu-saa-lem myenb Zauj yu-Daa Eei zeib fun.
22.14: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq kanb Navq naaiq nx kxvq pun yia mwavj, “naaiq teij zwid yia Dovg haaij zuvq maiq kwavg Tauj meib Bua taig.” naaiq se zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, kxvq Eei waag.
22.23: yia xij pun ninb yem tu'q wrnq Eei, Navq lovg Dyavb tiv tiv Jyenq wrnq Eei txvj nx. weig ninb zruj Eei sig, myenb zyrug Taaib ninb Eei trub zov.
22.6: e-laam txb Jyenq fxvb Dovb, cvj maaib Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia Zauj keb maad pcv. Ki-aa zx'q Zwrtq Txvb paaib.
22.2: meib Bua Eei muvq maaib Bwi Eei Qiaj pwavq Revg. maaib Byrub Byrub, naug Eitg Eei zivb aa'b! yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj zu'g taij Eei myenb, maiq zeid zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij, yaag maiq zeid weig Bx'q Jaaj taig.
22.20: “uaq Nxi yia xij heug yia Eei pru, hin-Ki-yaa Eei txn, e-li-yaa-Kim, taaib.
22.24: ninb Eei trub zov myenb yetg zuvq txn sia'q zeib fun xij pavg ninb Navq fiub Jaab txvj, se tiub zaanq Zauj tiub kxvg, Kwavj Jyenq ninb.”
22.7: meib Bua kaub lovj Jiaj Eei hxvd maaib Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia pwavq Revg. keb maad pcv yaag mivb yem Jyenq zivb kcvb Daavg.
22.19: yia xij zung meib Zwrtq zruj Jyen Eei mevb, xij Twij meib Zwrtq maiq tu'q zruj Jyen.’
22.17: “+‘o meib naaiq taub myenb henq myenb aa'b!   zyruq xij lovg tomb Qa'q zxi meib kwavg. ninb xij zx'q meib nanq zyetg,
22.11: yem i puv zivb laatg Bu'Dovj ninb Bua zruj nxm txvj weig syru lob uamb tomb Eei uam. mq paag meib Bua maiq Kauj zruj Zwrtq naaiq teij sig Eei Tinb huvb. meib Bua maiq Javj lob Nxi taaq Zwrtq naaiq Euvg za'eij uaq taub.
22.5: weig zu'g zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, maaib nxm Nxi pun hing yaavb Eei hxvd maaib myenb Byrub Byrub Eei, maaib Zeuj lung Eei, maaib Zaaiq Eei sig. zivb laatg xij zu'g Bx'q Baav, maaib heug Eei Qiaj Bwi cvq Tauj Bov.
22.9: meib Bua pwatg Daa-witq Eei zivb Eei zivb laatg Tov ziaj nxm txvj. meib Bua yaag syru uam yem uaq Diaq Eei uamb tomb.
22.16: ‘meib maaib haiq Euvg leid yem naaiq? maaib meib Eei haiq taub myenb yem naaiq meib Zivj yem naaiq weig kanb zu'g nxm zruq? meib yem naaiq Lav Eei txvj zu'g zruq, se zu'g la'pyeiq weig zruj meib kanb Eei zruq.
22.4: weig naaiq yia kxvq, “maiq tuvq mavg yia a'q. weig yia Eei pc'g fivj zu'g myetg, pun yia Hruq mun Eei Eyemq. maiq tuvq kwavg Qa'q xn yia Eei Hruq a'q.”
22.10: meib Bua saauq yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pyauq, yaag Zc'q pyauq weig lovg zxg zivb laatg.
22.22: yia xij zx'q Daa-witq Eei zeib fun Eei fxb zeib Jiu pun ninb. ninb Kxi, maiq maaib haiq taub kwrn. ninb kwrn, maiq maaib haiq taub Kxi.
22.12: yem uaq Nxi, zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, heug meib Bua Eyemq tu'q Raub Eei, Teij mGxvq Fav, zu'q la'maab Diab Zru.
22.15: zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “mivb a'q. mivb lxd kunq huvb ting Eei tomb Jyen, se mivb lxd sepq-naa kxvq Buaj ninb,
22.13: taauj Rwrnj, maaib Fyenb yrub naug Eitg, taij vovb taij pa'ki yuvb, Eang xq, hopq a'vung tiuq. meib Bua kxvq, “kunq Eang kunq hopq weig zu'g Fav Nxi yia Bua taig a'q.”
22.1: naaiq se kxvq hing yaavb Eei hxvd Eei waag. meib Bua maaib haiq Euvg sig Zwrtq meib Bua yetg zuvq Zivj faauj pyaub vxb?
22.25: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq kxvq, “Tauj uaq Nxi, tiv Jyenq wrnq Eei txvj Eei Dyavb tiv zyrug zu'g kaatq Dutq mivb, Dxtq ka'Diaq Dau. Kwavj Jyenq Dyavb tiv Eei ka'naaiq zyrug zu'g Pai Fiag Revg.” weig zu'g naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.

42.18: “meib Bua mnxmb Duv Eei myenb aa'b! mwavj maa'b! meib Bua mziv mcvb Eei myenb aa'b! mavg maa'b!
42.8: “yia se zyruq. naaiq se yia Eei Buaj. yia Eei Favb laavg yia maiq zx'q pun kanb taub, yaag maiq pun lovg Zev yia Eei waag Zev tiu taaib Eei miub favj.
42.3: lua'g ti'g kwcvq topq mivb ninb maiq aauq Dutq, tavb Zoq kanj Eei syruj ninb yaag maiq pyomq taig. ninb xij zyepg zua'q Eei pun pcvb fim Eei Jauq Zwrtq.
42.21: zyruq weig kanb zruj hxpg Eei Jauq a'Neiq pun ninb Eei leib latg weib Lo yaag Favb laavg.
42.14: “yia Eyend Jyenq Rwib laub a'q. yia sekq Ria'g, maiq Ko lo, mq paag ib zang Navq msia'q txn xij Dutq sin, yia heug Jyenq, Tauq Qiaj Kwrnj Funb Funb Eei.
42.23: yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj maaib haiq taub xij mwavj naaiq teij waag? Ga'haaq hivq maaib haiq taub xij lovg Hruq mwavj?
42.6: “yia, zyruq, lovg zruj hxpg Eei Jauq heug meib taaib. yia xij nanq Jyenq meib Eei puad, kruj Jyenq meib. yia xij lovg meib Zauj zwavj myenb lyepg Jiad vcvg waag, yaag pun meib zruj maang kua'q myenb Eei Fav,
42.2: ninb maiq naug fai heug Qiaj Bwi, ninb maiq yem heib hxvg kxvq waag Lo.
42.20: i-saa-laa-en myenb aa'b! meib Bua pwatg ziaj Euvg, mq paag Navq maiq pwatg nx. meib Bua Eei mnxmb haib mwavj tu'q haid, mq paag meib Bua maiq haid haiq Euvg.”
42.24: haiq taub Jiu yaa-Kopq penj zu'g Zaavq Eei ka'naaiq, yaag zx'q i-saa-laa-en pun luq Eei myenb luq? se zyruq, tovb yia Bua paamd zwid uaq taub maiq zeid? weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq lcvd yavb ninb Eei Jauq, ninb Bua yaag maiq kan ninb Eei leib latg.
42.7: weig pun mziv mcvb Eei myenb haib mavg tu'q pwatg, weig txb zu'g wrnj lob uaq teij Zwrtq taaib, yaag puvj zweid Jyenq lob Mwavj Eei myenb Zwrtq.
42.19: haiq taub mziv mcvb? se yia Eei pru. fai haiq taub mnxmb Duv Navq yia Paaiq mivb Eei trug fyenj myenb? haiq taub mziv mcvb Navq Zauj yia hxpg Hruq uaq taub, fai haiq taub mziv mcvb Navq zyruq Eei pru?
42.17: mq paag Kauj tiu taaib Eei miub favj, cvj kxvq Buaj toj taaib Eei miub favj, ‘meib Bua zruj yia Bua Eei zyenb’ uaq teij, naaiq Euvg myenb xij zu'g Twij Rwrnj Ga'haaq yaag zu'g Eaiq Tauj taaub.
42.11: teib puvb Waav Zauj yem naaig ka'Euad Eei zivb, lyemb Ke-Daa myenb tivb zepq Eei txvj xij zu'g Zwrtq Qiaj. se-e-laa myenb xij zu'g Fyenb yrub Eei paauj Ruv, yem Bovb nivq kub vwaaig heug.
42.5: Tinb huvb zeij luvb cvj Zxv Jyenq. ninb zx'q Dau Zauj yetg zuvq yem Dau Zwrtq Eei ka'naaiq Taan Gxi, yaag pun yem Daub peib Eei zwavj myenb maaib Qiaj Tauq, pun yavb luvb Diaq Eei myenb maaib mcvg zyavb.”   zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq,
42.9: mavg maa'b! zinb Daavg Eei sig Jiaj mig a'q. ib zang yia kxvq syavb sig. naaiq teij sig maiq kcvb Zwrtq yia zyrug Jaab Daavg kxvq Buaj meib Bua.”
42.16: yia xij txb mziv mcvb myenb yavb ninb Bua zia'q maiq tu'q Eei Jauq, xij txb ninb Bua yavb ninb Bua maiq hiuq tu'q Eei Jaub lrug. yia xij yem ninb Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj pun Mwavj Tiuq penj Fav, xij pun maiq ywrnb Eei Jauq ywrnb Eei. naaiq teij sig se yia xij zruj Eei, yia zuvq maiq kwavg.
42.4: ninb maiq swei, Hruq yaag maiq namj, Tauj ninb lyepg pcvb fim Eei leid yem luvb Diaq. Kxib Rru Eei myenb yaag zuaq Jyenq ninb Eei leib latg.”
42.10: xij zu'g paauj tiub syavb Ruv Zev zyruq. Jomg luvb Diaq xij zu'g Zev ninb. mivb Kxiq Eei myenb Zauj yetg zuvq yem Kxiq Eei ka'naaiq, Kxib Rru Zauj yem Kxib Rru Eei myenb xij zu'g Zev ninb.
42.22: mq paag naaiq teij pc'g fivj zu'g Zaavq, zu'g luq. ninb Bua yetg zuvq zu'g wrnj Jyenq Daub Kwrtq, fai zu'g zx'q taaib wrnj Jyenq lob. ninb Bua penj Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq yaag maiq maaib haiq taub Fruj ninb Bua. yaag maiq maaib myenb kxvq, “xij zu'g fuvj Rwrnj.”
42.12: ninb Bua xij zu'g Taaib zyruq, yaag yem uaq Kxib Rru Zev ninb.
42.15: yia xij pun tomb Bov fiub Bov penj Daub Waav, pun ninb Bua Eei yetg zuvq miaq Gaai. yia xij pun Daaib Tiuq penj Daaib Rru, yaag pun uamb tomb Gaai mivb.
42.13: zyruq Navq taub myenb henq myenb xij Zwrtq mivb yaag Navq taub Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei myenb, ninb xij zuvj Qa'q, Jxm Hruq. ninb naug, Qa'q heug Bx'q Jaaj Eei Qiaj Bwi, ninb zuvq hivb Jiaj ninb Eei winb wavq.
42.1: zyruq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! naaiq se yia Eei pru. yia paaq Jyenq ninb. yia kinq ninb taaib yaag a'Neiq ninb. yia zx'q yia Eei sivj livb Zeij pun ninb. ninb xij pun maang kua'q tu'q pcvb fim Eei leid.
42.25: weig naaiq ninb nrud haig, ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq, pun ninb Bua zu'g Bx'q tomb Jaaj Zyruq Eei sig. maaib trud weib kxmj ninb Bua, mq paag ninb Bua maiq mevb pc'g. trud puaq Jyenq ninb Bua, mq paag ninb Bua Navq maiq hiuq nx.

15.3: yem Jauq zavg ninb Bua zu'q la'maab Diab Zru. yem pyaub vxb Zauj tomb zwavj zaamg taub taub Qa'q Eyemq tu'q Kruq haig.
15.8: yem mo-apg teig Tauj haiq Dau maaib Raub Eyemq Eei Qiaj. Raub Eyemq Eei Qiaj zuvq Tauj ekg-laa-im, Raub Eyemq Eei Qiaj yaag mivb Tauj Be-e-e-lim.
15.4: hetq-Bon Zauj e-le-aa-le Eei myenb Eyemq Bwi Eei, ninb Bua Eei Qiaj zuvq cvq Tauj yaa-haatq. weig naaiq yem mo-apg txb Jyenq Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king Eei pcv heug Bwi Eei, Ba'Riu Bokg Bokg Eei.
15.2: Di-Bon myenb faauj mivb Tauj yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj Eyemq. mo-apg myenb weig ne-Bo Zauj me-De-Baa zivb Qa'q Eyemq. taub taub myenb Eei mGxvq Teij Fav, taub taub Eei syaam yaag Teij Revg.
15.6: nim-lim Eei uam Gaai Revg, miaq yaag Eauj Gaai. miab lunj yaag maiq Zwrtq. maiq maaib yetg teij mcv Eei setq.
15.9: Di-Bon Eei Do'q maaib Ryaamq pwavq Revg. mq paag yia Zxg xij pun Di-Bon zu'g ze'g naang kaub Niaq. pun syenb zung yem mo-apg pyauj Zwrtq Eei myenb, Zauj yem teib puv zevg Fiag Eei myenb.
15.5: yia Eei Hruq weig mo-apg Eyemq tu'q Kruq haig. mo-apg myenb pyauj mcvg mivb Tauj soj-aa, zuvq mivb Tauj ekg-latq-se-li-si-yaa. ninb Bua faauj lu-hitq, yetg ping faauj, yetg ping Eyemq. kan mivb ho-lo-naa-im uaq tiub Jauq, ninb Bua puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq weig ninb Bua zu'g myetg Eei ze'g naang.
15.7: weig naaiq mo-apg myenb tu'q taaib Eei zinb zxib Zauj syru Eei ka'naaiq ninb Bua pyenb Jiaj swib lyemb Dyavj Eei Do'q.
15.1: naaiq se kxvq Tauj mo-apg Eei waag. yem yetg mwrnd Navq, mo-apg Eei aan zivb zu'g paaig, zu'g myetg mig a'q. mo-apg zyrug zu'g paaig, waaig mig a'q. yem yetg mwrnd Navq, mo-apg Eei Ki-aa zivb zu'g paaig, zu'g myetg mig a'q.

29.18: Tauj uaq Nxi mnxmb Duv Eei myenb haib mwavj tu'q haid naaiq Fung sru Eei waag. mziv mcvb myenb Eei mziv xij yem mapq Mwavj ka'Euad haib mavg tu'q pwatg.
29.8: se Navq Hruq sia Eei myenb Beij pwatg Eang Naavj, Eia taaib ninb haid Hruq Zxg sia Jyenq yem. se Navq Jaav Gaatq Eei myenb Beij pwatg ninb hopq uam, Eia taaib ninb haid mau, Jaav Zxg Bxvj Gaai Eei. Bx'q si-on Bov Eei zwavj kua'q yetg zuvq myenb yaag zu'g Navq naaiq nx.
29.3: yia xij lyepg Zyavq weib Jyenq meib pyei puv. yia xij lyepg Bx'q Jaaj Eei laaub weib kxmj meib, yaag lyepg Bx'q Jaaj Eei Jaab sig Bx'q meib.
29.21: se ninb Bua kxvq Jruj waag pun zwid Dxtq zu'g maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb, yaag taaq za'eij Lopq zu'g yem zivb kcvb Beng sig Eei myenb, yaag zruj Jaaq zxvb zevj pun Kuq myenb maiq tu'q pcvb fim.
29.14: weig naaiq yia xij zruj Peij fug Eei sig yetg Kav Jiaj yetg Kav, pun naaiq teij myenb Bua'g hxvb haig. Zovb mevb myenb Eei Zovb mevb xij zu'g myetg, maaib wrnb zaav Eei myenb Eei wrnb zaav yaag xij zu'g kem Jyenq.
29.23: ninb Bua pwatg yia Zeij pun ninb Bua Eei zeib fun yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj, ninb Bua zyrug Taaib yia Eei mevb Zivb Revg. ninb Bua xij Eyemg yaa-Kopq Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb se za'kevb Zivb Revg, yaag Taaib i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb.
29.6: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq xij Tauj, maaib Ba'ov Bwi, Dau tovd, yaag maaib tomb! Qiaj Bwi, maaib tomb Ryaaub zung, tomb Ryaaub Jia'q, Zauj puaq ka'naaiq Qwi Eei trub Byetg.
29.2: yia Zxg xij pun aa-li-en zu'g Kruq, ninb zyrug Raub yaag Eyemq, yaag weig yia zruj nxm ziab txvb.
29.20: myenb to'g myenb xij zutg Revg, Wrtq myenb Eei myenb xij Revg mig a'q. yetg zuvq lxd Qavj zruj x'q Eei myenb xij zu'g Pai kwavg,
29.24: Hruq Namq txvg Eei myenb zuvq haib mevb pc'g, la'vopq Eei myenb yaag xij a'Neiq zipq Faauj Eei waag.
29.7: uaq zang Zauj aa-li-en Bx'q Jaaj uaq teij nxmb nxm kua'q Eei zwavj Junb pcv kwanb, se Bx'q ninb Zauj ninb wrnq Eei txvj pun ninb zu'g Kruq, zyrug Navq nxm Beij, Navq luvb mwrnd zang pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig.
29.19: Eyemg kanb zruj faij Eei myenb xij Kauj zyruq cvj tu'q Fyenb yrub. yem zwavj paamb myenb Bu'Dovj Eei myenb Jomg myenb xij Zev i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb.
29.17: maiq zeid Kuvj maaib ti'q tyen zyavb hog fai? le-Baa-nxn zyrug Tiuq penj Daub Jung, Daub Jung yaag pwatg Navq Dyavb lomg.
29.11: weig meib Bua nx, naaiq teij yetg zuvq laaug yaavb Eei sig se Navq Fung sru fiaq Jyenq Ravg, Bx'q Jyenq yenj. sij kxvq myenb zx'q sru pun taub haib to'g sru Eei myenb yaag Buaj ninb, “Toq to'g naaiq og,” ninb zyrug kxvq, “yia maiq haib to'g weig zu'g sru Bx'q Jyenq yenj.”
29.5: meib Eei winb wavq Dovg uaq Zamq xij Navq niab Buv nx mwrng. myenb to'g myenb Eei kwanb yaag Navq zu'g Ryaauj pwrng Eei Bia'q. lyemb zeib, yem Du'g tavb Navq,
29.9: meib Bua kunq zruj maiq Rav Eei sig meib Bua zyrug maiq Rav a'q. pun meib Bua kanb mziv mcvb, meib Bua zyrug mcvb a'q. kunq tiuq Gwin mq paag maiq zeid laaij a'vung tiuq. kunq luvb luvb laib laib Eei, mq paag maiq zeid laaij tiub Kuq.
29.16: meib Bua zx'q Euvb Euvg Byenq Rwrnj Revg, zyrug Namq taaib nanq nia zavg Zauj pa'naib nia fib Navq. nanq taaib Eei ka'naaiq haib Buaj nanq ninb taaib Eei zavg myenb, “ninb maiq zeid nanq yia taaib”, fai nanq taaib Eei ka'naaiq haib Buaj nanq ninb taaib uaq taub, “ninb maiq hiuq tu'q haiq Euvg” fai?
29.4: meib zyrug zu'g Dxtq Fiag aiq, yem Daub Diaq kxvq waag. meib Eei waag zyrug yem niab Buv Zwrtq taaib. meib Eei Qiaj xij yem Daub Diaq Zwrtq Navq myenq Eei Qiaj, yaag xij yem niab Buv Zwrtq taaib Navq waab sapq.
29.10: weig zu'g zyruq pun meib Bua mFxmb tu'q Do haig. ninb pwav Jyenq meib Bua trug waag myenb Eei mziv. ninb Byxvd Jyenq meib Bua kxvq zinb hod waag Eei myenb Eei mGxvq.
29.22: weig naaiq zyruq, tovb Fruj apg-laa-ham pyauj Dutq Kruq Eei sig uaq taub, kxvq Buaj yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun, “yavb naaiq mivb yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun maiq zu'g Eaiq. yavb naaiq mivb ninb Bua Eei Myen yaag maiq Twij setq.
29.12: fai sij kxvq myenb cvj zx'q naaiq Fung sru pun maiq zia'q Ravg Eei myenb yaag kxvq, “Toq to'g naaiq og,” ninb zyrug tau, “yia zia'q maiq tu'q Ravg.”
29.15: zx'q ninb Bua taaq Eei za'eij pivj zyruq uaq teij xij zu'g Kruq a'q, se tovb yem Mwavj zov zruj ninb Bua Eei sig yaag kxvq, “haiq taub pwatg yia Bua? haiq taub hiuq tu'q yia Bua?”
29.13: zyruq kxvq, “naaiq teij myenb taaib lxd yia, lovg ninb Bua Eei Rwib Taaib yia, mq paag ninb Bua Eei Hruq leib tu'q yia ko. ninb Bua Taaib yia, se Kuvj lovg myenb Faauj Eei leid Navq.”
29.1: o aa-li-en, aa-li-en aag, tovb Daa-witq lyepg Zyavq Eei zivb. yetg Havj Jaa yetg Havj, kunq pun yetg nxm zipq cvj Jiaj yetg nxm zipq.

30.18: mq paag zyruq zuaq Jyenq xij Zeij en pun meib Bua. ninb Jiad taaib xij Kxb lyenb meib Bua, weig zu'g zyruq se pcvb fim Eei Tinb huvb, ta'faanb zuaq ninb Eei myenb zyrug maaib xnb lx'g.
30.8: ib zang mivb a'q. zx'q naaiq teij waag Divb Jyenq la'pyeib penq, yaag fiaq Jyenq srub Fung weig Ga'haaq hivq, yetg liud zruj zxvb zevj.
30.33: Jiaj taaib laub a'q, zyruq liug leid zyavj yetg nxm txvj puaq huvb tiaj Eei sei. uaq nxm txvj yrug Do yrug Javq, trud Zauj zaavb yaag maaib Zamq Eei.   zyruq Eei Qiaj Navq huvb puaq zia'g taaib.
30.3: mq paag Kauj faa-lo peu meib Bua xij pun meib Bua zu'g Eaiq. pavg i-yipq zruj Daaub Kauj Eei txvj xij pun meib Bua zu'g paaig Myen.
30.32: zyruq xij lovg ninb tivg zwid Eei pyaaq Bx'q ninb Bua. Bx'q yetg pyaaq zyrug maaib Bx'q Rod, Patq taanb paab Eei Qiaj Pwij Jyenq. Bx'q Jaaj Eei zyavb hog ninb lovg ninb Eei puad Bx'q ninb Bua.
30.21: maiq kunq meib Bua huvj Jyenq zaaij fai Byaaug mivb, meib Bua zyrug haid Ga'haaq mcvj maaib Qiaj kxvq, “se tovb naaiq tiub Jauq. kunq yavb naaiq mivb.”
30.14: zivb laatg zyrug huq Navq nanq nia zavg Eei niab mx huq, za'kevb huq mwrng Revg, lxd maiq tu'q yetg Levj lovg Zenq trud Zwrtq trub Raug, fai Damq uam Zwrtq syru uam Eei Kwrtq.”
30.23: zyruq xij pun Byuvg Fiag taaib yuvd meib Bua zwavj Fiag Dau Eei Eim. yem Dau Zwrtq Eei laavb zi'g yaag xij lovj, puvb zua'g. Tauj uaq Nxi meib Bua Eei vovb kwanb xij yem Javq Eei miab Zyavq Eang miaq.
30.6: naaiq teij waag kxvq Tauj yem ne-kepg Eei Yiab zxib. ninb Bua zx'q zinb zxib an Jyenq lxb Eei ti'g taand, zx'q Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq an Jyenq lxb Txb Eei pwav, Tx Jyenq kan nxm a'g Eei, Kruq Eei teib puv mivb, se maaib syenb kruq syenb Eeid, maaib naavb to'g Zauj naavb Daij, zyrug mivb Tauj yetg fivj maiq haib Tevj maiq tu'q ninb Bua Eei myenb.
30.2: ninb Bua mivb i-yipq teib puv, yaag maiq Zauj yia Zaavb laavb. ninb Bua xij Kauj faa-lo huvb Tevj peu Jyenq ninb Bua, xij pavg i-yipq zruj Daaub Kauj Eei txvj.
30.20: maiq kunq zyruq pun meib Bua zu'g Kwrnj naanb txvj Fuaq, yaag pun Kruq naang txvj uam, yem naaiq mivb meib Bua Eei finb scv maiq cvj pivj. meib Bua kanb Eei mziv zuvq tu'q pwatg ninb.
30.24: laib Dau Eei vovb Zauj lxb yaag tu'q Eang Jaa Jyenq Rauq Eei miaq Zauj lovg tomb pa'kenb Eaapq Zauj ka'naaib Zenq Tiu taaib Eei Byaub Gaauq.
30.28: ninb Eei Qiaj Zwrtq taaib Navq uam pwavq mrub yemj Jyenq faauj Tauj Jaav. ninb xij lovg zu'g myetg Eei Jauq lxb maang kua'q, yaag zx'q hanb Kruq fapq myenb Eei Rwib, zyrug txb ninb Bua mivb txvg Jauq.
30.7: i-yipq Tevj Eei Jauq yetg aaj yaag maiq lamb lovg. weig naaiq yia Zwrtq Buaj heug, zweid Jyenq maiq tovd Eei laa-hapg.
30.29: meib Bua xij paauj Ruv Navq meib Bua Jiaj Zivb Revg zipq Eei mwrnd nx. meib Bua Eei Hruq xij Fyenb yrub Navq myenb pyomq Laub Dovb nuj faauj zyruq Eei Bov, Tauj i-saa-laa-en Eei la'pyeiq uaq.
30.19: o si-on myenb, se yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei myenb aa'b! yem naaiq mivb meib Bua maiq zu'g Eyemq a'q. zyruq haid meib Bua heug Jyenq Toq Eei Qiaj, ninb xij Zeij en pun meib Bua. ninb yetq haid, ninb zyrug tau meib Bua.
30.17: yetg taub myenb kxvq hc'q, zyrug maaib yetg Zin taub pyauj. pyaa taub myenb kxvq hc'q, meib Bua yetg zuvq zyrug pyauj, Tauj zevg Fiag Eei myenb Navq keb Eei tovg yem Bovb nivq, yaag Navq nxm Javb hog yem Bovb aiq kub vwaaig.”
30.31: atg-si-lia myenb haid zyruq Eei sivb Qiaj zyrug hc'q ninb Bua za'kevb! kamb Riaj haig.   zyruq yaag lovg ninb Eei huvb pyaaq Bx'q ninb Bua.
30.30: zyruq xij pun myenb tu'q haid ninb haavb taaub Eei Qiaj, yaag pun ninb Bua pwatg ninb Eei puad Bx'q Fiag. ninb za'kevb! Qiaj Jiad yaag Navq trud nx xij puaq Qwi Revg, cvj lovg tomb Byuvg, Ryaaub Jia'q Zauj px'g.
30.27: mavg maa'b! zyruq   yem ko Eei txvj taaib. ninb Qiaj Jiad Navq trud nx Jxm, maaib syruj hod faauj. ninb Eei Rwib maaib Qiaj Jiad Eei waag pwavq Revg, pctq Zwrtq taaib Navq puaq Qwi Eei trud.
30.11: kwavg Gxi naaiq tiub Jauq, leib Gxi naaiq tiub Jaub lrug. maiq tuvq zanb zang yem yia Bua Eei Ra'Myen, Ramg i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb.”
30.5: ninb Bua taub taub xij zu'g Eaiq, laaij yetg fivj myenb Tevj maiq tu'q ninb Bua. uaq fivj maiq lamb lovg, Tevj maiq tu'q haiq Euvg. Kuvj pun zu'g Eaiq, zu'g paaig Myen.”
30.9: naaiq se Hruq vcvg Eei pc'g fivj, kxvb pc'g Eei naamb Erud, maiq Kavq mwavj zyruq Faauj Eei naamb Erud.
30.16: meib Bua kxvq, ‘maiq zeid. yia Bua xij keb maad pyauj.’ weig naaiq meib Bua xij zu'g pyauj. meib Bua kxvq, ‘yia Bua xij keb maab syepq mivb.’ weig naaiq zung meib Bua uaq teij yaag xij syepq.
30.4: maiq kunq ninb Eei Jyen yem soj-an, ninb Eei kovb zob yaag Tauj haa-netq,
30.10: ninb Bua Buaj kxvq zinb hod Eei myenb, “maiq tuvq mavg hing yaavb Eei sig a'q.” yaag kxvq Buaj trug waag myenb, “maiq tuvq trug hxpg Eei Jauq pun yia Bua mwavj. kxvq Kub mwavj Eei sig Buaj yia Bua, yaag trug yia Bua a'Neiq mwavj Eei waag Navq.
30.22: meib Bua xij pun zu'g taaib pwav Jyenq Eaanb Eei miub favj Zauj toj taaib pwav Jyenq Jyem Eei miub favj maaib wij. meib Bua xij zxi kwavg Navq kwavg laib Lopq Eei ka'naaiq, yaag Buaj miub favj, “mivb a'q.”
30.12: weig naaiq i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “weig zu'g meib Bua Gemb naaiq teij waag, pavg zeij myenb Eei sig, yaag Kauj Duaq myenb Eei Jauq,
30.15: zyruq Tinb huvb, se i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “Rwrnj taaib hitq Kwrnj meib Bua zyrug tu'q Fruj. meib Bua sekq Ria'g yaag Kauj yia, meib Bua zyrug tu'q Qa'q. mq paag meib Bua maiq Kavq Navq naaiq nx zruj.
30.13: naaiq Euvg zwid zyrug Navq zivb laatg Lav Eei, Baaij mivb, zua Zwrtq taaib, lyemb zeib, Du'g tavb Navq Baav mig a'q.
30.1: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “Hruq vcvg Eei naamb Erud xij zu'g Kruq a'q. ninb Bua taaq za'eij, mq paag maiq zeid yia Eei. ninb Bua Zauj myenb lyepg vcvg waag yaag maiq zeid ei yia Eei sivj livb, zwid zyrug Jaa zwid.
30.26: Tauj zyruq peu ninb Eei pc'g fivj zu'g mun Eei txvj yaag zxg pun ninb Bua zu'g mun Eei naanj, Laaj zyrug Navq Ba'Nxi nx Fav. Ba'Nxi Eei Eutg xij kaub Fav siag kruq, Navq siag Nxi kapq taaib Eei Fav.
30.25: Tauj winb wavq zu'g taij taig Eei tomb Nxi, nxmb nxm laaub xij Baav Fiag Revg. nxmb nxm tomb Bov fiub Bov xij maaib Do'q, maaib uam lyrug.
